content: The-aufilaus, muaj ntau leej tau sau qha tej kws tub muaj huv peb lawm,
lawv le kws muaj qee leej pum tej ntawd thaus nyavnyuas pib muaj lug, puab yog cov kws qha Txujmoo Zoo hab qha tej ntawd rua peb paub.

Kuv tub ua tuab zoo saib tej ntawd txhij txhua thaus hauvpaug lug lawm. Yog le ntawd, The-aufilaus, koj yog tug kws paub qaabhau, kuv txhaj sau tej ntawd txhua zaaj, txij thaus hauvpaug moog txug thaus kawg rua koj paub.
Koj txhaj yuav paub tseeb txhua zaaj kws puab qha rua koj lawm.
Lub sijhawm kws Helauj ua vaajntxwv kaav lub xeev Yudas,  muaj ib tug povthawj hu ua Xakhaliyas, nwg yog Anpiyas paab povthawj. Nwg tug quaspuj hu ua Elixanpes. Elixanpes yog Aloos ib tug xeebntxwv.
Vaajtswv pum has tas obtug yog tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg, noog Vaajtswv lug hab ua lawv le Vaajtswv txuj kevcai txhua nqai, tsi muaj ib qho kws luas yuav thuam tau obtug.
Obtug tsi muaj mivnyuas, rua qhov Elixanpes yeej ibtxwm xeeb tsi taug tub, hab obtug tub laug laug lawm.
Muaj ib nub Xakhaliyas taabtom ua nwg teg num huv lub Tuamtsev lawv le cov povthawj naj nub ua.
Lawv le cov povthawj txuj kevcai, puab rhu ntawv tau Xakhaliyas moog hlawv moov tshuaj tsw qaab rua sau lub thaaj huv lub Tuamtsev.
Yog le ntawd, nwg txhaj moog rua huv tug Tswv lub Tuamtsev, lub sijhawm kws Xakhaliyas hlawv moov tshuaj tsw qaab, cov tuabneeg nyob saab nrau thov Vaajtswv.
Tug Tswv ib tug timtswv lug sawv ntawm lub thaaj kws hlawv moov tshuaj tsw qaab saab xis.
Thaus Xakhaliyas pum dlheev tug timtswv ntawd, nwg poob sab hab ntshai kawg le.
Tabsis tug timtswv has rua Xakhaliyas has tas, “Koj tsi xob ntshai! Vaajtswv tub nov koj tej lug thov lawm. Koj tug quaspuj yuav yug ib tug mivtub rua koj. Koj yuav tis nwg lub npe hu ua Yauhaas.
Thaus yug tau tug mivtub ntawd, koj yuav zoo sab kawg le, hab yuav muaj tuabneeg coob coob nrug koj zoo sab, rua qhov tug Tswv suav has tas,
nwg yog ib tug tuabneeg tseemceeb. Nwg yuav tsi haus cawv txiv maab lossis cawv ntxws hlo le. Nwg yuav puv npo Vaaj Ntsujplig tug Dlawbhuv huv nruab thab lug,
nwg yuav coj cov Yixalayees coob leej rov lug cuag tug Tswv kws yog puab tug Vaajtswv.

Nwg yuav muaj tswvyim hab muaj fwjchim ib yaam le Eliyas tug kws cev Vaajtswv lug, nwg yuav ua tug Tswv ntej moog ua kuas tej txiv tub rov sis hum; nwg yuav ua kuas cov tuabneeg kws tawv ncauj hloov ua tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg; hab nwg yuav npaaj ib cov tuabneeg rua tug Tswv.”
Xakhaliyas nug tug timtswv ntawd has tas, “Yuav ua le caag kuv txhaj paub tej kws koj has ko? Kuv tub laug heev, hab kuv tug quaspuj los tub laug laug lawm.”
Tug timtswv teb has tas, “Kuv yog Khali-ees, kuv nyob ntawm Vaajtswv xubndlag, Vaajtswv khaiv kuv lug qha txuj xuv zoo nuav rua koj.
Thaus txug lub sijhawm lawm yeej yuav muaj lawv le kuv has nuav tag, tabsis vim koj tsi ntseeg kuv tej lug, koj yuav has tsi tau lug moog txug nub kws muaj lawv le tej kws kuv tub has rua koj lawm.”
Thaus ntawd cov tuabneeg kws nyob saab nrau tog Xakhaliyas, puab xaav tsi thoob sov yog ua le caag Xakhaliyas yuav nyob huv lub Tuamtsev ntev ua luaj le.
Thaus nwg tawm lug, nwg txawm has tsi tau lug rua puab le, nwg ua ruag pav rua puab xwb. Puab xaav has tas tej zag yog muaj ib yaam dlaabtsi tshwm lug rua nwg pum huv lub Tuamtsev.
Thaus Xakhaliyas ua num huv lub Tuamtsev taag lawm, nwg rov qaab moog tsev.
Tom qaab ntawd tsi ntev, Elixanpes kws yog Xakhaliyas tug quaspuj txawm xeeb tub, Elixanpes nyob huv tsev tau tsib lub hlis, nwg tsi tawm moog qhov twg le.
Elixanpes has tas, “Nwgnuav tug Tswv paab kuv hab nwg ua rua kuv tsi txaajmuag rua leejtwg le lawm!”
Thaus Elixanpes xeeb tub tau rau lub hlis lawm, Vaajtswv khaiv nwg tug timtswv Khali-ees lug rua huv lub nroog Naxales kws nyob huv lub xeev Kalilais.
Tug timtswv ntawd lug cuag ib tug nkaujxwb hu ua Malis, tug kws Yauxej kws yog Vaajntxwv Daviv tug xeebntxwv tub qhab tseg lawm.
Tug timtswv lug has rua Malis has tas, “Koj yuav tau zoo nyob kaaj sab lug! Tug Tswv nrug nraim koj nyob hab foom koob moov ntau kawg rua koj lawm!”
Thaus Malis nov tug timtswv has le ntawd, nwg nyuaj sab heev, nwg xaav tsi thoob le, sov tug timtswv has le ntawd, yog has txug dlaabtsi.
Tug timtswv has rua Malis has tas, “Malis, koj tsi xob ntshai, Vaajtswv tub foom koob moov rua koj lawm.
Koj yuav xeeb tub hab yuav yug tau ib tug mivtub, koj yuav tis nwg lub npe hu ua Yexus.

Nwg yuav ua tug tseemceeb, hab suavdlawg yuav hu nwg lub npe has tas, nwg yog Vaajtswv tug kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus tug Tub. Tug Tswv kws yog Vaajtswv yuav tsaa nwg ua vaajntxwv, ib yaam le nwg yawmkoob Daviv,
nwg yuav ua vaajntxwv kaav Yakhauj cov xeebntxwv moog ibtxhis; hab nwg lub tebchaws yuav nyob moog tsi paub kawg le!”
Malis nug tug timtswv has tas, “Kuv yog ib tug nkaujxwb, yuav ua le caag muaj tau le ntawd?”

Tug timtswv teb has tas, “Vaaj Ntsujplig tug Dlawbhuv yuav lug rua sau koj, hab Vaajtswv lub fwjchim yuav roog koj. Vim le nuav suavdlawg txhaj yuav hu tug mivtub kws dlawbhuv kws yuav yug lug ntawd has tas, nwg yog Vaajtswv tug Tub.
Koj saib koj tug pujnyaaj Elixanpes kws suavdlawg has tas, nwg ibtxwm xeeb tsi taug tub, txawm yog nwg laug laug lawm los nwgnuav nwg tub xeeb tub tau rau lub hlis lawm,
rua qhov yeej tsi muaj ib yaam dlaabtsi kws Vaajtswv yuav ua tsi tau le.”
Malis has tas, “Kuv yog Vaajtswv tug ntxhais qhev, thov kuas muaj lawv le koj has ko rua kuv.” Ces tug timtswv txawm ncaim Malis moog lawm.
Tsi ntev tom qaab ntawd, Malis txawm sawv kev hab rau sab ntso moog txug ntawm ib lub nroog kws nyob sau laaj roob huv lub xeev Yudas,
nwg moog rua huv Xakhaliyas tsev hab has noj qaab nyob zoo rua Elixanpes.
Thaus Elixanpes nov dlheev Malis lub suab has rua nwg, ces nwg tug mivnyuas huv plaab txawm nti cuag dlaabtsi. Hab Elixanpes puv npo Vaaj Ntsujplig tug Dlawbhuv,
hab Elixanpes has nrov nrov rua Malis has tas, “Koj yog tug kws tau koob moov ntau tshaaj plawg txhua tug quaspuj huv tuabsi, hab koj tug mivnyuas huv plaab los tau koob moov hab.
Vim le caag kuv yuav tau txais txujkev hlub luj npaum le nuav, kuv tug Tswv leej nam tseem tuaj saib kuv hab?
Thaus kuv nov dlheev tej lug kws koj has rua kuv, kuv tug mivnyuas kws nyob huv kuv plaab zoo sab hab nti cuag dlaabtsi.
Koj yuav zoo sab heev, rua qhov koj tub ntseeg has tas, yuav muaj lawv le tej lug kws tug Tswv has rua koj lawm!”
Malis has tas, “Kuv lub sab ca le qhuas tug Tswv;
Vaajtswv kws yog kuv tug Cawmseej, nwg ua rua kuv zoo sab kawg le.
Rua qhov kuv yog nwg ib tug ntxhais qhev kws tsi tseemceeb los nwg tseem ncu txug kuv hab! Txij nuav moog txhua tsaav tuabneeg yuav hu kuv has tas tug kws tau koob moov,
vim tej kws Vaajtswv tug kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus tau ua rua kuv lawm. Nwg lub npe dlawbhuv kawg nkaus;
Vaajtswv hlub txhua tug kws fwm nwg ib tam dlhau ib tam.
Nwg tsaa nwg txhais teg kws muaj fwjchim ua kuas cov tuabneeg kws khaavtheeb tsi sis hum hab tawg paab tawg pawg.
Vaajtswv muab cov vaajntxwv kws muaj fwjchim txu ntawm puab lub zwmtxwv, hab Vaajtswv muab cov tuabneeg kws tsi muaj fwjchim tsaa rua qhov chaw sab.
Vaajtswv pub tej zaub mov zoo rua cov tuabneeg kws tshaib nqhes tau noj tsau npo. Nwg ntab cov tuabneeg npluanuj tsiv moog teg dlawb teg nplag.
Nwg ua lawv le nwg tau coglug tseg rua peb cov yawmkoob lawm, hab nwg tau lug paab cov tuabneeg Yixalayees kws yog nwg cov tubkhai.
Nwg ncu ntsoov hlub Anplahaas hab Anplahaas cov xeebntxwv moog ibtxhis le!”
Malis nrug Elixanpes nyob yuav laug tau peb lub hlis, nwg maam le rov moog tsev.
Thaus txug caij kws Elixanpes yug mivnyuas, nwg yug tau ib tug mivtub.
Nwg cov kwvtij neejtsaa hab tej tuabneeg zej zog nov has tas, tug Tswv foom koob moov rua nwg lawm, puab nrug nwg zoo sab kawg le.
Thaus tug mivnyuas ntawd muaj yim nub lawm, puab tuaj muab nwg ua kevcai txav tawv, hab puab yuav tis nwg lub npe hu ua Xakhaliyas lawv le nwg txiv.
Tabsis Elixanpes teb has tas, “Tsi yog le ntawd! Yuavtsum tis nwg lub npe hu ua Yauhaas.”
Puab has rua Elixanpes has tas, “Koj tub tsi muaj ib tug kwvtij npe hu le ntawd los sav!”
Puab txawm ua ruag pav rua tug mivtub leej txiv nug saib nwg nyam tis tug mivtub ntawd lub npe hu le caag.
Xakhaliyas kuas puab muab ib dlaim ntawv lug rua nwg, hab nwg sau has tas, “Tug mivtub nuav lub npe hu ua Yauhaas.” Puab xaav tsi thoob le!
Taamsim ntawd Xakhaliyas txawm rov has tau lug, hab nwg ua Vaajtswv tsaug.
Tej tuabneeg zej zog ntshai kawg le, hab zaaj ntawd txawm nrov nchaa moog thoob plawg tej zej zog kws nyob peg tej laaj roob huv lub xeev Yudas.

Cov tuabneeg kws nov zaaj nuav txawm khaws zaaj nuav ca rua nruab sab hab puab sis thaam has tas, “Tug mivnyuas nuav luj hlub lug nwg yuav ua dlaabtsi?” Rua qhov Vaajtswv lub fwjchim nrug nraim tug mivnyuas nuav.
Xakhaliyas kws yog Yauhaas txiv puv npo Vaaj Ntsujplig tug Dlawbhuv, hab nwg qha ib zaaj kws yuav muaj lug yaav tom ntej has tas:
“Peb ca le ua tug Tswv kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv tsaug! Rua qhov nwg lug paab nwg tsaav tuabneeg hab nwg tub tso puab dlim lawm.
Vaajtswv khaiv ib tug Cawmseej kws muaj fwjchim lug paab peb. Nwg yog Vaajtswv tug tubkhai Daviv ib tug xeebntxwv.
Lawv le Vaajtswv tau coglug tseg rua cov cev Vaajtswv lug kws dlawbhuv thaus u lug lawm has tas,
nwg yuav cawm kuas peb dlim ntawm peb cov yeebncuab txhais teg. Hab dlim ntawm txhua tug kws ntxub peb.
Vaajtswv has tas, nwg yuav hlub peb cov yawmkoob hab yuav ncu ntsoov tej lug tseemceeb kws nwg tau cog tseg lawm.
Nwg coglug tseeb tseg rua peb yawmkoob Anplahaas has tas nwg yuav paab kuas peb dlim ntawm peb cov yeebncuab txhais teg, hab yuav paab kuas peb muaj sab tawv ua tau nwg teg num tsi ntshai le,
kuas peb ua tau tuabneeg zoo hab ncaaj nceeg lawv le Vaajtswv lub sab nyam moog taag peb tam neej.
“Kuv tug Mivtub, suavdlawg yuav hu koj has tas, koj yog ib tug cev Vaajtswv tug kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus lug. Koj yuav ua tug Tswv ntej moog khu kev tog nwg,
Hab qha rua Vaajtswv tsaav tuabneeg, kuas puab paub has tas, Vaajtswv yuav zaam puab lub txim kuas puab dlim.
Rua qhov peb tug Vaajtswv yog tug kws hlub peb kawg nkaus. Nwg txujkev cawm dlim ci tuaj rua peb ib yaam le tug dluab tshaav ntuj ci thaus sawv ntxuv,
hab yuav ci moog rua txhua tug kws nyob huv qhov tsaus ntuj kws yog txujkev tuag, txhaj yuav coj tau peb moog taug txujkev kws peb yuav tau nyob kaaj sab lug.”
Tug mivtub ntawd luj hlub zoo hab nwg muaj tswvyim heev zuj zug, hab nwg nyob tom roob mojsaab qhua moog txug nub kws nwg tawm lug rua cov Yixalayees pum.
Lub sijhawm ntawd Vaajntxwv Aunkuxatus has kuas cov pejxeem kws nyob thoob plawg txhua lub tebchaws kws yog cov numtswv Loos kaav, kuas suavdlawg tuaj sau npe,
thawj zag kws muaj sau npe nuav, yog lub sijhawm kws Kulini-us ua nom kaav tebchaws Xilias.
Txhua tug nyag txawm moog sau npe rua huv nyag lub nroog.

Yauxej tawm huv lub nroog Naxales kws nyob peg Kalilais moog rua huv lub nroog Npelehees kws nyob nraag lub xeev Yudas kws thaus u yug Vaajntxwv Daviv. Yauxej moog rua huv lub nroog ntawd, rua qhov nwg yog Daviv xeebntxwv.
Yauxej coj Malis tug kws nwg tub qhab lawm nrug nwg moog sau npe. Thaus ntawd Malis suab ib plaab mivnyuas.
Thaus obtug tseem nyob huv lub nroog Npelehees, tub txug caij kws Malis yug mivnyuas lawm.
Malis yug nwg tug mivtub hlub, nwg muab khaub dluag qhwv tug mivnyuas hab muab tso pw rua huv ib lub dlaab zaub, rua qhov tej tsev su, tuabneeg tub su puv taag lawm.
Nyob thaaj tsaam ntawd muaj ib cov tuabneeg yug yaaj moog zuv puab cov yaaj tom teb thaus tsaus ntuj.
Tug Tswv ib tug timtswv lug cuag puab, hab tug Tswv tug tshwjchim ci ntsaa ab tuaj rua puab, puab poob sab hab ntshai kawg le,
tabsis tug timtswv ntawd has rua puab tas, “Mej tsi xob ntshai! Kuv lug ntawm nuav yog coj txujmoo zoo kws yog txujkev zoo sab kawg nkaus rua txhua tsaav tuabneeg lug qha rua mej paub.
Nub nua mej tug Cawmseej tub yug lug rua huv Daviv lub nroog lawm, nwg yog Khetos kws yog tug Tswv!
Mej yuav pum ib tug mivnyuas mog qhwv khaub dluag pw huv lub dlaab zaub, qhov ntawd yog lub cim kws qha has tas, tug ntawd yog tug kws kuv has.”
Taamsim ntawd muaj ib paab timtswv ceebtsheej coob coob lug nrug tug timtswv ntawd hu nkauj qhuas Vaajtswv le nuav:
“Thov kuas Vaajtswv tug kws nyob sau ntuj ceebtsheej tau koob meej, hab thov kuas cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv nplajteb txhua tug kws ua hum Vaajtswv sab tau nyob kaaj sab lug!”

Thaus cov timtswv ncaim puab rov qaab moog rua sau ntuj ceebtsheej lawm, cov tuabneeg yug yaaj txawm sis thaam has tas, “Peb ca le moog rua huv lub nroog Npelehees hab moog saib tej kws tug Tswv qha rua peb lawm.”
Puab ceev nrooj moog rua huv lub nroog, puab pum Malis hab Yauxej, hab pum tug mivnyuas pw huv ib lub dlaab zaub.
Thaus cov yug yaaj pum tug mivnyuas lawm, puab qha zaaj kws tug timtswv ceebtsheej qha rua puab has txug tug mivnyuas ntawd rua Malis hab Yauxej noog.
Txhua tug kws nov zaaj kws cov tuabneeg yug yaaj has ntawd, suavdlawg xaav tsi thoob le.
Malis khaws tej lug ntawd hab xaav ntsoov rua nruab sab.
Thaus cov yug yaaj rov qaab moog, puab hu nkauj qhuas Vaajtswv, rua qhov puab nov hab pum lawv le tug timtswv tau qha rua puab lawm.

Thaus tug mivnyuas ntawd muaj yim nub lawm, yog nub kws muab nwg ua kevcai txav tawv lawv le txuj kevcai txav hab tis nwg lub npe hu ua Yexus, lawv le tug timtswv ceebtsheej qha tseg rua Malis thaus tseem tsi tau xeeb tug mivtub ntawd.
Thaus txug lub sijhawm kws Yauxej hab Malis moog ua kevcai ntxuav lawv le Mauxes txuj kevcai, obtug txawm coj tug mivtub Yexus moog peg lub nroog Yeluxalees hab muab nwg fij rua Vaajtswv.
Lawv le muaj lug sau tseg rua huv tug Tswv txuj kevcai lawm has tas: “Yuavtsum muab txhua tug tub hlub fij rua tug Tswv.”
Hab obtug nqaa ib nkawm nquab taug lossis nquab nyeg moog fij lawv le tub muaj lug sau tseg rua huv tug Tswv txuj kevcai lawm.

Lub sijhawm ntawd muaj ib tug txivneej hu ua Xime-oos nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees. Nwg yog ib tug tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg, nwg fwm Vaajtswv hab naj nub tog lub sijhawm kws Vaajtswv lug cawm cov tuabneeg Yixalayees. Vaaj Ntsujplig tug Dlawbhuv nrug nraim Xime-oos,
hab qha rua nwg has tas, nwg yuav tsi tuag ua ntej kws nwg pum tug Mexiyas kws Vaajtswv coglug tseg.
Nub ntawd Vaaj Ntsujplig coj Xime-oos moog rua huv lub Tuamtsev. Thaus ntawd Yauxej hab Malis coj obtug tug mivtub Yexus tuaj ua kevcai huv lub Tuamtsev lawv le txuj kevcai qha tseg,
Xime-oos muab tug mivtub lug puag hab ua Vaajtswv tsaug has tas:
“Tug Tswv, nwgnuav koj tub ua lawv le koj coglug tseg lawm. Thov koj coj kuv kws yog koj tug tubkhai moog kaaj sab lug,
rua qhov kuv lub qhovmuag tub pum koj txujkev cawm dlim
kws koj npaaj rua txhua tsaav tuabneeg lawm.
Nwg yog lub teeb kws yuav ci moog rua lwm tsaav tuabneeg pum kev, hab yuav ua rua cov tuabneeg Yixalayees kws yog koj tsaav tuabneeg tau ntsejmuag.”
Thaus Yexus nam hab txiv nov Xime-oos has txug tug mivtub le ntawd, obtug xaav tsi thoob le.

Xime-oos foom koob moov rua puab hab has rua Malis kws yog Yexus nam has tas, “Vaajtswv xaiv tug mivtub nuav lug ua kuas cov Yixalayees ntau leej qaug hab ntau leej sawv. Nwg yog ib tug tseemceeb kws Vaajtswv khaiv lug, hab yuav muaj ntau leej tawmtsaam nwg,
hab nwg yuav muab tej kws tuabneeg xaav huv nruab sab qha rua suavdlawg paub, hab yuav mob koj sab ib yaam le raab ntaaj chob.”

Muaj ib tug puj ntsuag hu ua Aanas, nwg yog ib tug cev Vaajtswv lug, nwg yog Fanu-ees kws yog xeem Aseles tug ntxhais. Nwg laug heev lawm, thaus nwg tseem hluas, nwg yuav quasyawg tau xyaa xyoo xwb, nwg tug quasyawg tuag lawm. Nwgnuav nwg noobnyoog muaj yim caum plaub xyoos.  Nwg naj nub naj mo moog pehawm Vaajtswv huv lub Tuamtsev. Nwg ua kevcai yoo mov hab thov Vaajtswv, nwg tsi tawm moog qhov twg le.

Taamsim ntawd Aanas txawm tuaj txug, hab nwg ua Vaajtswv tsaug hab has txug tug mivtub ntawd rua txhua tug kws taabtom tog Vaajtswv lug cawm cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees kuas dlim moog.
Thaus Yauxej hab Malis ua txhua yaam tav lawv le tug Tswv txuj kevcai lawm, obtug rov qaab moog tsev rua peg lub nroog Naxales kws nyob huv lub xeev Kalilais.
Tug mivtub ntawd luj hlub zoo, nwg muaj tswvyim hab Vaajtswv foom koob moov rua nwg.
Yexus nam hab txiv naj xyoo moog ua Kevcai Hlaa Dlhau nraag lub nroog Yeluxalees.
Thaus Yexus noobnyoog muaj kaum ob xyoos, puab txawm rov moog ua kevcai nraag lub nroog Yeluxalees lawv le obtug ibtxwm ua lug lawm.
Thaus dlhau lub sijhawm ua kevcai Hlaa Dlhau lawm, obtug rov qaab moog tsev, tabsis tug mivtub Yexus tseem nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees. Nwg nam hab nwg txiv tsi paub.
Obtug xaav has tas Yexus nrug cov tuabneeg kws nrug obtug tuaj rov qaab moog lawm, obtug moog tau ib nub ke, obtug maam le nrhav saib nwg puas nrug obtug cov kwvtij hab cov phoojywg.
Tabsis obtug nrhav tsi pum nwg, obtug txhaj rov qaab moog nrhav nraag lub nroog Yeluxalees.
Ces nub peb obtug txhaj nrhav tau nwg nyob huv lub Tuamtsev, nwg nrug cov xwbfwb nyob ua ke, nwg noog puab qha hab nug puab.
Txhua tug kws nov nwg teb, xaav tsi thoob rua nwg tej kev txawj ntse ntawd le.
Thaus Yexus nam hab txiv pum nwg, obtug kuj xaav tsi thoob le hab. Nwg nam txawm has rua nwg tas, “Mivtub, ua le caag koj yuav ua le nuav rua wb? Koj txiv wb nrhav koj hab txhawj koj kawg le.”
Nwg teb obtug has tas, “Meb yuav nrhav kuv ua dlaabtsi? Meb tsi paub has tas kuv yuav nyob huv kuv Txiv lub tsev nua los?”
Tabsis obtug tsi totaub tej lug kws nwg has ntawd.
Yexus nrug obtug rov qaab moog rua peg lub nroog Naxales, hab nwg noog obtug lug. Nwg nam khaws tej lug ntawd rua nruab sab.
Yexus luj hlub zoo, muaj tswvyim, nwg ua hum Vaajtswv sab hab hum tuabneeg sab.

Thaus Tinpeli-us ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws tau kaum tsib xyoos lawm, lub sijhawm ntawd Pauti-us Philaj ua tswvxeev kaav lub xeev Yudas. Helauj ua nom kaav lub xeev Kalilais hab Helauj tug kwv Filis ua nom kaav lub xeev Itule-as hab lub xeev Takaunitis; Lixaniyas ua nom kaav lub xeev Anpilees,
Aanas hab Kayafas ua ob tug Povthawj Hlub. Lub sijhawm ntawd, Vaajtswv qha Vaajtswv txujlug rua Xakhaliyas tug tub Yauhaas tom roob mojsaab qhua.

Yog le ntawd, Yauhaas txhaj moog qhuab qha thoob plawg cheebtsaam kws nyob ntawm tug Dlej Yauladees has tas, “Mej yuavtsum tso mej tej kev txhum tseg hab ua kevcai raus dlej, Vaajtswv txhaj yuav zaam txim rua mej.”

Qhov nuav muaj lawv le Yaxayas tug kws cev Vaajtswv lug tau sau tseg rua huv nwg phoo ntawv has tas: “Muaj ib tug has nrov nrov tom roob mojsaab qhua has tas, ‘Ca le khu kev tog tug Tswv; khu kev kuas ncaaj nwg yuav lug!
Txhub txhua lub kwj haa kuas puv, khawb txhua lub roob hab txhua lub pov roob kuas taj. Khu tej kev nkhaus kuas ncaaj, muab qhov sab hab qhov qeg pheej kuas taj xwmyeem.
Txhua tsaav tuabneeg yuav pum Vaajtswv txujkev cawm dlim!’ ”

Muaj tuabneeg coob coob tuaj cuag Yauhaas kuas Yauhaas muab puab ua kevcai raus dlej. Yauhaas has rua puab tas, “Cov nam naab! Leejtwg qha rua mej has tas, mej yuav tsiv dlim Vaajtswv txujkev txav txim kws tub lug yuav txug?

Mej yuavtsum ua mej lub neej rua suavdlawg pum has tas, mej tub tso mej tej kev txhum tseg lawm. Mej tsi xob khaav has tas, Anplahaas yog mej yawmkoob. Kuv qha rua mej has tas, txawm yog Vaajtswv muab tej pobzeb nuav lug ua Anplahaas cov xeebntxwv los nwg yeej ua tau!
Nwgnuav tub muab raab taus tso rua ntawm lub hauvpaug ntoo lawm, tub yuav ntuv tug ntoo; txhua tsob ntoo kws tsi txi cov txiv zoo, luas yuav muab ntuv hab muab pov rua huv cub suavtawg.”
Cov tuabneeg coob coob ntawd nug Yauhaas has tas, “Yog le ntawd, peb yuav ua le caag?”
Yauhaas teb puab has tas, “Yog leejtwg muaj ob lub tsho, yuavtsum muab ib lub pub rua tug kws tsi muaj, hab yog leejtwg muaj mov muaj zaub, nwg yuavtsum muab faib rua tug kws tsi muaj.”
Cov tuabneeg kws sau se muaj qee leej tuaj ua kevcai raus dlej, hab puab nug Yauhaas has tas, “Xwbfwb peb yuav ua le caag?”
Yauhaas teb has tas, “Mej yuavtsum sau lawv le kevcai xwb, tsi xob sau tshaaj.”

Cov tubrog muaj qee leej nug Yauhaas ib yaam nkaus has tas, “Ua le peb ne, peb yuav ua le caag?” Yauhaas teb has tas, “Mej tsi xob yuam leejtwg lossis ntxag luas nyaj yuav. Mej tau nyaj hli npaum le caag, ca le txaus sab yuav le ntawd xwb.”
Cov tuabneeg kws ca sab ntsoov tog tug cawmseej xaav has tas, Yauhaas yog tug Mexiyas ntaag.

Yauhaas has rua puab tas, “Kuv muab mej ua kevcai raus dlej, tabsis tug kws yuav lawv kuv qaab lug, nwg muaj Fwjchim Luj dlua kuv, kuv tub tsi tsimnyog dlaws nwg txuj nyuas hlua khau. Nwg yuav muab mej ua kevcai raus lug ntawm Vaaj Ntsujplig tug Dlawbhuv hab ntawm suavtawg.

Nwg tuav rawv raab ntxuam, nwg yuav ntxuaj nwg pawg nplej, kuas cov npluag yaa tawm huv tuabsi. Nwg yuav muab cov nplej zoo ntim rua huv nwg lub txhaab, tabsis nwg yuav muab cov npluag pov rua huv cub suavtawg kws cig tsi paub tuag.”
Yauhaas qha Txujmoo Zoo ntau zaaj tsi sis thooj ntuag cov tuabneeg ntawd, kuas puab hloov puab lub sab.
Tabsis Yauhaas tshev Helauj tug kws ua nom kaav lub xeev Kalilais, rua qhov Helauj yuav Helaudias kws yog Helauj tug kwv tug quaspuj, hab Helauj ua ntau yaam phem.
Helauj tseem ua ib qhov phem ntxiv kws yog nwg nteg Yauhaas coj moog kaw rua huv tsev lojcuj.
Tom qaab kws suavdlawg ua kevcai raus dlej taag lawm, Yexus ua kevcai raus dlej hab. Thaus Yexus taabtom thov Vaajtswv, rooj ntug txawm qheb hlo,

hab Vaaj Ntsujplig tug Dlawbhuv kws muaj lub cev zoo le tug nquab lug rua sau Yexus. Hab muaj ib lub suab has sau ntuj tuaj rua Yexus has tas, “Koj yog kuv tug Tub kws kuv hlub, kuv txaus sab rua koj.”
Thaus Yexus pib ua num, nwg noobnyoog muaj kwvlaam le peb caug xyoo. Lawv le suavdlawg xaav, Yexus yog Yauxej tub, Yauxej yog Helis tub,
Helis yog Mathas tub, Mathas yog Levis tub, Levis yog Melekhis tub, Melekhis yog Yaanais tub, Yaanais yog Yauxej tub,
Yauxej yog Matatiyas tub, Matatiyas yog Amaus tub, Amaus yog Nahus tub, Nahus yog Exalis tub, Exalis yog Nakhais tub,
Nakhais yog Ma-as tub, Ma-as yog Matatiyas tub, Matatiyas yog Xemis tub, Xemis yog Yauxes tub, Yauxes yog Yaudas tub,
Yaudas yog Yau-anaas tub, Yau-anaas yog Lexas tub, Lexas yog Xelunpanpees tub, Xelunpanpees yog Se-atiyees tub, Se-atiyees yog Nelis tub,
Nelis yog Melekhis tub. Melekhis yog Adis tub, Adis yog Kauxas tub, Kauxas yog Emadas tub, Emadas yog Eles tub,
Eles yog Yausuas tub, Yausuas yog Eli-exes tub, Eli-exes yog Yaulimes tub, Yaulimes yog Mathas tub, Mathas yog Levis tub,
Levis yog Xime-oos tub, Xime-oos yog Yudas tub, Yudas yog Yauxej tub, Yauxej yog Yaunames tub, Yaunames yog Eliyakees tub,
Eliyakees yog Mele-as tub, Mele-as yog Menas tub, Menas yog Matathas tub, Matathas yog Nathaas tub, Nathaas yog Daviv tub.
Daviv yog Yexais tub, Yexais yog Aunpes tub, Aunpes yog Npau-am tub, Npau-am yog Xamoos tub, Xalemoos yog Nasoos tub,
Nasoos yog Aminadas tub, Aminadas yog Amis tub, Amis yog Anis tub, Anis yog Heloos tub, Heloos yog Peles tub, Peles yog Yudas tub,
Yudas yog Yakhauj tub, Yakhauj yog Ixaj tub, Ixaj yog Anplahaas tub, Anplahaas yog Telas tub, Telas yog Nahaus tub,
Nahaus yog Xelus tub, Xelus yog Le-us tub, Le-us yog Pelej tub, Pelej yog Enpes tub, Enpes yog Selas tub,
Selas yog Kainas tub, Kainas yog Afaxas tub,. Afaxas yog Xees tub, Xees yog Nau-es tub, Nau-es yog Lamej tub,
Lamej yog Methuxelas tub, Methuxelas yog Enauj tub, Enauj yog Yales tub, Yales yog Mahalalees tub, Mahalalees yog Kenaas tub,
Kenaas yog Enauses tub, Enauses yog Xej tub, Xej yog Adaas tub, Adaas yog Vaajtswv tub.
Thaus Yexus rov qaab ntawm tug Dlej Yauladees moog, nwg puv npo Vaaj Ntsujplig tug Dlawbhuv, hab Vaaj Ntsujplig coj nwg moog tom roob mojsaab qhua,
Dlaab Ntxwgnyoog sim Yexus sab tau plaub caug nub. Lub sijhawm ntawd Yexus tsi tau noj ib yaam dlaabtsi le, thaus dlhau plaub caug nub ntawd lawm, nwg tshaib plaab heev.
Dlaab Ntxwgnyoog has rua Yexus has tas, “Yog koj yog Vaajtswv tug Tub tag, koj ca le has kuas lub pobzeb nuav txa ua mov.”
Yexus teb has tas, “Vaajtswv Txujlug sau qha tseg has tas, ‘Tsi yog mov xwb txhaj cawm tau tuabneeg txujsa.’ ”
Tom qaab ntawd, dlaab Ntxwgnyoog txawm coj Yexus moog rua sau ib qhov chaw sab sab, hab ua rua Yexus pum taagnrho tej tebchaws huv qaab ntuj nuav.

Dlaab Ntxwgnyoog has rua Yexus has tas, “Kuv yuav muab hlo lub fwjchim hab muab ib puas tsaav yaam kws muab rua kuv lawm ntawd huv tuabsi rua koj, rua qhov tej ntawd yog kuv tug, kuv yuav muab rua leejtwg los tau.
Yog koj txhus caug pe kuv, ib puas tsaav yaam ntawd yuav yog koj tug taagnrho.”
Yexus teb has tas, “Vaajtswv Txujlug sau qha tseg has tas, ‘Mej yuavtsum pehawm tug Tswv kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv tuab leeg hab ua nwg teg num xwb!’ ”

Tom qaab ntawd dlaab Ntxwgnyoog txawm coj Yexus moog rua huv lub nroog Yeluxalees, hab nwg coj Yexus nce moog rua sau lub Tuamtsev qhov kws sab tshaaj plawg, nwg has rua Yexus has tas, “Yog koj yog Vaajtswv tug Tub tag, koj ca le dlha rua huv aav,
rua qhov Vaajtswv Txujlug sau qha tseg has tas, ‘Vaajtswv yuav kuas nwg cov timtswv lug tsomkwm koj.’
Hab tseem muaj ib lus has ntxiv tas, ‘Puab ob txhais teg yuav fwj koj, hab yuav tsi pub koj ob txhais kutaw tsoo pobzeb le.’ ”
Yexus teb dlaab Ntxwgnyoog has tas, “Vaajtswv Txujlug has tas, ‘Koj tsi xob sim tug Tswv kws yog koj tug Vaajtswv sab.’ ”
Thaus dlaab Ntxwgnyoog dlaag Yexus txhua yaam taag lawm, nwg txawm ncaim Yexus moog txug thaus rov muaj sijhawm.
Tom qaab ntawd, Yexus rov qaab moog rua peg Kalilais, hab Vaaj Ntsujplig tug Dlawbhuv lub fwjchim nrug nraim nwg. Nwg lub moo nrov nchaa moog thoob plawg cheebtsaam ntawd.
Yexus moog qha huv puab tej tsev saablaaj, hab txhua tug kws nov nwg qha, qhuas nwg kawg le.
Tom qaab ntawd, Yexus moog txug huv lub nroog Naxales kws nwg luj hlub. Nub Xanpataus nwg moog rua huv tsev saablaaj lawv le nwg ibtxwm moog. Nwg sawv ntsug nyeem Vaajtswv Txujlug rua suavdlawg noog,
luas muab thooj ntawv kws Yaxayas tug kws cev Vaajtswv lug sau lug rua Yexus. Yexus nthuav thooj ntawv ntawd tau zaaj kws has tas:

“Tug Tswv tug Ntsujplig nrug nraim kuv, rua qhov nwg tsaa kuv ua tug qha Txujmoo Zoo rua cov tuabneeg txomnyem. Vaajtswv khaiv nwg moog qha txujkev cawm dlim rua cov tuabneeg kws raug kaw, hab khu cov tuabneeg dligmuag kuas rov pum kev, hab tso cov kws raug kev tsimtxom kuas dlim
hab qha rua suavdlawg paub lub sijhawm kws tug Tswv yuav lug cawm nwg tsaav tuabneeg.”
Thaus Yexus nyeem taag, nwg muab thooj ntawv ntawd dlov ca hab muab rua tug kws saib tej ntawv ntawd, hab nwg txawm nyob quastsawg. Txhua tug kws nyob huv lub tsev saablaaj saib ntsoov Yexus,
Yexus pib qha puab has tas, “Vaajtswv Txujlug kws nub nua mej nov tub tav lawm.”
Cov tuabneeg ntawd qhuas hab xaav tsi thoob rua tej lug zoo kws nwg has ntawd. Puab has tas, “Tug nuav tsi yog Yauxej tug tub los?”

Yexus has rua puab tas, “Kuv paub has tas mej yeej yuav has lu paajlug nuav rua kuv has tas, ‘Koj yog tug kws tshuaj, koj yuavtsum xub khu koj kuas zoo tsaiv.’ Hab mej yuav has rua kuv tas, ‘Koj sim ua tej txujci kws peb nov koj ua peg lub nroog Kapena-us, rua huv koj lub nroog nuav rua peb saib.’ ”
Yexus has rua puab tas, “Kuv qha tseeb rua mej has tas, yeej tsi muaj ib tug cev Vaajtswv lug kws cov tuabneeg nyob huv nwg lub zog yuav fwm nwg.

“Mej noog kuv has: kuv qha tseeb rua mej has tas, thaus lub sijhawm kws Eliyas nyob, muaj tej puj ntsuag coob coob nyob huv tebchaws Yixalayees. Thaus ntawd naag tsi lug tau peb xyoos hab rau hli, hab muaj kev tshaib plaab thoob plawg lub tebchaws.

Vaajtswv tsi tau khaiv Eliyas moog paab cov puj ntsuag kws nyob huv tebchaws Yixalayees ib tug le, tabsis tsuas khaiv Eliyas moog paab tug puj ntsuag kws nyob huv lub nroog Xalefas huv cheebtsaam Xidoos xwb.

Hab thaus lub sijhawm kws Elisas tug kws cev Vaajtswv lug nyob, muaj cov tuabneeg mob ruas coob coob nyob huv tebchaws Yixalayees, tabsis tsi muaj ib tug zoo ruas le, tsuas yog Na-amaas tug kws yog tuabneeg Xilias tuab leeg txhaj zoo ruas xwb.”
Thaus cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub tsev saablaaj nov Yexus has le ntawd, suavdlawg chim heev.
Puab txawm sawv tseeg muab Yexus thawb ntag tawm huv lub nroog moog, hab coj Yexus moog rua sau hauv roob, yuav muab Yexus thawb rua huv qaab tsuas, rua qhov lub nroog ntawd nyob sau roob,
tabsis Yexus ca le phoom ntag phua plhawv puab hab tsiv moog lawm.
Tom qaab ntawd, Yexus moog rua peg lub nroog Kapena-us kws nyob huv lub xeev Kalilais, nub Xanpataus Yexus qha cov tuabneeg suavdlawg.
Cov tuabneeg ntawd xaav tsi thoob rua tej kws Yexus qha, rua qhov Yexus tej lug qha muaj fwjchim heev.
Muaj ib tug txivneej raug dlaab tuaj rua huv lub tsev saablaaj, nwg qw nrov nrov has tas,
“Yexus kws yog tuabneeg Naxales, koj tuaj ua kuas peb puamtsuaj los? Kuv paub koj yog leejtwg, koj yog Vaajtswv tug Tub kws dlawbhuv!”

Yexus has tawv tawv rua dlaab has tas, “Koj tsi xob has lug, koj ca le tawm huv tug txivneej nuav moog!” Dlaab txawm ua rua tug txivneej ntawd qaug kag rua huv aav taabmeeg suavdlawg, ces dlaab txawm tawm plawg lawm, tsi ua rua tug txivneej ntawd raug mob le.
Cov tuabneeg coob coob ntawd xaav tsi thoob hab sis thaam has tas, “Tej lug ntawd yog has le caag? Ua le caag nwg tej lug yuav muaj fwjchim ua luaj le, hab ntab tau dlaab tawm!”
Yexus lub moo txawm nrov nchaa moog thoob plawg cheebtsaam ntawd.
Yexus tawm huv lub tsev saablaaj hab moog rua huv Ximoos tsev. Ximoos nam tais ua npaws nwg kub cev heev. Puab thov kuas Yexus paab nwg.
Yexus moog sawv ntawm lub txaaj kws Ximoos nam tais pw ib saab, hab has kuas tug npaws ca le tu. Ces tug npaws txawm tu hab nwg sawv tseeg taamsim ntawd lug ua zaub ua mov rua Yexus puab noj.
Thaus nub poob qho lawm, txhua tug kws muaj tej kwvtij kws muaj mob, puab coj tuaj cuag Yexus: Yexus cev teg tuav txhua tug, ces puab tej mob txawm zoo huv tuabsi lawm.

Hab muaj ntau tug kws raug dlaab, Yexus ntab dlaab tawm huv tuabsi. Cov dlaab ntawd has nrov nrov has tas, “Koj yog Vaajtswv tug Tub!” Tabsis Yexus txwv tsi pub dlaab has lug, rua qhov dlaab paub has tas Yexus yog tug Mexiyas.
Thaus kaaj ntug, Yexus tawm huv lub nroog moog rua ib qhov chaw kws tsi muaj tuabneeg. Muaj ib paab tuabneeg tuaj nrhav Yexus, thaus puab nrhav tau nwg lawm, puab cheem tsi pub nwg moog.
Tabsis nwg has rua puab tas, “Kuv yuavtsum moog qha Txujmoo Zoo kws has txug Vaajtswv lub Tebchaws rua lwm lub nroog hab, rua qhov Vaajtswv yeej khaiv kuv lug ua teg num nuav.”
Yexus moog qhuab qha huv tej tsev saablaaj kws nyob txhua qhov huv xeev Yudas.
Muaj ib nub Yexus nyob nraag ntug Havtxwv Nkenexales, muaj tuabneeg coob coob sis txiv qev tuaj cuag nwg hab noog nwg qha Vaajtswv txujlug.
Yexus pum ob lub nkoj nreg ntawm ntug dlej, cov tuabneeg nrhav ntseg tub tawm huv puab tej nkoj moog ntxuav puab tej vaag lawm.

Yexus nce moog rua huv ib lub nkoj, lub ntawd yog Ximoos lub. Yexus thov kuas Ximoos thawb lub nkoj moog kuas nrug dleb ntawm ntug dlej mivntsiv. Yexus nyob quastsawg huv lub nkoj qha cov tuabneeg kws tuaj ntawd.
Thaus nwg qha taag lawm, nwg has rua Ximoos has tas, “Ca le nkuam koj lub nkoj moog rua tom qhov kws tub tub, muab mej lub vaag tso rua huv dlej txhaj yuav maag tau ntseg.”
Ximoos teb has tas, “Tug Tswv, peb tub ntaus ib mos kaaj ntug tsi tau ib tug le, tabsis kuv yuav tso lub vaag moog lawv le koj has.
Puab txawm tso lub vaag moog, hab maag tau ntseg ntau kawg le, lub vaag yuav laug ndluag.
Puab txhaj cu teg kuas puab cov phoojywg kws caij lwm lub nkoj lug paab puab. Cov phoojywg txawm lug paab, hab puab muab tau ob nkog ntseg puv nkaus, ua rua ob lub nkoj yuav laug tog.
Thaus Ximoos Petus pum le ntawd, nwg txhus caug ndlua ntawm Yexus xubndlag hab has tas, ‘Tug Tswv, thov koj txaav dleb ntawm kuv. Rua qhov kuv yog tuabneeg txhum!’ ”
Ximoos hab cov tuabneeg kws nrug nwg nyob ntawd xaav tsi thoob has tas, ua le caag yuav tau ntseg ntau ua luaj.

Ob tug kws nrug Ximoos ntaus ntseg yog Yakaunpaus hab Yauhaas kws yog Xenpedais ob tug tub, obtug xaav tsi thoob ib yaam nkaus. Yexus has rua Ximoos has tas, “Koj tsi xob ntshai; txij nuav moog koj yuav ua tug moog nrhav tuabneeg.”
Puab suavdlawg nqug ob lub nkoj lug rua tim ntug, puab txawm tso txhua yaam tseg hab nrug Yexus moog.

Muaj ib zag Yexus nyob huv ib lub nroog. Nyob huv lub nroog ntawd muaj ib tug mob ruas thoob plawg ib ce. Thaus nwg pum Yexus, nwg txhus caug ndlua rua huv aav thov Yexus has tas, “Tug Tswv, yog koj txaus sab khu kuv tej ruas, koj yeej khu tau!”
Yexus cev teg moog tuav nkaus tug ntawd hab has tas, “Kuv txaus sab paab koj, koj tej ruas ca le zoo hlo!” Taamsim ntawd nwg tej ruas txawm zoo taag huv tuabsi lawm.

Yexus has tas, “Koj tsi xob moog qha zaaj nuav rua leejtwg le. Tabsis koj ca le ncaaj qhaa moog cuag tug povthawj, hab kuas nwg saib has tas koj tej ruas tub zoo lawm. Tom qaab ntawd koj ca le nqaa khoom moog fij rua Vaajtswv lawv le Mauxes txuj kevcai tau qha tseg, suavdlawg txhaj paub has tas koj tug mob tub zoo lawm.”
Tabsis Yexus lub moo hajyam nrov nchaa moog thoob plawg txhua qhov, hab muaj tuabneeg coob coob tuaj noog Yexus qha hab thov Yexus khu puab tej mob.
Tabsis Yexus pheej moog rua tej qhov chaw kws tsi muaj tuabneeg, hab thov Vaajtswv qhov ntawd.

Muaj ib nub thaus Yexus taabtom qha, muaj cov Falixais hab cov xwbfwb kws qha Vaajtswv txuj Kevcai qee leej tuaj nyob ntawd noog hab, Puab tuaj huv txhua lub nroog kws nyob huv lub xeev Yudas, hab huv lub nroog Yeluxalees tuaj. Yexus muaj tug Tswv lub fwjchim khu tau tej tuabneeg kws muaj mob.
Muaj qee leej muab choj qhwv ib tug txivneej tuag teg tuag taw kwv tuaj, hab puab yuav kwv moog rua huv lub tsev hab muab tso rua ntawm Yexus hauv ntej.

Tabsis vim muaj tuabneeg coob coob, puab tsi tau kev kwv moog rua huv, puab txawm kwv nwg nce moog rua sau ruv tsev, puab yaws cov vuag ib qho, hab muab nwg tso dlauv moog rua ntawm Yexus hauv ntej kws nyob huv plawv cov tuabneeg suavdlawg.
Thaus Yexus pum has tas puab muaj kev ntseeg heev, ces Yexus txawm has rua tug txivneej tuag teg tuag taw ntawd has tas, “Kuv tug phoojywg, kuv tub zaam koj lub txim lawm.”

Cov xwbfwb kws qha Vaajtswv txuj Kevcai hab cov Falixais sis thaam has tas, “Tug kws has lug saib tsi taug Vaajtswv ntawd, nwg yog leejtwg? Tsi muaj leejtwg zaam txim tau rua tuabneeg, tsuas yog Vaajtswv tuab leeg xwb, txhaj zaam tau!”
Yexus tub paub tej kws puab sis thaam lawm, nwg txhaj has rua puab tas, “Ua le caag mej yuav xaav le ntawd?
Lu lug kws has tas, ‘Koj tub dlim koj lub txim lawm’ lossis lu lug kws has tas, ‘Koj ca le sawv tseeg moog kev!’

Ob lu lug nuav, lu twg yuav yoojyim has dlua?” Kuv yuav ua le nuav qha rua mej paub has tas, “Tuabneeg leej Tub muaj fwjchim huv nplajteb nuav zaam txim tau rua tuabneeg.” Yexus txhaj has rua tug tuag teg tuag taw has tas, “Kuv has rua koj has tas, koj ca le sawv, hab nqaa koj dlaim choj pua chaw moog tsev!”
Taamsim ntawd nwg txawm sawv tseeg taabmeeg suavdlawg, nwg nqaa hlo nwg dlaim choj pua chaw moog tsev hab ua Vaajtswv tsaug.
Cov tuabneeg coob coob ntawd xaav tsi thoob, puab ntshai, puab qhuas Vaajtswv hab has tas, “Ua le caag nub nua peb yuav pum tej nuav txawv ua luaj le.”
Tom qaab kws Yexus tawm qhov ntawd moog, nwg pum ib tug txivneej sau se hu ua Levis nyob ntawm lub rooj sau se. Yexus has rua Levis has tas, “Koj ca le nrug kuv moog.”
Levis txawm sawv tseeg, tso txhua yaam tseg hab nrug Yexus moog.
Levis ua ib rooj mov huv nwg tsev rua Yexus noj, muaj cov tuabneeg sau se coob leej hab lwm tug kws nrug Yexus noj mov ua ke.
Cov Falixais hab cov xwbfwb kws qha Vaajtswv txuj Kevcai kws yog cov Falixais paab, ywg Yexus cov thwjtim has tas, “Ua le caag mej nrug cov tuabneeg sau se hab cov tuabneeg txhum noj haus ua ke?”
Yexus teb puab has tas, “Cov tuabneeg kws tsi muaj mob, puab yeej tsi moog cuag kws tshuaj, tsuas yog cov tuabneeg muaj mob txhaj moog cuag kws tshuaj xwb.
Kuv tsi yog lug hu cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg, tabsis kuv lug hu cov tuabneeg txhum, kuas puab tso puab tej kev txhum tseg.”

Muaj qee leej has rua Yexus has tas, “Yauhaas cov thwjtim pheej ua kevcai yoo mov hab thov Vaajtswv, cov Falixais cov thwjtim los ua ib yaam nkaus le ntawd hab, tabsis koj cov thwjtim noj hab haus tsi ua le puab?”
Yexus teb puab has tas, “Mej xaav has tas thaus tug nraug vauv tseem nrug nwg cov phoojywg noj tshoob ua ke, puab yuav yoo mov nua los? Puab yeej tsi yoo le!
Tabsis thaus txug lub sijhawm kws luas coj tug nraug vauv moog lawm, ces puab yuav yoo mov.”

Yexus has ib zaaj lug pevtxwv rua puab has tas, “Tsi muaj leejtwg yuav muab lub tsho tshab dlua ib dlaig coj moog ntxiv lub tsho qub. Yog nwg ua le ntawd, kuj yog nwg dlua kuas lub tsho tshab ndluag xwb, hab dlaim ntaub tshab ntawd yeej tsi phim lub tsho qub.

Hab tsi muaj leejtwg yuav muab cov cawv txiv maab tshab ntim rua huv lub naab tawv qub. Yog nwg ua le ntawd, cov cawv txiv maab yuav tsaam kuas lub naab tawv qub tawg, cov cawv txiv maab yuav lug taag, hab lub naab tawv qub yuav ndluag taag.
Cov cawv txiv maab tshab yuavtsum muab ntim rua huv lub naab tawv tshab.
Yog leejtwg tau haus cov cawv txiv maab qub lawm, nwg yeej tsi xaav haus cov tshab. Rua qhov nwg has tas, cov qub qaab dlua.”
Nub Xanpataus Yexus hab nwg cov thwjtim taabtom moog txug huv ib dlaim teb npleg, Yexus cov thwjtim txawm dle nplej tev noj.
Cov Falixais qee leej nug has tas, “Vim le caag mej ua tej kws peb txuj Kevcai txwv tsi pub ua rua Nub Xanpataus?”
Yexus teb puab has tas, “Mej tsi tau nyeem zaaj kws Daviv ua thaus Daviv hab nwg cov tuabneeg tshaib plaab los?

Daviv moog rua huv Vaajtswv lub Tuamtsev, nwg muab tej ncuav kws tub muab fij rua Vaajtswv lawm noj, hab muab faib rua nwg cov tuabneeg noj. Tabsis peb txuj kevcai yeej tsi pub leejtwg noj tej ncuav ntawd, tsuas yog cov povthawj txhaj noj tau xwb.”
Hab Yexus xaus lug has tas, “Tuabneeg leej Tub yog tug Tswv Nub Xanpataus.”
Muaj dlua ib nub yog nub Xanpataus, Yexus moog qhuab qha huv ib lub tsev saablaaj. Muaj ib tug txivneej kws saab teg xis qhuav, nwg tuaj nyob huv hab.
Cov xwbfwb kws qha Vaajtswv txuj Kevcai hab cov Falixais xaav nrhav txim rua Yexus, puab txawm saib Yexus puas khu mob nub Xanpataus.
Tabsis Yexus tub paub tej kws puab xaav lawm, nwg txhaj has rua tug tuabneeg qhuav teg ntawd has tas, “Koj ca le sawv lug tom hauv ntej nuav” Tug txivneej ntawd txawm sawv tseeg lug.
Yexus has rua puab tas, “Kuv nug mej saib, peb txuj Kevcai qha has tas nub Xanpataus ca peb ua zoo lossis ua phem? Cawm tuabneeg txujsa lossis ca txujsa tu?”

Yexus tig moog saib cov tuabneeg ntawd txhua tug, Yexus has rua tug txivneej ntawd tas, “Koj ca le xyaab hlo koj txhais teg.” Nwg txawm xyaab hlo nwg txhais teg,  ces nwg txhais teg txawm zoo le qub lawm.
Puab cov ntawd chim heev, puab txawm saablaaj saib yuav ua le caag rua Yexus.
Tom qaab ntawd, muaj ib nub Yexus moog thov Vaajtswv peg roob, hab nwg nyob peg thov Vaajtswv ib mos.
Thaus kaaj ntug Yexus hu cov thwjtim lug ntawm nwg, nwg xaiv puab kaum ob leeg, nwg hu puab ua cov timthawj.
Puab cov ntawd yog: Ximoos, (tug kws Yexus tis npe hu ua Petus) hab nwg tug kwv Aadales; Yakaunpaus, Yauhaas, Filis, Npataulaumais,
Mathais, Thaumas, Yakaunpaus kws yog Alafais tug tub, Ximoos (tug kws xaav kuas nwg tsaav tuabneeg muaj kev ywjpheej),
Yudas kws yog Yakaunpaus tug tub, hab Yudas Ixakali-us tug kws ntxeev sab rua Yexus.

Yexus hab nwg cov timthawj nqeg peg roob lug nrug nwg ib paab thwjtim coob coob sawv ua ke ntawm ib qhov chaw taj taj. Muaj tuabneeg coob coob tuaj huv lub xeev Yudas, huv lub nroog Yeluxalees, huv lub nroog Tiles hab huv lub nroog Xidoos kws nyob ntawm ntug havtxwv tuaj,
puab tuaj noog Yexus qhuab qha hab thov kuas Yexus khu puab tej mob. Cov tuabneeg kws raug dlaab tsimtxom los tuaj cuag Yexus, hab Yexus khu puab txhua tug zoo huv tuabsi.
Cov tuabneeg coob coob ntawd kov Yexus, rua qhov muaj fwjchim tawm ntawm Yexus tuaj khu txhua tug kws muaj mob zoo huv tuabsi.
Yexus tsaa qhovmuag saib nwg cov thwjtim hab has rua puab tas, “Mej cov kws txomnyem, mej tau koob moov, rua qhov Vaajtswv lub Tebchaws yog mej tug!
Mej cov kws nwgnuav tshaib nqhes mej yuav tau koob moov, rua qhov mej yuav tau noj tsau npo! Mej cov kws nwgnuav quaj ntsuag; mej yuav tau koob moov, rua qhov mej yuav muaj lub ntsejmuag luag.
“Thaus luas ntxub mej, hab ntab kuas mej tsiv, thuam mej hab has tas mej yog cov tuabneeg ua phem, vim mej ntseeg Tuabneeg leej Tub, mej yuav tau koob moov!

Thaus muaj le ntawd, mej ca le zoo sab hab dlha luag ntxhi, rua qhov Vaajtswv tub npaaj nqe zug ntau kawg le ca sau ntuj ceebtsheej rua mej lawm. Rua qhov puab cov yawmkoob tub ua ib yaam le ntawd rua cov kws cev Vaajtswv lug thaus u lawm hab.
Mej cov kws nwgnuav npluanuj mej yuav raug kev txomnyem, rua qhov mej tub tau zoo lug lawm!

Mej cov kws nwgnuav tau noj tsau npo mej yuav raug kev txomnyem, rua qhov mej yuav tshaib nqhes. Mej cov kws nwgnuav muaj lub ntsejmuag luag, mej yuav raug kev txomnyem, rua qhov mej yuav muaj kev nyuaj sab quaj ntsuag!
“Thaus muaj tuabneeg qhuas mej, mej yuav raug kev txomnyem, rua qhov mej tej yawmkoob tub has ib yaam nkaus le ntawd rua cov kws cevlug tsi tseeb thaus u lawm hab.
“Tabsis kuv has rua mej cov kws noog kuv qha has tas, hlub mej cov yeebncuab hab ua zoo rua cov kws ntxub mej,
foom koob moov rua cov tuabneeg kws tshev mej, hab thov Vaajtswv paab rua cov tuabneeg kws tsimtxom mej.
Yog leejtwg ntaus koj ib saab plhu, koj ca le tig saab tod rua nwg ntaus hab. Yog leejtwg txhaav koj lub tsho kws naav tuaj saab nrau, koj ca le hle lub tsho kws naav tuaj saab huv rua nwg hab.
Txhua tug kws thov mej ib yaam dlaabtsi, mej ca le muab rua puab, hab yog leejtwg muab mej ib yaam dlaabtsi lawm, mej tsi xob kuas nwg xaa rov qaab tuaj rua mej.
Yog mej xaav kuas lwm tug ua le caag rua mej, mej yuavtsum ua ib yaam le ntawd rua lwm tug hab.
“Yog mej tsuas hlub cov kws hlub mej xwb, mej xaav has tas mej yuav tau koob moov nua los? Txawm yog cov tuabneeg txhum los puab tub paub hlub cov kws hlub puab hab!
Yog mej tsuas ua zoo rua cov kws ua zoo rua mej xwb, mej xaav has tas, mej yuav tau koob moov nua los? Txawm yog cov tuabneeg txhum los puab tub paub ua le ntawd hab!

Hab yog mej tsuas qev rua cov kws mej ca sab has tas, puab yuav them taug rov rua mej xwb, mej xaav has tas, mej yuav tau koob moov nua los? Txawm yog cov tuabneeg txhum los puab ib leeg tub kaam qev rua ib leeg hab, hab puab ca sab has tas yuav tau rov qaab puv ntoob le qub.

Tabsis mej yuavtsum hlub mej cov yeebncuab hab ua zoo rua puab; mej ca le qev rua puab tsi xob ca sab has tas yuav tau puv ntoob le qub rov qaab. Yog mej ua le ntawd, mej yuav tau nqe zug ntau, hab mej yuav tau ua Vaajtswv tug kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus cov mivnyuas. Rua qhov Vaajtswv tseem hlub cov tuabneeg kws ua phem hab cov kws tsi ncu Vaajtswv tshaav ntuj.
Mej yuavtsum muaj lub sab taabncuab ib yaam le mej leej Txiv tug kws muaj lub sab taabncuab.

“Mej tsi xob txav txim rua lwm tug, Vaajtswv txhaj yuav tsi txav txim rua mej; mej tsi xob rau txim rua lwm tug, Vaajtswv txhaj yuav tsi rau txim rua mej; zaam txim rua lwm tug, Vaajtswv txhaj yuav zaam txim rua mej.

Mej pub rua lwm tug, Vaajtswv txhaj yuav pub rua mej. Vaajtswv yuav foom koob moov nplua mag rua mej, kuas mej muaj nplua mag siv tsi taag. Mej muab lub luaj le caag luj rua lwm tug lawm, Vaajtswv yuav muab lub luaj le ntawd luj rua mej.”
Hab Yexus qha ib zaaj lug pevtxwv rua puab has tas: “Ib tug dligmuag yeej coj tsi tau ib tug dligmuag kev le; yog nwg ua le ntawd, obtug yeej yuav moog poob kwj dleg xwb.
Tsi muaj ib tug tub kawm ntawv kws yuav paub tshaaj nwg tug xwbfwb; tabsis txhua tug kws kawm tav lawm, nwg yeej yuav paub ib yaam le nwg tug xwbfwb.
“Vim le caag koj yuav saib qhov nyuas moov ntoo kws nyob huv koj tug kwvtij lub qhovmuag, tabsis koj tub tsi paub has tas muaj ib yaav ntoo nyob huv koj lub qhovmuag?

Ua le caag koj tseem yuav has rua koj tug kwvtij has tas, ‘Ca kuv paab muab qhov nyuas moov ntoo huv koj lub qhovmuag tawm,’ tabsis koj tub tsi pum yaav ntoo kws nyob huv koj lub qhovmuag. Tug tuabneeg ntsejmuag ncaaj sab nkhaus! Koj ca le xub muab yaav ntoo kws nyob huv koj lub qhovmuag tawm tsaiv, koj txhaj yuav pum kev moog muab qhov nyuas moov ntoo kws nyob huv koj tug kwvtij lub qhovmuag.
“Tsob ntoo zoo yeej tsi txi cov txiv phem lossis tsob ntoo phem yeej txi tsi tau cov txiv zoo.

Yog yug pum cov txiv, yug yeej paub has tas, tsob ntoo ntawd yog tsob phem lossis tsob zoo. Yug yeej tsi dle txiv ncuav pas ntawm tsob ntoo xuavpaug paaj ntshaa, hab tsi dle txiv maab ntawm tsob xuavpaug nqai hlau.
Tug tuabneeg sab zoo yeej has tej lug zoo. Tug tuabneeg sab phem yeej has tej lug phem, rua qhov nwg lub sab xaav le caag, nwg lub ncauj has le ntawd.
“Vim le caag mej hu kuv has tas, ‘Tug Tswv, tug Tswv,’ tabsis mej tsua tsi ua lawv le kuv tej lug?
Txhua tug kws lug cuag kuv, noog kuv lug hab ua lawv le kuv qha, kuv yuav qha rua mej paub has tas, tug ntawd zoo le caag?

Tug ntawd zoo ib yaam le tug kws ua tsev, nwg khawb qhov ncej tub tub, muab pobzeb lug pua, maam le muab ncej lug txhus rua. Thaus dlej fuam lug ntaus lub tsev ntawd, lub tsev tsi ua zug, rua qhov nwg ua lub tsev ntawd khov heev lawm.

Tug kws nov kuv tej lug, tabsis tsi ua lawv le, tug ntawd zoo ib yaam le tug kws ua tsev kws khawb qhov ncej tsi tub. thaus dlej fuam lug ntaus lub tsev, lub tsev ntawd txawm qaug hab puamtsuaj taag huv tuabsi lawm.”
Thaus Yexus qha tej ntawd rua suavdlawg noog taag lawm, nwg txawm moog rua peg lub nroog Kapena-us.
Nyob huv lub nroog ntawd, muaj ib tug thawj tubrog pawg pua kws yog tuabneeg Loos, nwg muaj ib tug tubkhai kws nwg hlub heev, tug tubkhai ntawd mob heev tub yuav tuag.
Thaus tug thawj tubrog ntawd nov luas has txug Yexus, nwg txawm khaiv cov Yudais cov txwjlaug qee leej moog thov Yexus tuaj paab khu nwg tug tubkhai.
Puab moog cuag Yexus hab thov taag zug has tas, “Tsimnyog koj moog paab tug thawj tubrog ntawd,
rua qhov nwg hlub peb tsaav tuabneeg, hab nwg ua ib lub tsev saablaaj pub rua peb.”

Yexus txawm nrug puab moog. Thaus Yexus moog yuav laug txug tug thawj tubrog lub tsev, tug thawj tubrog khaiv nwg ob peb tug phoojywg moog cheem Yexus has tas, “Tug Tswv, nyob tsaam taabkaum koj, kuv yog ib tug kws tsi tsimnyog koj yuav moog huv kuv lub tsev,
hab kuv yog ib tug kws tsi tsimnyog tuaj cuag koj. Thov koj has tuab lus xwb, ces kuv tug tubkhai yeej yuav zoo.

Txawm yog kuv los tseem muaj cov thawj kws kaav kuv, hab kuv muaj ib cov tubrog kws kuv kaav. Yog kuv has rua tug nuav has tas, ‘Moog!’ nwg txawm moog. Yog kuv has rua tug tod has tas, ‘Lug!’ nwg txawm lug. Hab yog kuv has rua kuv tug tubkhai has tas, ‘Ua le nuav!’ nwg txawm ua le ntawd.”

Thaus Yexus nov puab has le ntawd, nwg xaav tsi thoob le; nwg tig moog has rua cov tuabneeg coob coob kws lawv nwg qaab has tas, “Kuv qha rua mej has tas, txawm yog huv cov Yixalayees los kuv tsi tau pum ib tug kws muaj kev ntseeg npaum le tug nuav!”
Cov kws tug thawj tubrog khaiv tuaj ntawd rov moog txug tom tug thawj tubrog tsev, ua cav tug tubqhe tub zoo lawm.
Tom qaab ntawd tsi ntev  Yexus moog huv lub nroog Na-is, Yexus cov thwjtim hab ib cov tuabneeg coob coob nrug nwg moog.

Thaus Yexus moog txug ntawm roojvaag kws moog rua huv lub nroog, txawm muaj tuabneeg kwv ib tug tuag tawm tuaj txug ntawd. Tug tuag ntawd yog ib tug puj ntsuag tug tub, tug puj ntsuag ntawd muaj tuab tug tub xwb. Cov tuabneeg coob coob kws nyob huv lub nroog ntawd nrug nwg tuaj.
Thaus tug Tswv pum tug puj ntsuag ntawd, Tug Tswv hlub nwg heev hab has tas, “Koj tsi xob quaj.”
Yexus txawm txaav zog moog tuav nkaus lub hleb, ces cov tuabneeg kws kwv lub hleb txawm nreg. Yexus has tas, “Tug hluas, kuv has rua koj tas, koj ca le sawv tseeg!”
Tug tuag ntawd txawm sawv tseeg nyob quastsawg nrug puab thaam. Yexus coj nwg moog rua nwg nam.

Cov tuabneeg ntawd ntshai kawg le, hab puab qhuas Vaajtswv has tas, “Muaj ib tug cev Vaajtswv lug kws muaj fwjchim heev tub lug rua huv peb cov lawm!” Hab puab has tas, “Vaajtswv tub lug cawm nwg tsaav tuabneeg lawm!”
Zaaj kws Yexus ua nuav nrov nchaa moo lug moog thoob plawg huv lub xeev Yudas hab tej cheebtsaam kws nyob ibncig ntawd.
Yauhaas cov thwjtim qha tej nuav huv tuabsi rua Yauhaas noog.
Yauhaas hu nwg ob tug thwjtim lug hab kuas obtug moog cuag tug Tswv hab has tas, “Koj puas yog tug kws Yauhaas has tas yuav lug lossis peb tseem yuav tog dlua lwm tug?”
Thaus obtug moog txug ntawm Yexus, obtug has tas, “Yauhaas tug kws muab tuabneeg ua kevcai raus dlej kuas wb tuaj nug saib, koj puas yog tug kws yuav lug lossis peb tseem yuav tog dlua lwm tug?”
Lub sijhawm ntawd Yexus khu cov tuabneeg muaj mob ntau leej zoo, nwg ntab dlaab tawm ntawm cov tuabneeg kws raug dlaab, hab nwg khu cov tuabneeg dligmuag ntau leej rov pum kev.

Yexus teb ob tug kws Yauhaas khaiv tuaj has tas, “Meb ca le rov qaab moog qha tej kws meb pum hab meb nov rua Yauhaas has tas: cov tuabneeg dligmuag rov pum kev, cov tuabneeg tuag ceg moog taug kev, cov tuabneeg mob ruas zoo,  cov tuabneeg laag ntseg nov lug, cov tuabneeg kws tuag lawm sawv rov lug, hab tub muaj tuabneeg moog qha Txujmoo Zoo rua cov tuabneeg txomnyem lawm.
Tug kws ntseeg kuv, tug ntawd yuav tau koob moov!”

Thaus ob tug kws Yauhaas khaiv tuaj rov qaab moog lawm, Yexus qha Yauhaas zaaj rua cov tuabneeg coob coob ntawd noog has tas: “Thaus mej moog cuag Yauhaas tom roob mojsaab qhua, mej moog saib dlaabtsi? Mej moog saib tug lojkov kws cua tshuab rawv moog rawv lug los?”
Mej moog saib dlaabtsi? Mej moog saib tug tuabneeg kws naav tej tsoog tsho zoo zoo los? Tsuas yog cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv vaajntxwv lub loog, txhaj tau naav zoo hab tau noj seem noj sos xwb!

Mej qha rua kuv saib, mej moog saib dlaabtsi? Mej moog saib ib tug kws cev Vaajtswv lug los? Yog lawm, tabsis kuv qha rua mej has tas, tug kws mej pum ntawd muaj fwjchim luj dlua ib tug cev Vaajtswv lug.
Rua qhov tug Yauhaas nuav yog tug kws Vaajtswv txujlug tub xub qha tseg lawm: “Vaajtswv has tas, kuv yuav khaiv kuv tug tubkhai ua koj ntej moog khu kev tog koj.”

“Kuv qha rua mej has tas, txhua tug kws yug lug ntawm quaspuj, tsi muaj ib tug muaj fwjchim luj npaum le Yauhaas; tabsis tug kws yau tshaaj Yauhaas sau Vaajtswv lub Tebchaws, tug ntawd tseem muaj fwjchim luj dlua Yauhaas hab.”
Taagnrho cov tuabneeg kws nov Yauhaas qha; tsuas yog cov pejxeem hab cov sau se txhaj ntseeg has tas Vaajtswv yog tug ncaaj nceeg, hab puab thov kuas Yauhaas muab puab ua kevcai raus dlej.
Tabsis cov Falixais hab cov xwbfwb kws qha Vaajtswv txuj Kevcai tsi kaam ua tej kws Vaajtswv kuas puab ua, hab tsi kaam Yauhaas muab puab ua kevcai raus dlej.
Yexus has ntxiv tas, “Kuv yuav muab cov tuabneeg tam nuav pev rua dlaabtsi?” Hab puab zoo le caag?
Puab zoo ib yaam le tej mivnyuas yau kws ua si tom tshaav puam. Paab nuav has rua paab tom has tas, “Peb tub tshuab raaj lawm, tabsis mej tsi seev cev le! Peb quaj nyav, tabsis mej tsi mob sab!
Yauhaas tug kws muab tuabneeg ua kevcai raus dlej, nwg lug, nwg ua kevcai yoo mov, hab nwg tsi haus cawv txiv maab, mej txhaj has tas, ‘Nwg raug dlaab lawm!’
Tuabneeg Leej Tub lug, nwg noj hab haus, mej txhaj has tas, ‘Mej saib, tug tuabneeg nuav! Nwg noj luj hab haus luj, nwg nrug cov tuabneeg sau se hab cov tuabneeg txhum ua phoojywg!’
Txhua tug kws leeg yuav Vaajtswv lub tswvyim, puab teg num yuav ua rua suavdlawg pum has tas, Vaajtswv yog tug kws muaj tswvyim tag.”
Muaj ib tug Falixais hu Yexus moog nrug nwg noj mo, Yexus txawm moog rua huv tug Falixais tsev, hab nyob quastsawg noj mov.
Muaj ib tug quaspuj nyob huv lub nroog ntawd, nwg yog ib tug tuabneeg ua txhum. Nwg nov has tas, Yexus moog noj mov huv tug Falixais tsev, nwg nqaa ib fwj roj tsw qaab
tuaj sawv saab tom qaab ncaaj ntawm Yexus kutaw, nwg quaj kua muag lug ntub Yexus ob txhais kutaw, hab muab nwg cov plaubhau so, nwg nwj Yexus kutaw hab muab cov roj tsw qaab laub ywg Yexus kutaw.

Thaus tug Falixais kws hu Yexus lug noj mov pum le ntawd, nwg xaav has tas, “Yog tug nuav yog ib tug cev Vaajtswv lug tag, nwg yeej yuav paub has tas tug quaspuj kws kov nwg ntawd yog ib tug tuabneeg txhum!”
Yexus has rua tug Falixais ntawd tas, “Ximoos, kuv muaj ib lu lug xaav has rua koj.” Ximoos teb has tas, “Tau los mas Xwbfwb, koj ca le has.”
Yexus txawm has tas, “Muaj ob tug txivneej tshuav ib tug yawm nqe. Ib tug tshuav tsib puas lub nyaj, ib tug tshuav tsib caug lub nyaj.
Obtug puavleej tsi muaj nyaj them tug yawm ntawd, ces tug yawm ntawd txawm zaam nqe rua obtug huv tuabsi. Yog le, ob tug ntawd, tug twg yuav ncu tug yawm ntawd txaj ntsig heev dlua?”
Ximoos teb has tas, “Kuv xaav has tas, yog tug kws tug yawm ntawd zaam nuj nqes ntau dlua rua.” Yexus teb has tas, “Yog le koj has lawm.”

Yexus tig moog saib tug quaspuj ntawd, hab has rua Ximoos has tas, “Koj puas pum tug quaspuj nuav? Kuv tuaj txug huv koj tsev, koj tub tsi muab dlej ntxuav kuv kutaw, tabsis tug quaspuj nuav muab nwg cov kua muag ntxuav kuv kutaw, hab muab nwg cov plaubhau so.
Kuv tuaj, koj tsi nwj kuv, tabsis txij thaus kuv tuaj txug huv koj tsev, tug quaspuj nuav nwj kuv txhais kutaw tsi tseg le.
Koj tub tsi muab roj tsw qaab pleev kuv taubhau, tabsis tug quaspuj nuav muab roj tsw qaab laub ywg kuv ob txhais kutaw.

Kuv qha rua koj has tas, qhov kws tug quaspuj nuav muaj kev hlub luj npaum le nuav, qha has tas Vaajtswv tub zaam nwg tej kev txhum huv tuabsi lawm. Tabsis tug kws Vaajtswv zaam txim tsawg, tug ntawd yeej ncu Vaajtswv txaj ntsig tsawg.”
Yexus has rua tug quaspuj ntawd has tas, “Kuv tub zaam txim rua koj lawm.”
Cov tuabneeg kws nrug Yexus noj mov ntawd, puab xaav has tas, “Tug nuav yog leejtwg, nwg txhaj zaam txim tau?”
Yexus has rua tug quaspuj ntawd has tas, “Koj txujkev ntseeg tub cawm tau koj dlim lawm; koj ca le moog kaaj sab lug.”
Tom qaab ntawd Yexus moog txhua nrho huv tej nroog hab tej zog, Yexus qha Txujmoo Zoo kws has txug Vaajtswv lub Tebchaws. Yexus kaum ob tug thwjtim nrug nwg moog,

hab cov quaspuj qee leej kws yaav taag lug raug dlaab kws Yexus ntab dlaab tawm hab khu puab tej mob zoo lawm. Cov quaspuj ntawd yog Malis (kws hu ua Madalas), nwg yog tug kws yaav taag lug, Yexus ntab xyaa tug dlaab tawm lawm;

Yau-anas kws yog Khuxas tug quaspuj. Khuxas yog tug kws zuv Helauj lub tsev; Xuxaanas, hab muaj dlua ob peb tug quaspuj, puab yog cov kws pheej muab puab tej nyaj hab qhov txhua chaw paab Yexus hab nwg cov thwjtim.
Pheej muaj tuabneeg tuaj huv tej nroog tuaj cuag Yexus tsi tu ncua le. Thaus cov tuabneeg tuaj ua ke coob coob lawm, Yexus has ib zaaj lug pevtxwv rua puab has tas,

“Muaj ib tug txivneej nqaa noob nplej moog tseb, thaus nwg tseb cov noob nplej rua huv dlaim teb, muaj qee lub poob rua huv plawv kev qhov kws tuabneeg tsuj moog tsuj lug, hab noog txawm lug khaws noj lawm.
Muaj qee lub poob rua ntawm qhov aav kws huv muaj pobzeb tiv lawm, thaus lub nplej tuaj kaug, tug kaug ca le qhuav lawm, rua qhov aav tsi noo.
Muaj qee lub poob rua huv qaab tsob xuavpaug, ces tsob xuavpaug hlub tuaj laum tsob nplej tuag taag lawm.
Hab muaj qee lub poob rua ntawm qhov aav zoo. Cov ntawd tuaj zoo hab txhawv taug, ib naab twg txi tau ib puas lub.” Yexus xaus lug has tas, “Yog leejtwg muaj qhovntsej, ca le noog.”
Yexus cov thwjtim nug Yexus saib, zaaj lug pevtxwv kws Yexus has ntawd txhais le caag.

Yexus teb has tas, “Zaaj kws tuabneeg tsi tau paub has txug Vaajtswv lub Tebchaws, kuv tub qha rua mej paub lawm, tabsis dlua le lwm tug, kuv ua lug pevtxwv qha xwb, txawm yog puab saib los puab yuav tsi pum, txawm yog puab noog los puab yuav tsi totaub.
“Zaaj lug pevtxwv nuav txhais has tas: cov noob nplej yog pev txug Vaajtswv txujlug.

Cov noob nplej kws poob rua ntawm txujkev, pev txug Vaajtswv txujlug kws tuabneeg nov, tabsis dlaab Ntxwgnyoog txawm lug txeeb txujlug ntawd tawm huv puab lub sab lawm, kuas puab tsi ntseeg hab tsi tau txujkev cawm dlim.

Cov noob nplej kws poob rua ntawm qhov aav kws huv muaj pobzeb tiv lawm, pev txug Vaajtswv txujlug kws thaus tuabneeg nov dlheev, puab txaus sab hlo txais yuav, tabsis txujlug ntawd cog tsi ruaj rua huv puab lub sab; puab ntseeg ib ntus xwb, thaus puab raug kev sim sab, ces puab ca le thim rov qaab lawm.

Cov noob nplej kws poob rua huv qaab tsob xuavpaug, pev txug Vaajtswv txujlug kws tuabneeg nov; tabsis puab tej kev ntxhuv sab, kev ntshaw nyaj, hab kev lomzem huv nplajteb nuav, hlub tuaj laum Vaajtswv txujlug lawm, puab txujkev ntseeg txhaj tsi luj hlub.

Cov noob nplej kws poob rua ntawm qhov aav zoo, pev txug Vaajtswv txujlug kws tuabneeg nov, puab muaj lub sab mog muas, sab dlawb sab zoo khaws txujlug ntawd ca rua huv puab lub sab, hab ua sab ntev moog txug nub kws txujlug ntawd tawg paaj hab txi txiv.

“Tsi muaj leejtwg taws teeb hab muab phab khwb rua lossis muab txawb rua huv qaab txaag. Tabsis tsuas muaj yuav muab txawb rua sau qhov chaw sab xwb, kuas cov tuabneeg kws tuaj huv tsev txhaj pum kev.
“Tej kws muab zais ca lawm, yeej yuav muaj tuabneeg pum, hab tej kws muab npog ca lawm, yeej yuav muaj tug muab nthuav lug qha rua suavdlawg.

“Yog le ntawd, mej yuavtsum ceevfaaj hab ua tuab zoo noog, rua qhov tug kws muaj lawm, yuav muab ntxiv kuas tug ntawd muaj nplua mag, tabsis tug kws tsi muaj, txawm yog nwg xaav has tas nwg muaj mivntsiv los yuav muab rhu ntawm nwg moog.”
Yexus nam hab Yexus cov kwv yuav tuaj cuag Yexus, tabsis muaj tuabneeg coob coob, puab tsi tau kev moog cuag nwg.
Muaj ib tug lug has rua Yexus has tas, “Koj nam hab koj cov kwv tuaj sawv saab nrau, puab xaav ntsib koj.”
Yexus has rua suavdlawg has tas, “Cov kws nov Vaajtswv txujlug hab ua lawv le txujlug ntawd, txhaj yog kuv nam hab kuv cov kwv.”
Muaj ib nub Yexus hab nwg cov thwjtim nce moog rua huv nkoj, Yexus has rua puab tas, “Peb ca le hlaa havtxwv moog rua saab tim u.” Ces puab txawm moog.

Thaus puab taabtom nkuam nkoj hlaa havtxwv moog, Yexus txawm pw tsaug zug lawm. Taamsim ntawd txawm muaj cua dlaaj cua dlub hlub heev ntsawj dlej ndlaas lug rua huv lub nkoj, puab txhua tug ntshai nyob tsaam lub nkoj tog.

Cov thwjtim moog tsaa Yexus hab has tas, “Tug Tswv, Tug Tswv, peb tub yuav tuag!” Yexus sawv tseeg lug txwv cua hab dlej; Ces cua txawm tu hab dlej havtxwv kws nphau tej nam twv txawm tug tsi ndlaas lawm.

Yexus has rua cov thwjtim has tas, “Mej kev ntseeg dlua twg taag lawm?” Cov thwjtim xaav tsi thoob hab ntshai kawg le, puab sis thaam has tas, “Tug nuav yog leejtwg, nwg yuav txwv tau cua hab dlej, cua hab dlej kuj noog nwg lug hab!”
Yexus hab nwg cov thwjtim caij nkoj moog txug ntawm cheebtsaam Nkelaxas  kws nyob saab Havtxwv Kalilais tim u.
Thaus Yexus tawm lug rua tim ntug, nwg ntsib ib tug txivneej raug dlaab kws nyob huv nroog tuaj. Nwg tsi naav rig tsho hab tsi nyob huv tsev lug ntev lawm, nwg nyob tom roob toj ntxaas xwb.

Thaus nwg pum Yexus, nwg quaj qw txhus caug ndlua ntawm Yexus xubndlag, hab has nrov nrov has tas, “Yexus kws yog Vaajtswv tug muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus tug Tub! Koj tuaj thaab kuv ua dlaabtsi? Kuv thov koj tsi xob tsimtxom kuv!”

Nwg has le ntawd, rua qhov Yexus tub has kuas dlaab ca le tawm ntawm nwg moog. Dlaab nkaag rua huv nwg ntau zag, txawm yog muab saw hlau khi nwg teg nwg taw hab tso tuabneeg zuv los nwg muab ntag tu taag huv tuabsi, hab dlaab yuam nwg moog rua tom roob mojsaab qhua.
Yexus nug nwg has tas, “Koj lub npe hu le caag?” Nwg teb has tas, “Kuv lub npe hu ua Coob.” Rua qhov muaj ntau tug dlaab nyob rua huv nwg.
Cov dlaab ntawd thov Yexus has tas, “Tsi xob ntab peb moog rua huv ntuj tawg.”
Nyob ze ntawd muaj ib paab npua coob coob taabtom nrhav noj ntawm ib ntaa toj. Cov dlaab ntawd thov Yexus has tas, “Ca peb moog rua huv paab npua ntawd.” Ces Yexus txawm ca puab moog.
Dlaab tawm plawg huv tug txivneej ntawd moog nkaag rua huv paab npua. Paab npua ca le dlha moog poob tsaag tsua rua huv havtxwv tuag taag huv tuabsi lawm.
Thaus cov tuabneeg zuv npua pum le ntawd, puab txawm dlha rov qaab moog qha tej ntawd rua cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv tej zog kws nyob ibncig lub nroog ntawd.

Ces suavdlawg txawm tawm tuaj moog saib muaj le caag tag, thaus puab tuaj txug ntawm Yexus, puab pum tug txivneej raug dlaab ntawd, nwg feeb meej lawm, nwg naav rig tsho hab nwg nyob ntawm Yexus kutaw; puab ntshai kawg le.
Cov tuabneeg kws pum tej nuav, puab qha rua suavdlawg paub has tas, ua le caag tug raug dlaab ntawd zoo lawm.
Cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv cheebtsaam Nkelaxas thov kuas Yexus ca le tawm huv cheebtsaam ntawd moog, rua qhov puab ntshai heev. Yog le ntawd, Yexus txawm nce rua huv nkoj hab moog lawm.
Tug txivneej kws Yexus ntab dlaab tawm ntawd, nwg thov Yexus has tas, “Ca kuv nrug koj moog.” Tabsis Yexus kuas nwg rov qaab moog hab has rua nwg tas,
“Koj ca le rov qaab moog tsev, hab qha tej kws Vaajtswv paab koj lawm rua suavdlawg noog.” Tug txivneej ntawd txawm moog thoob plawg lub nroog, hab qha tej kws Yexus paab nwg lawm rua suavdlawg noog.
Thaus Yexus rov lug txug saab ntug havtxwv tim nuav, muaj tuabneeg coob coob tuaj nyob qhov ntawd tog nwg, thaus puab pum nwg puab zoo sab kawg le.

Muaj ib tug txivneej hu ua Yailus,; nwg yog tug kws saib num huv lub tsev saablaaj huv lub nroog ntawd. Thaus nwg tuaj txug, nwg txhus caug ndlua ntawm Yexus kutaw hab thov kuas Yexus moog rua tom nwg lub tsev,
rua qhov nwg tug ntxhais kws muaj noobnyoog kaum ob xyoos, mob heev tub yuav tuag. Thaus Yexus taabtom taug kev moog, muaj tuabneeg coob coob nrug Yexus moog si nphoo quas tshua.

Muaj ib tug quaspuj kws coj khaub dluag tau kaum ob xyoos tsi tu, hab nwg txomnyem kawg le. Nwg muab taagnrho nwg tej nyaj moog ndlav kws tshuaj khu,  tabsis tsi muaj ib tug kws tshuaj khu tau nwg le.
Nwg txiv ntag lug rua tom Yexus nrausqaum, nwg cev teg moog kov Yexus lub tw tsho, taamsim ntawd ntshaav txawm tu nrho lawm.
Yexus nug has tas, “Leejtwg kov kuv?” Tabsis tsi muaj leejtwg leeg le. Petus teb has tas, “Tug Tswv, cov tuabneeg coob coob kws nyob puagncig koj chwv koj xwb.”
Tabsis Yexus has tas, “Yeej muaj ib tug kov kuv xwb, rua qhov kuv paub has tas fwjchim tub tawm ntawm kuv lawm.”

Tug quaspuj ntawd paub has tas Yexus paub lawm. Nwg txawm lug txhus caug ndlua ntawm Yexus kutaw ua ib ce tshee nyo. Nwg qha rua Yexus taabmeeg suavdlawg has tas, vim le caag nwg kov Yexus lub tw tsho, hab yog le caag, nwg tug mob txhaj zoo lawm.
Yexus has rua nwg tas, “Mivntxhais, koj tug mob zoo lawm, tub yog vim koj ntseeg. Koj ca le moog kaaj sab lug.”
Thaus Yexus taabtom has le ntawd, muaj ib tug tuaj tom Yailus tsev tuaj qha rua Yailus has tas, “Koj tug ntxhais tub tuag lawm, koj tsi xob taabkaum Xwbfwb ntxiv lawm.”
Thaus Yexus nov le ntawd, Yexus has rua Yailus has tas, “Koj tsi xob ntshai; ca le ntseeg, koj tug ntxhais yeej yuav caj.”
Thaus Yexus moog txug huv Yailus tsev lawm, nwg tsi pub leejtwg nrug nwg moog rua huv txaaj, tsuas pub Petus, Yauhaas hab Yakaunpaus, hab tug ntxhais nam hab txiv nrug nwg moog xwb.
Cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv tsev, quaj nyav tug ntxhais ntawd ntsoog qeeg. Yexus has rua puab has tas, “Mej tsi xob quaj quaj; tug mivntxhais nuav tsi tuag, nwg pw tsaug zug xwb!”
Cov tuabneeg ntawd luag Yexus zum zawg, rua qhov puab yeej paub has tas, tug ntxhais ntawd tuag lawm tag.
Tabsis Yexus moog tuav nkaus tug ntxhais ntawd teg hab has tas, “Mivntxhais, koj ca le sawv!”
Tug ntxhais ntawd txawm rov muaj sa hab sawv tseeg taamsim ntawd. Yexus kuas puab muab mov lug rua tug ntxhais noj.
Tug ntxhais ntawd nam hab txiv xaav tsi thoob le, tabsis Yexus txwv tsi pub obtug qha tej nuav rua leejtwg.
Yexus hu nwg kaum ob tug thwjtim lug, nwg pub fwjchim rua puab ntab tau dlaab hab khu tau mob zoo.
Tom qaab ntawd, nwg khaiv puab moog qha zaaj kws has txug Vaajtswv lub Tebchaws hab khu tej tuabneeg kws muaj mob.
Yexus has rua puab tas, “Thaus mej moog, mej tsi xob nqaa ib yaam dlaabtsi moog, txawm yog tug paas nreg, naab thoobpuab, zaub mov, nyaj hab rig tsho hloov los tsi xob nqaa le.
Yog yim twg zoo sab hu mej moog huv puab tsev, mej ca le moog su huv yim ntawd moog txug nub kws mej tawm huv lub nroog ntawd moog;

yog mej moog txug qhov twg, yog tsi muaj leejtwg hu mej moog su huv puab tej tsev, mej ca le tawm huv lub nroog ntawd moog, hab nchus tej moov aav kws lu mej kutaw, mej ua le ntawd kuas puab paub has tas, puab muaj txim.”
Cov thwjtim txawm moog rua txhua lub zog, puab qha Txujmoo Zoo hab khu tej tuabneeg muaj mob kws nyob txhua qhov zoo huv tuabsi.

Helauj tug kws ua nom kaav lub xeev Kalilais, thaus nwg nov tej kws Yexus ua ntawd, nwg ntxhuv sab heev; rua qhov muaj tuabneeg has tas, Yauhaas tug kws muab tuabneeg ua kevcai raus dlej sawv huv qhov tuag rov qaab lug lawm,
Muaj qee leej has tas, yog Eliyas rov qaab lug tshwm rua suavdlawg pum, hab muaj qee leej has tas, yog ib tug cev Vaajtswv lug txheej thaus sawv rov qaab lug.
Helauj has tas, “Kuv tub muab Yauhaas txav cejdlaab lawm; tug kws kuv nov moo nuav tsua yog leejtwg?” Helauj hajyam xaav pum Yexus heev.
Thaus cov timthawj rov qaab lug, puab qha txhua yaam kws puab moog ua lawm rua Yexus noog. Yexus coj puab moog rua tim ib lub nroog hu ua Npexaidas.

Thaus cov tuabneeg nov has tas Yexus hab nwg cov thwjtim moog rua tid lawm. Puab txawm lawv Yexus qaab moog. Yexus zoo sab tog txais puab txhua tug, hab qha zaaj kws has txug Vaajtswv lub Tebchaws rua puab, hab nwg khu txhua tug kws muaj mob zoo huv tuabsi.

Thaus nub yuav poob qho, kaum ob tug thwjtim lug has rua Yexus has tas, “Koj ca le kuas suavdlawg moog nrhav zaub mov noj, hab chaw pw huv tej zog hab tej teb kws nyob ibncig ze ntawm nuav, rua qhov ntawm nuav nyob dleb nroog.”

Tabsis Yexus has rua cov thwjtim has tas, “Mej ca le nrhav rua puab noj.” Cov thwjtim teb has tas, “Peb tsuas muaj tsib lub ncuav hab ob tug ntseg xwb. Koj xaav kuas peb moog yuav mov lug rua suavdlawg noj los?”
(Cov txivneej kws nyob ntawd muaj kwvlaam le tsib txheeb leej.) Yexus has rua nwg cov thwjtim has tas, “Mej kuas suavdlawg lug nyob ua tej paab, ib paab twg tsib caug leej.”
Cov thwjtim kuas suavdlawg nyob lawv le Yexus has.
Yexus muab tsib lub ncuav hab ob tug ntseg lug, nwg tsaa qhovmuag saib sau ntuj, hab ua Vaajtswv tsaug, nwg muab cov ncuav hab ob tug ntseg ndlais cev rua cov thwjtim nqaa moog faib rua suavdlawg.
Txhua tug puavleej tau noj tsau huv tuabsi. Cov thwjtim moog sau tej kws suavdlawg noj tsi taag tau kaum ob tawb.
Muaj ib zag thaus Yexus tuab leeg taabtom thov Vaajtswv, nwg cov thwjtim lug cuag nwg. Yexus nug puab has tas, “Tej tuabneeg suavdlawg has tas kuv yog leejtwg?”

Cov thwjtim teb has tas, “Muaj qee leej has tas koj yog Yauhaas tug kws muab tuabneeg ua kevcai raus dlej; muaj qee leej has tas koj yog Eliyas, hab muaj qee leej has tas koj yog ib tug ntawm cov cev Vaajtswv lug txheej thaus sawv rov qaab lug.”
Yexus nug cov thwjtim has tas, “Mej ne, mej tsua has tas kuv yog leejtwg?” Petus teb has tas, “Koj yog tug Mexiyas kws Vaajtswv khaiv lug.”
Yexus txwv cov thwjtim tawv tawv has tas, “Mej tsi xob qha zaaj nuav rua leejtwg le.”

hab nwg has ntxiv rua puab tas, “Tuabneeg Leej Tub yuav raug kev tsimtxom ntau yaam, hab cov txwjlaug, cov thawj ntawm cov povthawj hab cov xwbfwb kws qha Vaajtswv txuj Kevcai, yuav tsi leeg yuav nwg. Puab yuav muab nwg tua povtseg, tabsis tom qaab ntawd peb nub nwg yuav sawv huv qhov tuag rov qaab lug.”
Hab Yexus has rua puab tas, “Yog leejtwg xaav nrug kuv moog, tug ntawd yuavtsum tswj nwg lub sab, hab naj nub kwv nwg tug ntoo khaublig nrug kuv moog.
Rua qhov tug kws khauvxwm nwg txujsa, tug ntawd yuav tsi tau txujsa, tabsis tug kws tsi khauvxwm nwg txujsa, vim nwg ntseeg kuv, tug ntawd yuav tau txujsa.
Yog leejtwg tau ib puas tsaav yaam huv nplajteb nuav lug ua nwg tug, tabsis nwg txujsa tu lawm, tej ntawd yuav muaj nqes dlaabtsi rua nwg!

Yog leejtwg txaajmuag qha kuv lub npe hab kuv tej lug, thaus Tuabneeg Leej Tub tug kws muaj leej Txiv tug tshwjchim kws ci ntsaa ab nrug cov timtswv dlawbhuv lug sau ntuj lug, kuv yuav txaajmuag leeg has tas, tug ntawd yog kuv le.
Kuv qha tseeb rua mej has tas, cov tuabneeg kws nyob ntawm nuav, muaj qee leej yuav tsi tau tuag ua ntej puab pum Vaajtswv lub Tebchaws.”
Yim nub tom qaab kws Yexus qha tej ntawd taag, Yexus coj Petus, Yauhaas hab Yakaunpaus nrug nwg moog thov Vaajtswv peg roob.
Thaus Yexus taabtom thov Vaajtswv, Yexus lub ntsejmuag txawm hloov hlo, hab nwg cev rig tsho ci ntsaa ab dlawb paug.
Taamsim ntawd muaj ob tug txivneej lug nrug Yexus thaam. Ob tug ntawd yog Mauxes hab Eliyas.
Obtug muaj tshwjchim ci ntsaa ab hab obtug nrug Yexus thaam txug teg num kws Vaajtswv kuas Yexus ua, hab yuav tav rua thaus Yexus tuag rua huv lub nroog Yeluxalees.
Petus hab Petus ob tug phoojywg tsaug zug heev, tabsis puab tsim dlheev lug, puab pum Yexus tug tshwjchim ci ntsaa ab hab muaj obtug txivneej nrug Yexus sawv ntawd.

Thaus ob tug txivneej ntawd ncaim Yexus moog lawm, Petus has rua Yexus has tas, “Tug Tswv, peb tuaj nyob ntawm nuav zoo kawg le! Peb yuav ua peb lub tsev pheebsuab, ib lub rua koj, ib lub rua Mauxes, hab ib lub rua Eliyas.” (Petus tsi paub sov ua le caag Petus has le ntawd.)
Thaus Petus tseem taabtom has le ntawd, txawm muaj ib tauv fuab lug roog puab, cov thwjtim ntshai kawg le.
Hab muaj ib lub suab has huv tauv fuab tuaj has tas, “Tug nuav yog kuv tug Tub kws kuv xaiv ca lawm, mej yuavtsum noog nwg lug!”
Thaus lub suab ntawd has xaus lawm, puab pum Yexus tuab leeg nyob ntawd xwb. Peb tug thwjtim npog tej kws puab pum ntawd, tsi qha rua leejtwg paub le.
Nub tom qaab thaus Yexus hab nwg peb tug thwjtim nqeg peg roob lug, muaj tuabneeg coob coob tuaj cuag Yexus.
Muaj ib tug txivneej huv paab tuabneeg ntawd hu Yexus nrov nrov has tas, “Xwbfwb! Kuv thov koj paab kuv tug tub, kuv muaj tuab tug tub nuav xwb!
Nwg raug dlaab. Thaus dlaab nkaag rua huv nwg, taamsim ntawd nwg qw nrov nrov hab fuam ib thaaj, ua rua nwg npuag ncauj tawm plawg. Dlaab pheej tsimtxom nwg hab tsi kaam tawm huv kuv tug tub moog le!
Kuv thov koj cov thwjtim ntab dlaab tawm, tabsis puab ntab tsi tau.”

Yexus teb has tas, “Cov tuabneeg tsi ntseeg hab tsi ncaaj! Kuv tseem yuav nrug mej nyob ntev le caag? Hab kuv yuav ua sab ntev rua mej moog txug thaus twg?” Yexus has rua tug txivneej ntawd has tas, “Ca le coj koj tug tub lug ntawm nuav.”

Thaus tug mivtub taabtom lug, dlaab ua rua nwg qaug kag rua huv aav, nwg fuam ib thaaj ib thaaj hab nti moog nti lug. Yexus txawm ntab kuas dlaab tawm, Yexus khu tug tub ntawd, hab muab nwg rov rua nwg txiv.

Cov tuabneeg kws pum Vaajtswv lub fwjchim kws luj kawg nkaus ntawd, puab xaav tsi thoob le. Thaus suavdlawg tseem pheej xaav tsi thoob rua txhua yaam kws Yexus ua ntawd, Yexus has rua nwg cov thwjtim has tas,
“Mej yuavtsum ncu ntsoov tej kws kuv qha rua mej nuav! Luas yuav nteg Tuabneeg Leej Tub coj moog rua tuabneeg tsimtxom.”
Tabsis cov thwjtim tsi totaub lub ntsab lug kws Yexus has ntawd le. Yexus tsi qha lub ntsab lug rua puab, puab txhaj tsi paub, hab puab ntshai nug Yexus txug zaaj ntawd.
Cov thwjtim sis caav has tas, leejtwg yuav tau ua tug luj dlua ndlais?
Yexus paub tej kws puab xaav ntawd, nwg txawm coj ib tug mivnyuas yau lug sawv ntawm nwg ib saab,

hab nwg has rua puab tas, “Tug kws leeg yuav tug mivnyuas yau nuav lug ntawm kuv lub npe, kuj yog nwg leeg yuav kuv; hab tug kws leeg yuav kuv, yog nwg leeg yuav tug kws khaiv kuv lug. Rua qhov tug kws yau dlua ndlais huv mej cov, tug ntawd txhaj yog tug kws luj dlua ndlais.”
Yauhaas has tas, “Tug Tswv, peb pum ib tug txivneej tuav koj lub npe ntab dlaab. Peb txwv tsi pub nwg ua le ntawd rua qhov nwg tsi yog peb paab.”
Yexus has rua Yauhaas hab cov thwjtim has tas, “Mej tsi xob txwv nwg, rua qhov tug kws tsi tawmtsaam mej, tug ntawd yog mej paab.”
Thaus ze lub sijhawm kws Vaajtswv yuav coj Yexus moog sau ntuj ceebtsheej, Yexus txav txim sab moog nraag lub nroog Yeluxalees.
Yexus khaiv ib cov tuabneeg ua nwg ntej moog, puab moog rua huv cov Xamalis ib lub zog, hab moog npaaj txhua yaam tog Yexus.
Tabsis cov tuabneeg Xamalis tsi pub Yexus moog rua huv puab lub zog, rua qhov puab paub has tas Yexus yuav moog nraag lub nroog Yeluxalees.

Thaus Yakaunpaus hab Yauhaas kws yog Yexus ob tug thwjtim nov le ntawd, obtug has rua Yexus has tas, “Tug Tswv, koj puas kheev wb hu suavtawg poob sau ntuj lug hlawv cov tuabneeg ntawd kuas puamtsuaj?”
Yexus tig hlo moog tshev obtug.
Ces Yexus hab cov thwjtim tawm moog dlua lwm lub zog lawm.
Thaus puab taabtom taug kev moog, muaj ib tug txivneej has rua Yexus has tas, “Kuv yuav nrug koj moog. Txawm yog koj moog qhov twg los kuv yuav nrug koj moog.”
Yexus teb tug ntawd has tas, “Txawm yog maa los muaj qhov nkaum, hab noog los muaj zeg, tabsis Tuabneeg Leej Tub tsi muaj chaw pw.”
Yexus has rua lwm tug txivneej has tas, “Koj ca le nrug kuv moog.” Tabsis tug ntawd teb has tas, “Tug Tswv, thov ca kuv moog log kuv txiv tsaiv, kuv maam le nrug koj moog.”
Yexus teb has tas, “Ca cov tuabneeg tuag log puab tug tuag. Koj ca le moog qha zaaj kws has txug Vaajtswv lub Tebchaws.”
Muaj dlua ib tug txivneej has tas, “Tug Tswv, kuv yuav nrug koj moog; tabsis ca kuv moog has rua kuv tsev tuabneeg paub tsaiv.”
Yexus has rua tug ntawd tas, “Yog leejtwg taabtom tuav khais laij lag, tabsis nwg pheej tig saib rov tom qaab, tug ntawd tsi tsimnyog rua Vaajtswv lub Tebchaws.”
Tom qaab ntawd tug Tswv xaiv dlua xyaa caum ob  leeg, hab khaiv puab ob leeg moog ib qho, ua Yexus ntej moog rua txhua lub nroog hab txhua lub zog kws Yexus yuav moog.

Yexus has rua puab tas, “Cov nplej kws zoo hlais lawm muaj ntau, tabsis cov tuabneeg kws hlais muaj tsawg. Mej ca le thov tug tswv teb kuas nwg khaiv dlua ib cov tuabneeg moog paab hlais nwg cov nplej.
Mej ca le moog! Kuv khaiv mej moog ib yaam le paab yaaj kws yuav moog rua huv paab maa.
Mej tsi xob nqaa naab nyaj lossis naab thoobpuab lossis khau; Yog mej ntsib leejtwg ntawm kev, mej tsi xob nrug tug ntawd thaam.
Thaus mej moog rua huv leejtwg tsev, mej yuavtsum xub has tas, ‘Thov Vaajtswv foom koob moov rua mej.’

Yog tsev tuabneeg ntawd muaj ib tug xaav tau Vaajtswv txuj koob moov, ces tug ntawd yuav tau lawv le kws mej has. Tabsis yog tsi muaj tug kws xaav tau Vaajtswv txuj koob moov, ces lu lug koob moov ntawd yuav rov lug rua ntawm mej.

Mej ca le nyob huv lub tsev ntawd, puab pub rua mej noj hab haus le caag, Mej ca le noj hab haus le ntawd. Rua qhov yeej tsimnyog tug kws ua num tau nqe zug. Tsi xob tawm huv lub tsev ntawd moog pw dlua lwm lub tsev.
Thaus mej moog txug lub nroog twg, yog cov tuabneeg ntawd pub mej su, tej zaub mov kws puab ua rua mej noj, mej ca le noj,
mej ca le khu tej tuabneeg kws muaj mob huv lub nroog ntawd, hab qha rua puab paub has tas, ‘Vaajtswv lub Tebchaws tub lug ze mej lawm.’
Tabsis thaus mej moog txug huv lub nroog twg, yog cov tuabneeg ntawd tsi pub mej su, mej ca le moog rua tom tej kev hab qha has tas,

‘Txawm yog tej nyuas plauv aav huv mej lub nroog kws lu peb kutaw los peb yuav so huv tuabsi, kuas mej paub has tas mej yuav raug kev puamtsuaj. Tabsis kuas mej ncu ntsoov has tas Vaajtswv lub Tebchaws tub lug ze mej lawm!’
Kuv has tseeb rua mej has tas, Nub kws Vaajtswv Txav Txim, nwg yuav rau txim rua lub nroog ntawd nyaav dlua le nwg rau txim rua lub nroog Xaudoos!

“Lub nroog Khaulaxis, koj yuav raug kev puamtsuaj! lub nroog Npexaidas, koj yuav raug kev puamtsuaj! Tej txujci tseemceeb kws luas tub ua rua meb pum lawm, yog ua tej ntawd rua huv lub nroog Tiles hab lub nroog Xidoos, ces cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv ob lub nroog ntawd, tub xub muab naab tsaaj lug npua, nyob huv qhov tshauv hab tsuab tshauv lug nphoo rua ib ce ntxuv lug lawm. Puab ua le ntawd, kuas suavdlawg paub has tas, puab tub tso puab tej kev txhum tseg lawm!
Nub kws Vaajtswv txav txim, nwg yuav rau txim rua meb nyaav dlua le kws nwg rau txim rua lub nroog Tiles hab lub nroog Xidoos.
Lub nroog Kapena-us, koj yuav tsaav koj lub fwjchim kuas moog txij ntuj los? Kuv yuav muab koj pov moog rua huv ntuj tawg!”

Yexus has rua nwg cov thwjtim has tas, “Tug kws noog mej lug, tug ntawd yeej noog kuv lug. Tug kws tsi leeg paub mej, tug ntawd yeej tsi leeg paub kuv; hab tug kws tsi leeg paub kuv, tug ntawd yeej tsi leeg paub tug kws khaiv kuv lug.”
Thaus xyaa caum ob leeg  thwjtim rov qaab lug, puab zoo sab kawg le. Puab has rua Yexus has tas, “Tug Tswv, thaus peb tuav koj lub npe ntab dlaab, dlaab kuj noog peb lug hab!”
Yexus teb puab has tas, “Kuv pum dlaab Ntxwgnyoog poob sau ntuj lug ib yaam le tsaglig xub laim.
Mej ua tuab zoo noog! Kuv tub pub fwjchim rua mej lawm, mej yuav tsuj tau naab hab raubris teb, hab mej yuav muaj fwjchim kovyeej dlaab Ntxwgnyoog, hab yuav tsi muaj dlaabtsi ua rua mej raug mob.
Tabsis mej tsi xob zoo sab rua qhov kws dlaab noog mej lug ntawd; mej ca le zoo sab rua qhov kws Vaajtswv tub sau mej lub npe ca rua sau ntuj ceebtsheej lawm.”

Thaus ntawd Vaaj Ntsujplig tug Dlawbhuv  ua rua Yexus zoo sab kawg le, Yexus has tas, “Kuv Txiv, koj yog tug kws kaav lub ntuj hab lub nplajteb nuav! Kuv ua koj tsaug, rua qhov koj tub muab tej nuav zais ca tsi qha rua cov tuabneeg kws muaj tswvyim hab txawj ntse paub, tabsis koj qha tej ntawd rua cov tuabneeg kws tsi txawj tsi ntse paub xwb. Txiv, koj yeej pum zoo ua le ntawd.

“Kuv Txiv tub muab ib puas tsaav yaam rua kuv lawm. Tsi muaj leejtwg paub leej Tub, tsuas yog leej Txiv txhaj paub xwb, hab tsi muaj leejtwg paub leej Txiv, tsuas yog leej Tub txhaj paub xwb, tsuas yog leej Tub hab cov kws leej Tub pum zoo qha rua txhaj paub xwb.”
Yexus txawm tig moog has tuabywv rua cov thwjtim has tas, “Tej kws mej pum nuav, yog mej muaj moo kawg, mej txhaj pum!
Kuv qha rua mej has tas, ‘Cov kws cev Vaajtswv lug hab cov vaajntxwv ntau leej xaav pum tej kws mej pum, tabsis puab tsi pum, puab xaav nov tej kws mej nov, tabsis puab tsi tau nov.’ ”

Muaj ib tug xwbfwb qha Vaajtswv txuj Kevcai tuaj nrug Yexus thaam, hab sim saib Yexus yuav teb le caag. Nwg nug Yexus has tas, “Xwbfwb, kuv yuav ua le caag, kuv txhaj tau txujsa ntev dlhawv moog ibtxhis tsi kawg?”
Yexus teb nwg has tas, “Vaajtswv Txujlug qha le caag? Tej kws koj nyeem ntawd koj totaub le caag?”

Tug txivneej ntawd teb has tas, “Hlub tug Tswv kws yog koj tug Vaajtswv kuas kawg sab kawg ntsws, kawg plaab kawg plawv, hab kawg tug dlaag tug zug. ‘Hab hlub koj tej kwvtij zej zog ib yaam le yug hlub yug lub cev.’ ”
Yexus teb has tas, “Yog le koj has lawm; koj ca le ua le ntawd, koj txhaj yuav tau txujsa.”
Tabsis tug xwbfwb kws qha Vaajtswv Kevcai khaav has tas, nwg yog tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg, nwg txhaj nug Yexus has tas, “Tug twg txhaj yog kuv tej kwvtij zej zog?”

Yexus teb has tas, “Muaj ib tug txivneej taug kev ntawm lub nroog Yeluxalees moog rua nraag lub nroog Yelikaus, thaus nwg moog txug ib tog kev, txawm muaj ib paab tubsaab muab nwg tej rig tsho lwg taag, hab muab nwg ntaus yuav laug tuag tso rua ntawm kev.
Ces muaj ib tug povthawj taug txujkev ntawd tuaj, thaus nwg pum tug ntawd, nwg txawm tshuv kev dlub muag txig moog lawm.
Tom qaab ntawd muaj ib tug Levis taug kev tuaj txug ntawd hab, nwg moog saib tug ntawd ib muag, nwg txawm tshuv kev dlub muag txig moog lawm hab.
Tabsis muaj ib tug tuabneeg Xamalis taug kev tuaj txug ntawd, thaus nwg pum tug kws tubsaab ntaus, nwg hlub tug ntawd heev.

Nwg txaav zog moog saib, nwg muab roj hab muab cawv txiv maab laub rua tug mob ntawd tej qhov txhaab hab muab ntaub qhwv; nwg tsaws tug mob ntawd caij nwg tug neeg luav, nwg coj tug mob moog pw tom ib lub tsev su, hab tu tug mob ntawd.

Thaus kaaj ntug tug tuabneeg Xamalis muab tau ob lub nyaj rua tug tswv tsev ntawd hab has tas, ‘Thov koj paab tu tug tuabneeg mob nuav, yog koj siv tshaaj ob lub nyaj nuav, thaus kuv rov qaab lug, kuv maam le ntxiv rua koj.’ ”
Yexus nug has tas, “Koj sim xaav saib, peb tug nuav, tug twg yog tug kws tubsaab ntaus ntawd tug kwvtij?”
Tug xwbfwb kws qha Vaajtswv txuj Kevcai teb has tas, “Tub yog tug kws hlub tug kws tubsaab ntaus ntawd ntaag.” Yexus has rua nwg tas, “Koj ca le moog ua ib yaam le ntawd.”
Thaus Yexus hab nwg cov thwjtim moog txug huv ib lub zog, muaj ib tug quaspuj hu ua Mathas, txawm hu Yexus moog su huv nwg tsev.
Mathas muaj ib tug nam hluas hu ua Malis, Malis lug nyob ntawm Yexus kutaw hab noog Yexus qha.

Mathas ntxhuv sab rua tej num ntau kws nwg kov tsi yeej, nwg lug has rua Yexus has tas, “Tug Tswv, koj tsi paub has tas kuv tug nam hluas ca kuv tuab leeg ua num xwb los? koj has kuas nwg ca le lug paab kuv ua num!”
Tug Tswv teb has tas, “Mathas, Mathas! Koj txhawj hab ntxhuv sab rua ntau yaam num kawg le,
tabsis tsuas muaj ib yaam zoo xwb. Malis tub xaiv yaam zoo ntawd lawm, tsi muaj leejtwg yuav txeeb tau yaam kws nwg muaj ntawd moog le.”

Muaj ib zag Yexus moog thov Vaajtswv ntawm ib qhov chaw. Thaus nwg thov Vaajtswv taag lawm, nwg ib tug thwjtim lug has rua nwg tas, “Tug Tswv, thov koj qha kuas peb paub thov Vaajtswv ib yaam le Yauhaas qha nwg cov thwjtim lawm.”
Yexus has rua nwg cov thwjtim has tas, “Thaus mej thov Vaajtswv, mej has le nuav: Leej Txiv: ‘Thov kuas suavdlawg fwm koj lub npe; thov koj lug kaav tuabneeg lub sab.
Thov koj naj nub pub mov rua peb noj.
