Thov koj zaam txim rua peb, rua qhov peb tub zaam txim rua txhua tug kws ua txhum rua peb lawm. Thov tsi xob ca tej kev sim sab ntxag tau peb.’ ”
Hab Yexus has rua nwg cov thwjtim has tas, “Thaus ib taag mo, yog mej cov muaj ib tug moog rua tom nwg tug phoojywg tsev hab thov has tas, ‘Phoojywg, thov txais koj peb lub ncuav rua kuv.
Rua qhov kuv tug phoojywg dlua kev tuaj su huv kuv tsev, kuv tsi muaj mov rua nwg noj!’
Yog tug phoojywg kws nyob huv tsev teb has tas, ‘Tsi xob tuaj txob kuv! Kuv tub laag qhovrooj, kuv hab kuv cov mivnyuas tub pw taag lawm. Kuv yuav tsi sawv moog muab mov rua koj.’

Yog le ntawd, kuv qha rua mej has tas, txawm yog obtug yog phoojywg zoo npaum le caag los nwg yuav tsi sawv moog muab mov rua nwg tug phoojywg, tabsis vim qhov kws nwg tug phoojywg pheej thov tsi paub txaajmuag le. Nwg yuav tau moog muab tej kws nwg tug phoojywg xaav tau rua tug phoojywg.
Yog le ntawd, kuv qha rua mej has tas: Mej thov, mej txhaj yuav tau; mej nrhav, mej txhaj yuav ntsib; hab mej khob, luas txhaj yuav qheb qhovrooj rua mej.
Rua qhov txhua tug kws thov, yeej yuav tau, txhua tug kws nrhav yeej yuav ntsib, hab txhua tug kws khob, luas yeej yuav qheb qhovrooj rua nwg.
Mej cov kws yog leej txiv, yog mej tej mivnyuas thov ntseg, mej yuav muab naab rua los?
Lossis mej tej mivnyuas thov qai, mej yuav muab raubris teb rua los?

Txawm yog mej yog tuabneeg txhum los mej tseem paub muab yaam zoo rua mej tej mivnyuas. Yog le ntawd, mej leej Txiv tug kws nyob sau ntuj ceebtsheej, nwg yimfuab yuav muab Vaaj Ntsujplig tug Dlawbhuv rua txhua tug kws thov nwg!”
Yexus ntab tug dlaab kws ua rua ib tug txivneej has tsi tau lug tawm lawm; tug txivneej ntawd txawm rov has tau lug. Cov tuabneeg coob coob kws nyob ntawd xaav tsi thoob le.
Tabsis muaj qee leej xaav has tas, “Yog Npexenpus kws yog dlaab tug thawj pub fwjchim rua nwg, nwg txhaj ntab tau dlaab.”
Muaj qee leej xaav sim Yexus, puab txawm kuas Yexus ua ib yaam txujci tseemceeb rua suavdlawg saib has tas, nwg yog tug kws Vaajtswv khaiv lug.

Yexus tub paub tej kws puab xaav, hab nwg has rua puab tas, “Yog ib lub tebchaws twg tawg ua ob peb paab, hab cov tuabneeg ntawd sis ntaus sis tua, ces lub tebchaws ntawd yuav puamtsuaj moog; hab tsev tuabneeg twg kws tsi sis hum, ces tsev tuabneeg ntawd yeej yuav tawg taag moog.
Yog cov tuabneeg kws dlaab Ntxwgnyoog kaav sis ntau sis tua, puab yuav nyob taug ua ke ntev le caag? Mej has tas yog Npexenpus pub fwjchim rua kuv, kuv txhaj ntab tau dlaab.
Yog le ntawd, leejtwg pub fwjchim rua mej cov tuabneeg kws ntab tau dlaab, ntab dlaab? Mej cov tuabneeg kws ntab tau dlaab, yog cov kws yuav txav txim rua mej!
Tsi yog le kws mej has, tabsis yog kuv muaj Vaajtswv lub fwjchim, kuv txhaj ntab tau dlaab, qhov ntawd qha rua mej paub has tas, Vaajtswv lub Tebchaws tub lug txug mej lawm.
“Yog muaj ib tug txivneej kws muaj zug heev, nwg npaaj ntaaj hab rag khov kho zuv nwg lub tsev, yeej tsi muaj leejtwg yuav moog nyag tau nwg tej qhov txhua chaw.

Tabsis yog muaj ib tug kws muaj zug heev dlua nwg, ntaus yeej nwg, hab txeeb tau nwg tej ntaaj tej rag kws nwg ca sab rua, nqaa moog taag huv tuabsi, hab tej kws nwg fuab tau, nwg yuav coj moog sis faib.
“Tug kws tsi tuaj kuv tog, tug ntawd yeej tawmtsaam kuv; tug kws tsi koom nrug kuv, tug ntawd ua kuas tawg paab tawg pawg xwb.

“Thaus dlaab tawm huv ib tug tuabneeg lub cev moog lawm, tug dlaab ntawd txawm moog rua tom roob mojsaab qhua, hab yog nwg nrhav tsi tau chaw su, nwg yuav has tas, ‘Kuv yuav rov qaab moog rua tom kuv lub qub tse kws kuv tawm tuaj.’
Thaus nwg rov qaab lug txug nwg lub qub tse, ua cav tub tu dlu lug ca lawm.
Tug dlaab ntawd txawm moog coj dlua xyaa tug dlaab kws nyaum dlua nwg lug nrug nwg nyob huv lub tsev ntawd. Thaus kawg tug tuabneeg ntawd hajyam txomnyem dlua thaus chivthawj.”
Thaus Yexus has le ntawd taag, muaj ib tug quaspuj has nrov nrov huv paab tuabneeg coob coob ntawd tuaj has tas, “Tug quaspuj kws yug koj hab pub mig rua koj noj, yog tug kws tau koob moov!”
Tabsis Yexus teb has tas, “Tsi yog le ntawd, cov tuabneeg kws nov Vaajtswv txujlug hab ua lawv le txujlug ntawd, txhaj yog cov kws tau koob moov!”

Thaus cov tuabneeg coob coob tuaj sawv puagncig Yexus, Yexus has rua puab tas, “Cov tuabneeg tam nuav ua phem ua qas kawg le! Puab thov kuas kuv ua ib yaam txujci tseemceeb, tabsis kuv yuav tsi ua rua puab pum. Zaaj txujci tseemceeb kws puab yuav pum tsuas yog Yaunas zaaj xwb.
Yaunas zaaj ua ib lub cim rua cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Nineves pum le caag, Tuabneeg Leej Tub yuav ua lub cim rua cov tuabneeg tam nuav ib yaam le ntawd.

Nub kws Vaajtswv Txav Txim, tug puj Vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws Senpas yuav sawv qha cov tuabneeg tam nuav tej kev txhum rua puab. Rua qhov nwg taug kev nraag nwg lub tebchaws tuaj noog Vaajntxwv Xalumoos pav nwg tej kev txawj ntse. Kuv qha rua mej has tas, muaj ib tug nyob ntawm nuav tseem muaj fwjchim luj dlua Xalumoos hab.

Nub kws Vaajtswv Txav Txim, cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Nineves yuav sawv qha mej tej kev txhum rua mej, rua qhov thaus puab nov Yaunas qha, puab tso puab tej kev txhum tseg. Kuv qha rua mej has tas, muaj ib tug nyob ntawm nuav, nwg tseem muaj fwjchim luj dlua Yaunas hab!
“Tsi muaj leejtwg taws teeb hab muab phab khwb rua;  tsuas muaj yuav muab txawb rua qhov chaw sab xwb, kuas cov tuabneeg kws tuaj huv tsev txhaj pum kev.

Koj lub qhovmuag yog lub teeb kws ci rua koj lub cev pum kev. Yog koj lub qhovmuag pum kev tseeb, koj lub cev yeej yuav kaaj nrig. Tabsis yog koj lub qhovmuag pum kev tsi tseeb, taagnrho koj lub cev yeej yuav tsaus ntuj nti.
Koj yuavtsum ceevfaaj zoo, tsi xob pub qhov pum kev kws koj muaj tsaus.
Yog koj lub cev kaaj nrig txhua qhov, tsi muaj ib qho tsaus, koj yuav ci ntsaa ab thoob plawg, ib yaam le muaj dluab teeb ci tuaj rua koj.”
Thaus Yexus qha taag, muaj ib tug Falixais hu Yexus moog nrug nwg noj mov; Yexus txawm moog huv nwg tsev, hab nyob quastsawg ntawm rooj mov.
Thaus tug Falixais pum has tas, Yexus tsi ntxuav teg lawv le kevcai tsaiv maam le noj, nwg xaav tsi thoob le.
Tug Tswv has rua nwg tas, “Mej cov Falixais ibtxwm ntxuav khob ntxuav phaaj saab nrau xwb, tabsis huv mej lub sab muaj kev phem kev qas puv nkaus.
Ua le caag mej yuav ruag ua luaj le! Mej tsi paub has tas Vaajtswv tug kws tsim saab nrau, nwg yog tug kws tsim saab huv hab?
Mej ca le muab tej kws nyob huv mej tej khob hab tej phaaj pub rua cov tuabneeg pluag, txhua yaam kws mej muaj txhaj yuav huv lawv le kevcai.

“Cov Falixais, mej yuav raug kev puamtsuaj! Mej muab pumhum, luamlaws hab txhua yaam txumlom ib feem kaum coj tuaj fij rua Vaajtswv, tabsis mej tsua tsi ua tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg hab tsi hlub Vaajtswv. Mej yuavtsum ua tej nuav hab lwm yaam los mej yuav tau ua.
“Cov Falixais, Mej yuav raug kev puamtsuaj! Mej nyam xaiv tej chaw zoo huv tej tsev saablaaj nyob, thaus mej moog tom tej kab, mej nyam kuas suavdlawg fwm mej.
Mej yuav raug kev puamtsuaj! Mej zoo ib yaam le tej ntxaa kws tsi muaj dlaabtsi cim rua sau, tuabneeg tsuj moog tsuj lug, puab tsi paub has tas yog ntxaa.”
Muaj ib tug xwbfwb kws qha Vaajtswv txuj Kevcai has rua Yexus has tas, “Xwbfwb, koj has le ntawd, kuj yog koj thuam peb!”

Yexus teb has tas, “Cov xwbfwb kws qha Vaajtswv txuj Kevcai, mej yuav raug kev puamtsuaj hab! Mej muab lub nraa nyaav kws tsi yoojyim ris rua puab ris, tabsis mej tub tsi cev mej tug nyuas ntivteg moog paab thab tej nraa ntawd le.”
Mej yuav raug puamtsuaj! Mej txhim tej ntxaa kws log cov cev Vaajtswv lug kuas zoo nkauj. Cov cev Vaajtswv lug tub yog cov kws mej cov yawmkoob muab tua povtseg lawm.

Mej ua tej ntawd rua suavdlawg paub has tas, mej pum zoo tej kws mej cov yawmkoob ua lug lawm. Rua qhov mej cov yawmkoob yog cov kws tua cov cev Vaajtswv lug, hab mej yog cov kws txhim tej ntxaa ntawd.

Vim le nuav, Vaajtswv tug kws muaj tswvyim txhaj le has tas, “Kuv yuav khaiv cov kws cev Vaajtswv lug hab kuv cov timthawj moog qha puab, tabsis puab yuav muab cov cev Vaajtswv lug hab cov timthawj qee leej tua, hab yuav muab qee leej tsimtxom.”
Cov tuabneeg tam nuav yuav tau ris lub txim kws cov tuabneeg tam thaus u tua cov cev Vaajtswv lug, txij thaus tsim lub nplajteb lug txug naj nub nua,

suav txij thaus Anpees raug tua lug txug thaus Xakhaliyas raug tua ntawm lub thaaj fij khoom rua Vaajtswv hab qhov chaw Dlawbhuv kis nruab nraab. Kuv qha rua mej has tas, cov tuabneeg tam nuav yuav tau ris cov tuabneeg kws tua cov cev Vaajtswv lug ntawd lub txim!

“Cov xwbfwb kws qha Vaajtswv txuj Kevcai, mej yuav raug kev puamtsuaj! Mej muab tug yumsij kws qheb kev txawj ntse zais ca lawm; txawm yog mej los mej tsi xaav moog rua huv, hab yog lwm tug yuav moog huv, mej tseem txwv tsi pub puab moog hab!”
Thaus Yexus tawm huv tug Falixais tsev moog, cov xwbfwb kws qha Vaajtswv txuj Kevcai hab cov Falixais txawm thuam Yexus heev hab nug Yexus ntau zaaj saib nwg puas has txhum,
puab txhaj yuav nrhav tau txim rua nwg.

Thaus muaj tuabneeg ntau txheeb leej tuaj nyob ua ke sis txiv qev, Yexus has rua Yexus cov thwjtim has tas, “Mej yuavtsum ceevfaaj cov Falixais cov keeb. Kuv has le nuav yog kuv has txug cov Falixais kws ntsejmuag ncaaj sab nkhaus.
Tej kws tuabneeg muab npog ca lawm, yuav muaj tug muab nthuav lug rua suavdlawg saib, hab tej kws tsi muaj leejtwg paub, yuav muaj tug muab lug qha rua suavdlawg.

Yog le ntawd, txhua yaam kws mej has huv qhov tsaus ntuj, thaus kaaj ntug yuav muaj tug muab tej ntawd qha rua suavdlawg, hab tej kws mej sis ntxhi huv tsev, yuav muaj tug muab tej ntawd coj moog qha nrov nrov rua nrau zoov.
“Kuv cov phoojywg, kuv qha rua mej has tas, mej tsi xob ntshai tug kws tua tau mej lub cev, tabsis tom qaab ntawd nwg ua tsi tau dlaabtsi tshaaj qhov ntawd lawm.

Kuv yuav qha tug kws mej yuavtsum ntshai rua mej. Mej yuavtsum ntshai Vaajtswv tug kws tua tau mej hab muaj cuabkaav muab mej pov rua huv ntuj tawg. Kuv qha rua mej has tas, mej yuavtsum ntshai Vaajtswv!
“Tsib tug noog tsev, luas muag ob xus xwb puas yog? Txawm yog ib tug noog tsev xwb los Vaajtswv yeej saib ntsoov.
Txawm yog mej tej plaubhau los Vaajtswv suav txhua txuj huv tuabsi. Yog le ntawd, mej tsi xob ntshai; mej muaj nqes heev dlua ntau tug noog tsev.
“Kuv qha tseeb rua mej has tas, tug kws leeg taabmeeg suavdlawg has tas nwg yog kuv le, Tuabneeg Leej Tub yuav leeg tug ntawd taabmeeg Vaajtswv cov timtswv ib yaam le ntawd.
Tabsis tug kws tsi leeg kuv taabmeeg suavdlawg, Tuabneeg Leej Tub yuav tsi leeg yuav tug ntawd taabmeeg Vaajtswv cov timtswv.
“Yog leejtwg thuam Tuabneeg Leej Tub, Vaajtswv zaam txim tau rua tug ntawd. Tabsis yog leejtwg thuam Vaaj Ntsujplig tug Dlawbhuv, Vaajtswv yuav zaam txim tsi tau rua tug ntawd.
“Thaus puab coj mej moog rua huv tej tsev saablaaj lossis coj mej moog cuag tej numtswv, mej tsi xob txhawj has tas mej yuav has dlaws mej zaaj le caag.
Rua qhov thaus ntawd Vaaj Ntsujplig tug Dlawbhuv yuav qha rua mej paub has tas, mej yuav has le caag txhaj zoo.”
Muaj ib tug txivneej nyob huv paab tuabneeg coob coob ntawd has rua Yexus has tas, “Xwbfwb, thov koj has kuas kuv tug tijlaug faib kuv nam kuv txiv tej qubtxeeg qubteg rua kuv hab.”
Yexus teb has tas, “Phoojywg, leejtwg tsaa kuv ua tug txav txim hab faib qubtxeeg qubteg rua meb?”

Yexus has rua suavdlawg tas, “Mej txhua tug yuavtsum ceevfaaj tsi xob ntshaw yaam nuav yaam u. Txawm yog mej muaj nyaj ntxag hab qhov txhua chaw ntau npaum le caag los tej ntawd yeej paab tsi tau kuas mej muaj txujsa nyob ntev.”
Yexus has ib zaaj lug pevtxwv rua puab has tas, “Muaj ib tug txivneej npluanuj, nwg muaj laj muaj teb zoo hab sau tau qoobloo ntau heev.
Nwg xaav has tas, ‘Kuv yuav ua le caag? Kuv tsi muaj chaw txaus ntim kuv tej qoobloo nuav.’
Nwg xaav has tas, ‘Kuv yuav ua le nuav. Kuv yuav lauj kuv lub txhaab, hab muab ua kuas luj dlua, txhaj txaus ntim kuv tej qoobloo hab qhov txhua chaw.
Ces kuv yuav has rua kuv lub sab has tas, koj muaj moo heev! Koj tub muaj txhua yaam txhij zog kws kaav ntau xyoo lawm. Koj ca le su nyob noj nyob haus!’
Tabsis Vaajtswv has rua tug npluanuj ntawd tas, ‘Tug tuabneeg ruag, mo nuav koj txujsa tub yuav tu; yog le ntawd, tej qhov txhua chaw kws koj npaaj tseg yuav yog leejtwg tug?’ ”
Yexus xaus lug has tas, “Tug kws npaaj nyaj txag qhov txhua chaw lug ua nwg tug kuas nwg npluanuj, Vaajtswv tsi suav has tas tug ntawd yog tuabneeg npluanuj.”
Ces Yexus has rua nwg cov thwjtim has tas, “Yog le ntawd, kuv txhaj qha rua mej kuas mej tsi xob txhawj has tas mej yuavtsum muaj zaub mov noj txhaj muaj sa nyob lossis yuavtsum muaj rig tsho naav.
Rua qhov txujsa tseemceeb dlua tej zaub mov, hab lub cev tseemceeb dlua tej rig tsho.

Mej ua tuab zoo saib tej uab laag: uab laag tsi cog qoob cog loo, hab tsi hlais tsi sau; puab tsi muaj txhaab tsi muaj phawv ntim qoobloo ca; Vaajtswv tub yug tej uab laag! Mej tseem muaj nqes heev dlua tej noog ntawd!
Mej tej kev txhawj puas yuav paab tau kuas mej muaj sa nyob ob peb xyoos ntxiv?
Yog tej yaam miv miv nuav mej tub ua tsi tau, mej tseem yuav moog txhawj lwm yaam ua dlaabtsi?

Mej ua tuab zoo xaav saib, tej paaj ntoos tawg le caag? Puab tub tsi ua num, tsi ntus ntaub naav. Tabsis kuv qha rua mej has tas, txawm yog Vaajntxwv Xalumoos npluanuj kawg le los nwg tub tsi tau naav ib cev rig tsho zoo npaum le tej paaj ntoos ntawd ib lub. Ua le caag mej kev ntseeg yuav tsawg ua luaj?

Tej nroj tsuag kws tsuas nyob nub nua xwb, pigkig luas tub yuav muab pov hlawv rua huv qhovcub, ua cav Vaajtswv tub pub rua tej paaj ntoos ntawd zoo nkauj ua luaj. Yog le ntawd, Vaajtswv hajyam yuav pub rua mej muaj naav zoo dlua tej nroj tsuag ntawd!
“Yog le ntawd, mej tsi xob txhawj has tas, mej yuav moog nrhav dlaabtsi lug noj lug haus,
(cov tuabneeg kws tsi ntseeg Vaajtswv huv nplajteb nuav naj nub nrhav tej nuav.) Mej leej Txiv yeej paub has tas mej yuavtsum muaj tej nuav.
Tabsis mej yuavtsum xub nrhav Vaajtswv lub Tebchaws tsaiv, nwg maam le muab tej nuav ntxiv rua mej.
“Cov mivnyuas yaaj, txawm yog mej tsi coob los mej tsi xob ntshai, rua qhov mej leej Txiv tub txaus sab muab nwg lub tebchaws rua mej lawm.

Ca le muab mej tej qhov txhua chaw muag, hab muab tej ntawd faib rua cov tuabneeg pluag. Ca le xaws lub naab rau nyaj kws tsi txawj ndluag ntim mej tej nyaj rua sau ntuj ceebtsheej, qhov ntawd mej tej nyaj yuav tsi pluj, rua qhov tubsaab nyag tsi tau, hab ntsaum kaabrwg tsi noj.
Mej tej nyaj txag hab qhov txhua chaw nyob qhov twg, mej lub sab yeej nyob qhov ntawd.
“Mej yuavtsum naav rig tsho khov kho tog hab taws teeb ca,
ib yaam le cov tubkhai kws npaaj tog puab tug tswv kws moog noj tshoob yuav rov lug. Thaus tug tswv lug txug hab hu, taamsim ntawd cov tubkhai yuav qheb qhovrooj rua nwg.

Thaus tug tswv rov lug pum cov tubkhai tseem zuv tog, cov tubkhai ntawd yuav tau ntsejmuag! Kuv qha rua mej has tas, tug tswv ntawd yuav sa hlaab khov kho, hab yuav kuas cov tubkhai nyob quastsawg ntawm rooj, hab nwg yuav ua tug txhaab zaub txhaab mov rua puab noj.
Txawm yog tug tswv lug thaus ib taag mo lossis lug thaus yuav kaaj ntug, yog nwg pum cov tubkhai tseem zuv tog, cov tubkhai ntawd yuav tau ntsejmuag!
Mej ncu ntsoov has tas, yog tug tswv tsev paub has tas thaus twg tubsaab yuav tuaj, nwg yeej yuav zuv tog, tsi pub kuas tubsaab lug tau rua huv nwg tsev.
Yog le ntawd, mej los yuavtsum zuv tog, rua qhov Tuabneeg Leej Tub yuav lug lub sijhawm kws mej tsi ceevfaaj.”
Petus nug Yexus has tas, “Tug Tswv, zaaj lug pevtxwv kws koj has nuav, yog koj has rua peb lossis koj has rua txhua tug?”

Tug Tswv teb has tas, “Tug tubkhai ncaaj nceeg hab muaj tswvyim. Tug tswv yuav tsaa nwg ua tug luj kws saib tug tswv cov tubkhai. Thaus txug sijhawm noj, tug ntawd yuav ua tug kws faib zaub faib mov rua cov tubkhai noj.
Thaus tug tswv rov lug tsev hab pum tug tubkhai ntawd taabtom ua tej num zoo nuav. Ces tug tubkhai ntawd yuav tau ntsejmuag.
Kuv qha rua mej has tas, tug tswv yuav tsaa tug tubkhai ntawd ua tug saib tug tswv tej qhov txhua chaw.
Tabsis yog tug tubkhai ntawd xaav has tas, tseem tshuav ntev kuv tug tswv maam lug, ces nwg txawm muab cov tubkhai ntaus, tsi has quaspuj lossis txivneej huv tuabsi, hab nwg noj tsau haus qaug,

Nwg tsi paub has tas lub sijhawm twg nwg tug tswv yuav lug txug, nwg txhaj tsi ceevfaaj. Tug tswv yuav muab tug tubkhai ntawd hlais ua tej dlaim,  hab muab nwg pov moog nyob nrug cov tuabneeg kws tsi noog lug.
“Tug tubkhai kws paub nwg tug tswv lub sab lawm, tabsis nwg tsi ua lawv le tug tswv xaav kuas nwg ua. Tug tubkhai ntawd yuav maag nplawm.

Tabsis tug tubkhai kws tsi paub nwg tug tswv lub sab, txawm yog nwg ua txhum txaus nplawm los nwg yuav tsi maag nplawm ntau. Tug kws tau ntau, tug ntawd yuavtsum pauj ntau. Tug kws tau ntau dlua, tug ntawd yuavtsum pauj ntau dlua.
“Qhov kws kuv lug yog coj suavtawg lug hlawv lub nplajteb, hab kuv xaav kuas suavtawg tub cig lawm!
Kuv nyuaj sab kawg le, vim kuv yuav raug kev tsimtxom, hab kuv yuav nyuaj sab moog txug thaus lub sijhawm ntawd dlhau lawm.
Mej xaav has tas, kuv coj kev sis humxeeb lug rua huv lub nplajteb nua los? Kuv qha rua mej has tas, tsi yog le ntawd, kuv lug ua kuas tuabneeg nyob tsi sis hum.
Txij nuav moog tsev tuabneeg kws muaj tsib leeg yuav tsi sis hum, peb leeg yuav tawmtsaam ob leeg, hab ob leeg yuav tawmtsaam peb leeg.
Txiv yuav tawmtsaam tub, tub yuav tawmtsaam txiv; nam yuav tawmtsaam ntxhais, ntxhais yuav tawmtsaam nam; puj yuav tawmtsaam nyaab, hab nyaab yuav tawmtsaam puj.”
Yexus has rua suavdlawg tas, “Thaus mej pum fuab tsaus nti saab nubpoob lug, taamsim ntawd mej has tas, yuav lug naag, ces txawm muaj le ntawd.
Hab thaus mej pum cua ntsawj saab qaabteb tuaj, mej has tas, tub yuav txug lub caij ntuj kub, ces txawm muaj le ntawd.
Cov tuabneeg ntsejmuag ncaaj sab nkhaus! Mej saib fuab saib cua, mej paub has tas yuav tshaav ntuj lossis yuav lug naag, tabsis ua le caag tej kws naj nub nua muaj, mej tsua tsi paub?”
“Vim le caag mej tsi ua tuab zoo xaav saib yuav ua yaam twg txhaj zoo?

Yog leejtwg xyuam phaaj kom koj rua huv tsev tu plaub, hab yuav coj koj moog has plaub, ua ntej kws tsi tau moog has plaub, koj ca le thov nwg kuas meb rov sis hum, nyob tsaam nwg yuav coj koj moog cuag tug txav txim, ces tug txav txim yuav muab koj cob rua tug ceevxwm, hab tug ceevxwm yuav muab koj kaw rua huv tsev lojcuj.
Kuv qha tseeb rua koj has tas, koj yuav tawm tsi tau huv tsev lojcuj moog txug thaus kws koj them nqe taag.”
Thaus lub sijhawm ntawd, muaj qee leej qha rua Yexus has txug zaaj kws Philaj muab cov tuabneeg Kalilais tua, thaus puab taabtom tua tsaj fij rua Vaajtswv.
Yexus teb puab has tas, “Mej xaav has tas, cov tuabneeg Kalilais kws raug tua le ntawd, puab muaj txim luj dlua lwm tug tuabneeg Kalilais huv tuabsi nua los?
Tsi yog le ntawd! Kuv qha rua mej has tas, yog mej tsi tso mej tej kev txhum tseg, mej yuav tuag ib yaam le puab cov ntawd hab.
Mej xaav has tas, kaum yim leej kws lub chaw tsomfaaj qaug lug ntaus tuag taag huv Xilau-aas ntawd, yog puab ua txhum luj dlua cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees huv tuabsi nua los?
Tsi yog le ntawd! Kuv qha rua mej has tas, yog mej tsi tso mej tej kev txhum tseg, mej yuav tuag taag ib yaam le puab cov ntawd hab.”
Yexus has ib zaaj lug pevtxwv rua puab noog has tas, “Muaj ib tug txivneej cog ib tsob txiv ncuav pas rua huv nwg lub vaaj txiv maab. Nwg moog saib puas txi txiv, tabsis tsi pum txi txiv le.

Nwg txawm has rua tug kws tu lub vaaj ntawd has tas, ‘Koj saib, kuv tuaj saib tsob txiv ncuav pas nuav tau peb xyoos lawm, tabsis kuv tsi pum txi ib lub txiv le. Koj ca le muab ntuv povtseg! Ua le caag tseem yuav ca nwg nyob ntxoov aav ua dlaabtsi?’
Tabsis tug kws tu lub vaaj teb has tas, ‘Tug tswv, thov ca nwg nyob ib xyoos hab tsaiv. Kuv yuav khawb aav npoog hab rau chiv rua.
Yog lwm xyoo nwg txi txiv lawm kuj zoo, yog nwg tsi txi txiv, koj maam le muab ntuv povtseg.’ ”
Muaj ib nub kws yog nub Xanpataus, Yexus taabtom qha huv ib lub tsev saablaaj.
Muaj ib tug quaspuj raug dlaab hab mob tau kaum yim xyoo lawm; ua rua nwg khoov dluav sawv tsi tau ntseg.
Thaus Yexus pum tug quaspuj ntawd, Yexus hu nwg lug hab has rua nwg tas, “Tug ntxhais, koj tug mob tub zoo lawm!”
Yexus cev teg moog tuav nkaus tug quaspuj ntawd, taamsim ntawd tug quaspuj ntawd txawm sawv tau ntseg, hab nwg ua Vaajtswv tsaug.

Thaus tug kws saib lub tsev saablaaj pum Yexus khu mob nub Xanpataus, nwg chim heev, nwg has rua cov tuabneeg kws nyob ntawd tas, “Tub muaj rau nub rua peb ua Vaajtswv num; ua le caag rau nub ntawd mej tsua tsi tuaj khu, Nub Xanpataus mej tsua tuaj khu?”
Tug Tswv teb has tas, “Cov tuabneeg ntsejmuag ncaaj sab nkhaus! Nub Xanpataus mej tub dlaws nyuj dlaws lossis neeg luav caab tawm huv nkuaj moog haus dlej.
Tug quaspuj nuav tub yog Anplahaas ib tug xeebntxwv hab. Dlaab Ntxwgnyoog tub muab nwg khi tau kaum yim lub xyoo lug lawm: Nub Xanpataus tseem tsi tsimnyog dlaws kuas nwg dlim hab los?”
Yexus teb le ntawd, ua rua cov tuabneeg kws tawmtsaam Yexus poob ntsejmuag heev. Tabsis cov tuabneeg kws pum tej txujci kws Yexus ua, puab zoo sab kawg le.
Yexus nug has tas, “Kuv yuav muab Vaajtswv lub Tebchaws pev rua dlaabtsi?

Vaajtswv lub tebchaws pev ib yaam le lub noob zaub kws muaj ib tug coj moog cog rua huv nwg lub vaaj. Lub noob zaub ntawd tuaj hab luj hlub ua ib tsob ntoo kws luj heev, hab noog lug ua zeg rua sau nwg tej ceg.”
Yexus rov nug dlua has tas, “Kuv yuav muab Vaajtswv lub Tebchaws pev rua dlaabtsi?
Vaajtswv lub Tebchaws pev ib yaam le cov keeb kws muaj ib tug quaspuj muab xyaw rua peb sab moov nplej, hab ua rua cov moov nplej su taag huv tuabsi.”
Yexus taug kev moog qhuab qha rua tej tuabneeg suavdlawg huv tej nroog hab tej zog moog txug nraag lub nroog Yeluxalees.
Muaj ib tug nug Yexus has tas, “Tug Tswv, cov kws yuav dlim txim muaj tsawg tsawg leej xwb los?” Yexus teb puab has tas,
“Mej ua tag txeem lub qhovrooj nqaim moog rua saab huv. Kuv qha rua mej has tas, muaj ntau leej xaav moog saab huv, tabsis puab moog tsi tau.

Thaus tug tswv tsev sawv lug kaw qhovrooj lawm; mej yuav sawv saab nrau khob qhovrooj hab hu has tas, ‘Tug tswv, thov qheb qhovrooj rua peb!’ Tug tswv tsev yuav teb mej has tas, ‘Kuv tsi paub sov mej tuaj qhov twg tuaj!’
Thaus ntawd mej yuav teb has tas, ‘Peb tub nrug koj noj koj haus; hab koj tub tuaj qha huv peb lub nroog!’
Tug tswv tsev yuav rov has rua mej has tas, ‘Kuv tsi paub sov mej tuaj qhov twg tuaj. Cov tuabneeg sab phem, mej ca le tsiv moog!’
Thaus mej pum Anplahaas, Ixaj, Yakhauj hab cov cev Vaajtswv lug txhua tug nyob huv Vaajtswv lub Tebchaws, thaus ntawd mej cov kws tseem nyob saab nrau, mej yuav quaj qw tum nav qawv!
Yuav muaj tuabneeg tuaj saab nubtuaj, saab nubpoob, saab qaumteb, hab saab qaabteb tuaj nyob ua ke ntawm rooj mov huv Vaajtswv lub Tebchaws.
Thaus ntawd tug kws nwgnuav nyob tom tw yuav tau moog ua tug thawj, hab tug kws nwgnuav ua tug thawj, yuav tau lug nyob tom tw.”
Thaus lub sijhawm ntawd, cov Falixais qee leej tuaj cuag Yexus hab has rua nwg tas, “Koj ca le tsiv tawm qhov nuav hab moog rua lwm qhov, Helauj yuav muab koj tua povtseg.”
Yexus teb puab has tas, “Mej ca le moog qha rua tug maa ntawd has tas: ‘Nub nua hab pigkig, kuv tseem ntab dlaab hab khu tej tuabneeg muaj mob, nub peb kuv teg num maam le tav.’

Txawm le caag los xij, nub nua, pigkig hab quasneeg, kuv yeej yuav taug kev moog rua nraag; rua qhov tsi tsimnyog yuav muab ib tug kws cev Vaajtswv lug tua rua lwm qhov, tsuas tsimnyog muab tua rua huv lub nroog Yeluxalees xwb.

“Yeluxalees, Yeluxalees! Koj muab cov kws cev Vaajtswv lug tua povtseg, koj muab pobzeb ntaus cov tubkhai kws Vaajtswv khaiv lug qha koj! Muaj ntau zag kuv tub yuav muab koj cov pejxeem lug puag, ib yaam le tug puj qab cuab nwg cov mivnyuas lug puag rua huv nwg ob phob tis, tabsis koj tsi ca kuv ua le ntawd!

Nwgnuav Vaajtswv yuav muab koj lub Tuamtsev tso povtseg nyob qhuav nkuag ca. Kuv qha rua koj has tas, koj yuav tsi pum kuv moog txug nub kws koj has tas, ‘Thov Vaajtswv foom koob moov rua tug kws Vaajtswv khaiv lug.’ ”
Muaj ib nub kws yog nub Xanpataus, Yexus moog noj mov huv cov Falixais ib tug thawj lub tsev; muaj tuabneeg saib ntsoov Yexus.
Muaj ib tug txivneej teg taw xaab xaab lug cuag Yexus,
Yexus nug cov xwbfwb kws qha Vaajtswv txuj Kevcai hab cov Falixais has tas, “Peb txuj kevcai puas pub peb khu mob nub Xanpataus los tsi pub?”
Tabsis puab tsi teb le. Yexus tuav nkaus tug txivneej ntawd, Yexus khu nwg tug mob zoo hab kuas nwg moog tsev lawm.

Yexus has rua puab tas, “Nub Xanpataus, yog mej leejtwg muaj ib tug mivnyuas lossis ib tug nyuj moog poob rua huv qhov tshij lawm, txawm yog nub ntawd yog nub Xanpataus los mej yeej yuav moog muab nrawm nroog xwb los sav?”
Puab teb tsi taug Yexus lu lug ntawd le.
Yexus pum cov tuabneeg kws tuaj noj mov muaj qee leej xaiv nyob peg hauv tsum, Yexus has ib zaaj lug pevtxwv rua puab has tas,
“Thaus muaj tuabneeg hu koj moog noj tshoob, koj tsi xob xub moog xaiv nyob peg hauv tsum. Nyob tsaam tug tswv tsev tub hu ib tug kws tseemceeb dlua koj tuaj,
hab tug tswv tsev kws hu meb ob leeg tuaj, yuav lug has rua koj tas, ‘Ca tug nuav nyob lub chaw ko.’ Thaus ntawd koj yuav poob ntsejmuag heev, hab koj yuav tau moog nyob tom qaab.

Thaus muaj tuabneeg hu koj moog noj mov, koj yuavtsum xub moog nyob tom qaab, thaus tug tswv tsev lug, nwg yuav hu koj has tas, ‘Phoojywg, koj ca le moog nyob peg hauv tsum.’ Ces koj yuav tau ntsejmuag taabmeeg cov tuabneeg kws nrug koj nyob noj mov ua ke ntawd.
Rua qhov txhua tug kws khaav has tas nwg muaj fwjchim, tug ntawd yuav poob fwjchim, tabsis txhua tug kws txu fwjchim, yuav tau fwjchim.”

Yexus has rua tug tswv tsev ntawd has tas, “Thaus koj noj sus lossis noj mo, koj tsi xob moog hu koj tej phoojywg, koj tej kwvtij neejtsaa, hab tej tuabneeg zej zog kws npluanuj tuaj xwb, rua qhov puab yeej yuav ua ib rooj mov pauj rua koj.
Thaus koj muaj noj muaj haus, koj ca le moog hu tej tuabneeg pluag, tej tuabneeg qhuav teg qhuav taw, tej tuabneeg cegtawv, hab tej tuabneeg dligmuag tuaj noj;
koj txhaj yuav tau koob moov, rua qhov puab cov ntawd pauj tsi taug koj txaj ntsig. Thaus Vaajtswv tsaa cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg sawv huv qhov tuag rov qaab lug, Vaajtswv yuav muab nqe zug rua koj.”
Cov tuabneeg kws nrug Yexus nyob ntawm rooj mov nov Yexus has le ntawd, muaj ib tug has rua Yexus has tas, “Tug kws tau moog noj mov huv Vaajtswv lub tebchaws, tug ntawd yuav zoo sab kawg le!”
Yexus has rua nwg tas, “Muaj ib tug txivneej ua ib rooj mov luj, nwg moog caw ntau leej tuaj noj.
Thaus txug lub sijhawm noj lawm, nwg khaiv ib tug tubkhai moog hu cov tuabneeg kws nwg tub caw lawm has tas, ‘Mej ca le moog, tub rau mov txhij lawm!’

Tabsis cov tuabneeg ntawd txhua tug yig has tas, tsi khoom moog. Thawj tug has rua tug tubkhai ntawd has tas, ‘Kuv yuav tau ib thaaj laj, kuv yuav moog saib; koj rov moog has rua koj tug tswv kuas nwg tsi xob tu sab.’
Muaj dlua ib tug has tas, Kuv yuav tau tsib nkawm nyuj, kuv yuav moog muab kuv cov nyuj sim laij lag. Koj rov moog has rua koj tug tswv kuas nwg tsi xob tu sab.
Muaj dlua ib tug has tas, ‘Kuv nyavnyuas yuav quaspuj, yog le ntawd kuv tsi moog.’

Tug tubkhai rov moog qha tej nuav rua nwg tug tswv. Tug tswv chim heev, nwg has rua tug tubkhai has tas, ‘Koj ca le moog rua tom tej kev luj kev miv huv nroog, coj tej tuabneeg pluag, tej tuabneeg qhuav teg qhuav taw, tej tuabneeg dligmuag hab tej tuabneeg cegtawv tuaj noj.’
Tug tubkhai rov lug has rua nwg tug tswv has tas, ‘Kuv tub moog ua lawv le koj has rua kuv lawm, tabsis tseem tshuav chaw hab.’
Tug tswv rov has rua tug tubkhai ntawd tas, ‘Koj ca le moog rua tom tej kev luj hab kev miv, koj ntsib leejtwg, koj ca le coj tuaj kuas puv kuv lub tsev.
Kuv qha rua mej has tas, cov tuabneeg kws tub caw lawm, tsi muaj ib tug yuav tau saaj kuv rooj mov hlo le!’ ”
Muaj tuabneeg coob coob nrug Yexus ua ke moog, Yexus tig lug has rua puab tas,

“Yog leejtwg yuav lug cuag kuv, tug ntawd yuavtsum hlub kuv heev dlua le nwg hlub nwg nam nwg txiv, nwg quaspuj mivnyuas, nwg kwv nwg tij, nwg nkauj nwg muam, hab heev dlua le nwg hlub nwg lub cev, nwg txhaj le ua tau kuv tug thwjtim.
Tug kws tsi kwv nwg tug ntoo khaublig nrug kuv moog, tug ntawd ua tsi tau kuv tug thwjtim.
Mej cov yog muaj ib tug yuav ua ib lub chaw tsomfaaj, tug ntawd yuavtsum xub nyob quastsawg ua tuab zoo xaav saib yuav siv nyaj npaum le caag, hab nwg puas yuav muaj nyaj txaus ua tau.
Yog nwg tsi xub ua le ntawd, ces thaus txhus tau ncej lawm, nwg yuav ua lub chaw tsomfaaj ntawd tsi tav. Cov tuabneeg kws pum le ntawd yuav thuam nwg
has tas, ‘Tug txivneej nuav pib ua, tabsis nwg tsi muaj peevxwm ua kuas tav!’

Tug vaajntxwv kws muaj tubrog kaum txheeb leej, thaus nwg yuav moog ua rog rua ib tug vaajntxwv kws muaj tubrog neeg nkaum txheeb leej, nwg yeej yuav xub ua tuab zoo xaav saib, nwg cov tubrog puas yuav moog ntaus yeej tug vaajntxwv kws muaj tubrog neeg nkaum txheeb leej ntawd.
Yog nwg xaav has tas nwg yuav tua tsi yeej, thaus nwg tseem nyob dleb, nwg yeej yuav xub khaiv tuabneeg moog thov tug vaajntxwv tod, kuas ob tog sis raug zoo.”
Yexus xaus lug has tas, “Ib yaam nkaus le ntawd, tug kws tsi tso txhua yaam kws nwg muaj tseg, tug ntawd ua tsi tau kuv tug thwjtim.
“Ntsev yog yaam kws zoo, tabsis yog ntsev tsuag lawm, yuav ua le caag kuas rov qaab ntsev tau.
Cov ntsev ntawd tsi zoo siv ua dlaabtsi, muab rua aav los aav tsi zoo, hab muab xyaw chiv los tsi zoo, tsuas muaj yuav muab povtseg xwb. Yog leejtwg muaj qhovntsej ca le noog!”
Muaj ib zag cov tuabneeg sau se hab cov tuabneeg txhum tuaj noog Yexus qha,
cov Falixais hab cov xwbfwb kws qha Vaajtswv txuj Kevcai txawm ywg has tas, “Tug nuav nrug cov tuabneeg txhum ua ke hab nrug puab noj mov!”
Yog le ntawd, Yexus txhaj has ib zaaj lug pevtxwv rua puab noog has tas,
“Mej cov yog leejtwg muaj ib puas tug yaaj, yog ib tug pluj lawm, tug tswv yuav ua le caag? Nwg yeej yuav tso cuaj caum cuaj tug rua tom haav zaub, hab moog nrhav tug yaaj kws pluj lawm kuas tau.
Thaus nwg nrhav tau lawm, nwg zoo sab heev, nwg muab tsaws hlo rua sau xubpwg,
hab kwv lug tsev. Ces nwg hu nwg cov kwvtij hab tej tuabneeg zej zog tuaj hab has rua puab tas, ‘Mej ca le nrug kuv zoo sab, rua qhov kuv tub moog nrhav tau kuv tug yaaj kws pluj lawm!’

Ib yaam nkaus le ntawd, kuv qha rua mej has tas, yog ib tug tuabneeg txhum tso nwg tej kev txhum tseg lawm, cov timtswv ceebtsheej yuav zoo sab rua tug ntawd heev dlua le zoo sab rua cuaj caum cuaj tug kws puab khaav has tas, puab yog tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg.
“Lossis muaj ib tug quaspuj muaj kaum lub nyaj, yog ib lub poob lawm, nwg yuav ua le caag? Nwg yuav taws teeb, cheb tsev, hab tshawb nrhav txhua qhov kuas tau lub nyaj ntawd.
Thaus nwg nrhav tau nwg lub nyaj lawm, nwg hu nwg cov kwvtij hab tej tuabneeg zej zog tuaj, hab nwg has rua puab tas, ‘Kuv tub nrhav tau kuv lub nyaj kws poob lawm, mej ca le nrug kuv zoo sab!’
Ib yaam le ntawd, kuv qha rua mej has tas, yog ib tug tuabneeg txhum tso nwg tej kev txhum tseg, Vaajtswv cov timtswv yuav zoo sab kawg nkaus rua tug tuabneeg txhum kws tso nwg tej kev txhum tseg.”
Yexus has ntxiv has tas, “Muaj ib tug txivneej muaj ob tug tub.
Tug tub yau has rua leej txiv has tas, ‘Txiv, thov koj muab koj lub cuabtaam cov kws yog kuv feem faib rua kuv.’ Leej txiv muab nwg lub cuabtaam tej kws yog nwg tug, faib rua nwg ob tug tub.
Tau ob peb nub tom qaab, tug tub yau muab tej kws yog nwg tug muag tau nyaj, ces nwg txawm tsiv moog rua lwm lub tebchaws dleb dleb lawm, nwg tsi txuag nwg tej nyaj,
nwg ywj sab siv ua dlog ua dlig, nwg muab nwg tej nyaj phob taag lawm, thaus ntawd muaj kev tshaib plaab thoob plawg lub tebchaws, nwg tsi tshuav dlaabtsi le lawm.
Nwg txhaj moog nrug ib tug txivneej huv lub nroog ntawd nyob, tug ntawd khaiv nwg moog zuv npua tom teb.
Nwg xaav noj cov plhaub taum kws npua noj, kuas tsau nwg plaab los tsi muaj leejtwg pub rua nwg noj.
Thaus nwg ncu dlheev txug has tas, ‘Kuv txiv cov tub zug muaj noj muaj haus tsi taag, ua le caag kuv yuav tuaj yoo tshaib ntawm nuav?
Kuv yuav rov moog cuag kuv txiv hab has tas, “Txiv, kuv ua txhum rua Vaajtswv hab ua txhum rua koj lawm.
Kuv tsi tsimnyog ua koj tug tub lawm; thov koj suav kuv ib yaam le kuv yog koj ib tug tub zug xwb.” ’
Ces nwg txawm sawv tseeg taug kev rov moog cuag nwg txiv. “Thaus nwg lug tsi tau txug kws tseem nyob hov dleb, nwg txiv pum nwg hab hlub nwg kawg; nwg txiv dlha loo moog puag nkaus tug tub nwj.
Tug tub has rua leej txiv has tas, ‘Txiv, kuv ua txhum rua Vaajtswv hab ua txhum rua koj lawm. Kuv tsi tsimnyog ua koj tug tub lawm!’
Tabsis leej txiv has rua cov tubkhai has tas, ‘Mej kawgkag nqaa cev rig tsho kws zoo zoo tuaj rua nwg naav. Nqaa nplhaib tuaj rua nwg coj, muab khau tuaj rua nwg rau.
Hab moog muab tug mivnyuas nyuj kws rog rog coj lug tua ua ib rooj mov rua suavdlawg noj ua kev zoo sab.
Rua qhov kuv tug tub nuav tub tuag lawm, tabsis nwgnuav nwg caj rov lug; nwg tub pluj lawm, tabsis nwgnuav nwg rov lug.’ Ces suavdlawg txawm noj haus zoo sab.
“Thaus ntawd tug tub hlub nyob tom teb. Nwg rov tom teb lug txug ntawm tog tsev, nwg nov suab raaj suab nkauj nogncaas hab suab seev cev huv tsev tuaj.
Nwg hu ib tug tubkhai tuaj, hab nug has tas, ‘Puab ua dlaabtsi huv tsev?’
Tug tubkhai ntawd teb has tas, ‘Koj tug kwv rov qaab lug lawm. Koj txiv tua tug mivnyuas nyuj rog rog rua koj tug kwv noj, rua qhov koj tug kwv rov lug, nwg tseem noj qaab nyob zoo.’
Tug tijlaug chim heev, nwg tsi kaam moog rua huv tsev. Nwg txiv txhaj tawm tuaj thov kuas nwg moog huv tsev.

Nwg teb nwg txiv has tas, ‘Txiv, koj sim xaav saib, kuv ua num rua koj ib yaam le tug qhev tau ntau xyoo, kuv tsi tau tawv koj ib zag le. Koj tub tsi pub ib yaam dlaabtsi rua kuv. Txawm yog ib tug nyuas mivnyuas tshis los koj tub tsi muab rua kuv tua pub kuv cov phoojywg noj ib pluag zoo sab le!
Tabsis koj tug tub nuav, coj koj tej nyaj moog ndlav namndlav hab phob phuam laam taag. Nwg rov qaab lug, koj tsua muab tug mivnyuas nyuj rog rog tua rua nwg noj hab!’
Leej txiv teb has tas, ‘Mivtub, koj yeej ibtxwm nrug kuv nyob, txhua yaam kws kuv muaj puavleej yog koj le.
Yeej tsimnyog peb ua ib rooj mov noj hab zoo sab, rua qhov koj tug kwv tub tuag lawm, tabsis nwgnuav nwg caj rov lug, nwg tub pluj lawm, tabsis nwgnuav nwg rov lug.’ ”

Yexus has rua nwg cov thwjtim has tas, “Muaj ib tug tuabneeg npluanuj, nwg muaj ib tug thawj tubkhai kws saib nwg lub vaaj tse. Muaj tuabneeg lug qha rua tug npluanuj has tas, koj tug thawj tubkhai muab koj tej nyaj coj moog siv phuam laam ntsuav lawm.

yog le ntawd, tug npluanuj txhaj hu tug thawj tubkhai lug hab has rua nwg tas, ‘Zaaj kws kuv nov koj ua ntawd yog le caag tag? Koj ca le muab tej ntaub ntawv kws teev tej nyaj lug rua kuv, rua qhov kuv tsi yuav koj ua kuv tej num lawm.’
Tug thawj tubkhai ntawd xaav has tas, ‘Kuv tug tswv tub yuav rhu kuv tawm num, kuv yuav ua le caag txhaj zoo? Kuv yuav moog khawb aav los tsi muaj zug, yuav moog thov khawv noj los txaajmuag.
Nwgnuav, kuv paub has tas kuv yuav ua le caag, thaus tug tswv tsi pub kuv ua num lawm, txhaj muaj tuabneeg hu kuv moog huv puab tej tsev.’
Nwg txawm hu txhua tug kws tshuav nwg tug tswv nqe ib tug zuj zug tuaj cuag nwg. Nwg nug thawj tug has tas, ‘Koj tshuav tug tswv nqe npaum le caag?’

Tug ntawd teb has tas, ‘Kuv tshuav nwg ib puas thoob roj.’ Tug thawj tubkhai has rua tug ntawd tas, ‘Dlaim ntawv nuav yog dlaim kws koj tshuav nqe, koj ca le moog nyob quastsawg hab sau kag ua tsib caug thoob.’

Tug thawj tubkhai txawm nug dlua ib tug has tas, ‘Koj tshuav npaum le caag?’ Tug ntawd teb has tas, ‘Kuv tshuav ib txheeb naab nplej.’ Tug thawj tubkhai has rua tug ntawd tas, ‘Dlaim ntawv nuav yog dlaim kws koj tshuav nqe, koj ca le sau ua yim caum naab.’

Tug tswv qhuas tug thawj tubkhai kws tsi ncaaj has tas, tug tubkhai ntawd muaj tswvyim kawg le; rua qhov cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv nplajteb nuav muaj tswvyim ua num heev dlua cov tuabneeg kws nyob qhov pum kev.”

Yexus has ntxiv tas, “Yog le ntawd kuv qha rua mej has tas, mej yuavtsum muab tej nyaj huv nplajteb nuav coj moog zeem phoojywg. Thaus mej tej nyaj taag lawm, cov tuabneeg ntawd txhaj yuav tog txais mej huv qhov chaw kws yuav nyob moog ibtxhis.
Tug kws ua ncaaj rua tej yaam tsawg, nwg yeej yuav ua ncaaj rua yaam ntau hab; tug kws ua tsi ncaaj rua tej yaam tsawg, nwg yeej yuav ua tsi ncaaj rua tej yaam ntau hab.
Tej nyaj huv nplajteb nuav, mej tub siv tsi ncaaj. Yog le ntawd, leejtwg yuav muab tej kws tseemceeb dlua tej nyaj ntawd rua mej hab.
Hab yog mej ua tsi ncaaj rua tej kws yog lwm tug tug, leejtwg yuav muab tej kws yog mej tug rua mej?

“Yeej tsi muaj ib tug tubkhai yuav ua num tau rua ob tug tswv. Yog nwg ua le ntawd, Nwg yuav ntxub ib tug hab nyam ib tug; nwg yuav fwm ib tug hab saib tsi taug ib tug. Yog mej yuav muab Vaajtswv hab nyaj txag saib hlub ib yaam nkaus yeej tsi tau le.”
Thaus cov Falixais nov Yexus qha tej ntawd, puab txawm thuam Yexus, rua qhov puab yog cov kws ntshaw nyaj.

Yexus has rua puab tas, “Mej yog cov tuabneeg kws ua txuj ua kuas suavdlawg xaav has tas, mej yog tuabneeg zoo, tabsis Vaajtswv tub paub mej lub sab taag lawm. Rua qhov tej kws tuabneeg xaav has tas muaj nqes, tej ntawd Vaajtswv pum has tas tsi muaj nqes.

“Suavdlawg coj Mauxes txuj Kevcai hab tej lug qha kws cov cev Vaajtswv lug sau tseg lug txug lub sijhawm kws Yauhaas tug kws muab tuabneeg ua kevcai raus dlej lug qha, txij thaus ntawd lug muaj tuabneeg moog qha Txujmoo Zoo kws has txug Vaajtswv lub tebchaws, ces suavdlawg sis txeeb moog rua huv lub tebchaws ntawd.
Yog ua kuas lub nplajteb hab lub ntuj puamtsuaj moog, yoojyim dlua le rhuav Mauxes txuj Kevcai ib tug tsaj ntawv povtseg.

“Yog leejtwg muab nwg tug quaspuj nrauj lawm hab moog yuav dlua quaspuj, kuj yog nwg ua txhum kev nkauj kev nraug; hab yog leejtwg moog yuav ib tug puj nrauj, kuj yog nwg ua txhum kev nkauj kev nraug ib yaam nkaus.
“Muaj ib tug npluanuj, nwg naav tej tsoog tsho zoo zoo kws kim kim, hab naj nub muaj noj seem noj sos.
Muaj ib tug txivneej pluag pluag hu ua Laxalus, nwg ib ce mob ua paug quas mag, luas pheej coj nwg tuaj tso rua ntawm tug npluanuj ib saab qhovrooj.
Nwg xaav has tas nyaj nwg yuav tau noj tej mov kws poob sau tug npluanuj lub rooj lug, txawm yog nwg txomnyem npaum le ntawd los dlev tseem lug yaim nwg tej qhov txhaab hab.
Thaus tug txomnyem ntawd tuag, cov timtswv ceebtsheej lug coj nwg moog nyob ntawm Anplahaas ib saab. Thaus tug npluanuj tuag, luas coj nwg moog log,
hab nwg raug txomnyem nyob huv tubtuag teb.  Nwg tsaa qhovmuag saib sau, nwg pum Anplahaas nyob dleb dleb, hab pum Laxalus nyob ntawm Anplahaas ib saab.

Tug npluanuj hu has tas, ‘Txiv Anplahaas! Thov koj hlub kuv, hab khaiv Laxalus muab nwg tug ntivteg moog tub dlej tuaj rua kuv tug nplaig kuas laaj mivntsiv, rua qhov kuv nyob huv cov nplaim tawg nuav, kuv txomnyem kawg le!’

Tabsis Anplahaas teb has tas, ‘Mivtub, koj puas ncu thaus koj tseem ua neej nyob, koj muaj noj muaj naav, Laxalus txomnyem tsi muaj dlaabtsi le. Nwgnuav nwg tau zoo, koj tsua moog nyob huv qhov txomnyem.

Tsi taag le ntawd xwb, tseem muaj ib tug kwj tub tub quas peb hab mej lawm, cov saab tim peb nuav yuav tuaj rua saab tim mej los yeej tsi tau, hab cov saab tim mej yuav hlaa tuaj rua saab tim peb nuav los yeej tsi tau.’
Tug npluanuj has tas, ‘Txiv Anplahaas, thov koj khaiv Laxalus rov moog kuas txug kuv txiv tsev,
kuv tshuav tsib tug kwvtij, kuas Laxalus moog qha rua puab, nyob tsaam puab yuav tau lug nyob huv qhov txomnyem nuav hab.’
Anplahaas teb has tas, ‘Koj cov kwvtij tub muaj Mauxes txuj kevcai hab tej lug kws cov cev Vaajtswv lug sau tseg lawm, ca puab coj lawv le tej lug ntawd.’
Tug npluanuj teb has tas, ‘Txiv Anplahaas, tsi yog le ntawd, yog ib tug kws tuag lawm, sawv rov moog qha rua puab, puab txhaj le yuav tso puab tej kev txhum tseg.’
Tabsis Anplahaas has tas, ‘Yog puab tsi noog Mauxes hab cov kws cev Vaajtswv lug tej lug qha, ces txawm yog ib tug kws tuag lawm sawv rov qaab moog qha rua puab los puab yeej yuav tsi ntseeg le.’ ”
Yexus has rua nwg cov thwjtim has tas, “Ua le caag los yeej yuav muaj ib yaam ua rua tuabneeg ua txhum, tabsis tug kws ua yaam ntawd, nwg yuav raug kev puamtsuaj!
Yog tug ntawd ua rua cov mivnyuas nuav ib tug ua txhum, ca le muab hlua khi ib txhib zeb kws luj dlai rua tug ntawd cejdlaab hab coj nwg moog pov rua huv havtxwv yuav zoo dlua!
Yog le ntawd, mej yuavtsum ceevfaaj zoo! “Yog koj pum koj ib tug kwvtij ua txhum rua koj, koj yuavtsum ntuag nwg. Yog nwg leeg nwg tej kev txhum lawm, koj ca le zaam txim rua nwg.
Yog ib nub nwg ua txhum rua koj xyaa zag, hab txhua zag kws nwg tuaj leeg rua koj has tas, ‘Kuv ua txhum lawm,’ koj yuavtsum zaam txim rua nwg.”
Cov timthawj has rua Yexus has tas, “Thov koj paab kuas peb muab sab rau ntseeg ntxiv.”

Tug Tswv has rua puab tas, “Yog mej muaj kev ntseeg luaj le lub noob zaub, mej yuav has rua tsob ntoo zaub kaab nuav has tas, ‘Koj ca le rhu hlo moog cog rua huv havtxwv,’ ces tsob ntoo zaub kaab ntawd yuav noog mej has.
“Mej cov yog leejtwg muaj ib tug tubkhai moog laij lag lossis moog yug yaaj lawm, thaus nwg rov qaab nraag laj lug, mej puas yuav has rua tug tubkhai ntawd tas, ‘Koj ca le lug noj mov?’
Mej yeej yuav tsi has le ntawd! Mej yuav has rua nwg tas, ‘Ca le tu cev khov kho moog ua mov rua kuv noj, thaus kuv noj kuv haus taag; koj maam le noj.’
Txawm yog tug tubkhai ua lawv le mej has los tsi taag mej yuav ua nwg tsaug.
Mej cov los kuj ib yaam nkaus; thaus mej ua lawv le kuv kuas mej ua taag lawm, mej ca le has tas, ‘Peb yog cov tubkhai kws tsi tseemceeb dlaabtsi le, peb tsuas ua lawv le peb teg num xwb.’ ”
Thaus Yexus moog nraag lub nroog Yeluxalees, nwg hlaa lub xeev Kalilais moog.
Thaus nwg taabtom yuav moog rua huv ib lub zog, nwg ntsib kaum tug mob ruas. Puab sawv dleb dleb
hab hu nrov nrov has tas, “Tswv Yexus! Thov koj hlub peb!”
Thaus Yexus pum dlheev puab, nwg has rua puab tas, “Mej ca le moog cuag cov povthawj kuas puab saib mej.” Thaus cov tuabneeg mob ruas ntawd taabtom moog, puab tej ruas tub zoo lawm.
Puab cov ntawd muaj ib tug pum has tas, nwg tej ruas zoo taag lawm, nwg txawm rov qaab lug hab has nrov nrov ua Vaajtswv tsaug.
Nwg txhus caug ndlua ntawm Yexus kutaw ua Yexus tsaug. Tug ntawd yog tuabneeg Xamalis.
Yexus has tas, “Kaum leej tub zoo huv tuabsi lawm; cuaj leeg dlua twg taag lawm?
Vim le caag tsuas muaj tuab leeg kws yog lwm Tsaav tuabneeg lug ua Vaajtswv tsaug xwb?”
Hab Yexus has rua tug ntawd tas, “Koj ca le sawv tseeg moog tsev; koj txujkev ntseeg tub ua rua koj tej ruas zoo lawm.”

Cov Falixais muaj qee leej nug Yexus has tas, thaus twg Vaajtswv lub Tebchaws maam le lug? Yexus teb has tas, “Thaus kws Vaajtswv lub tebchaws lug, yuav tsi muaj ib yaam dlaabtsi qha rua leejtwg paub.
Tsi muaj leejtwg yuav has tas, ‘Mej saib, nwg nyob ntawm nuav’ lossis ‘Nyob tod!’; Rua qhov Vaajtswv lub Tebchaws tub lug lawm.”
Yexus has rua cov thwjtim has tas, “Yeej yuav muaj ib lub sijhawm kws mej xaav pum nub kws Tuabneeg Leej Tub rov lug, tabsis mej yuav tsi pum.
Yuav muaj tuabneeg has rua mej has tas, ‘Mej moog saib tod!’ lossis ‘Mej lug saib ntawm nuav!’ Tabsis mej tsi xob moog saib.
Nub kws Tuabneeg Leej Tub lug, yuav muaj tsaglig xub laim sau nruab ntug, ib saab ntuj moog rua ib saab ntuj.
Tabsis ua ntej ntawd, nwg tub xub raug kev tsimtxom ntau yaam hab cov tuabneeg tam nuav tsi leeg yuav nwg.
Tam kws Nau-es ua neej nyob zoo le caag, lub sijhawm kws Tuabneeg Leej Tub lug yuav zoo ib yaam nkaus le ntawd.
Tej tuabneeg suavdlawg naj nub noj haus, ua tshoob ua kug moog txug nub kws Nau-es nce moog rua huv nkoj, hab dlej lug nyaab tej tuabneeg ntawd tuag taag huv tuabsi.
Lub sijhawm kws Tuabneeg Leej Tub lug yuav zoo ib yaam le tam kws Lauj nyob. Tej tuabneeg suavdlawg naj nub ua noj ua haus, ua laag ua luam, ua laj ua teb, hab ua vaaj ua tsev.
Nub kws Lauj tawm huv lub nroog Xaudoos moog, txawm muaj nplaim tawg hab leejfaaj poob sau ntuj lug kub tej tuabneeg tuag taag huv tuabsi.
Nub kws Tuabneeg Leej Tub lug, yuav zoo ib yaam nkaus le ntawd.
“Nub ntawd tug kws nyob nrau zoov, tsi xob moog nqaa nwg tej qhov txhua chaw huv tsev; ib yaam le ntawd, tug kws moog rua tom teb lawm, tsi xob rov qaab lug rua huv tsev.
Mej yuavtsum ncu ntsoov txug Lauj tug quaspuj!
Tug kws khauvxwm nwg txujsa, tug ntawd yuav tsi tau txujsa; tug kws tsi khauvxwm nwg txujsa, tug ntawd yuav tau txujsa.
Kuv qha rua mej has tas mo ntawd, ob tug tuabneeg kws pw ib txaag, yuav coj ib tug moog, tseg ib tug ca.
Ob tug quaspuj kws zum zeb ua ke: yuav coj ib tug moog, tseg ib tug ca
[Ob tug txivneej kws nyob tom teb, yuav coj ib tug moog, tseg ib tug ca.]”
Cov thwjtim nug Yexus has tas, “Tug Tswv, yuav muaj le ntawd nyob rua qhov twg?” Yexus teb has tas, “Cev tuag nyob qhov twg, dlaav npoj yuav sau nthwv moog rua qhov ntawd.”
Yexus has ib zaaj lug pevtxwv rua nwg cov thwjtim has tas, kuas puab naj nub thov Vaajtswv tsi xob qaug zug.
Yexus has tas, “Nyob huv ib lub nroog, muaj ib tug txav txim kws tsi ntshai Vaajtswv hab tsi fwm leejtwg le.
Nyob huv lub nroog ntawd muaj ib tug puj ntsuag kws naj nub tuaj thov tug txav txim ntawd has tas ‘Thov koj paab has rooj plaub kws luas kom kuv!’
Thaus chivthawj tug txav txim tsi kaam has, tabsis tom qaab ntawd, nwg xaav has tas, ‘Txawm yog kuv tsi ntshai Vaajtswv hab tsi fwm leejtwg le los
tug puj ntsuag nuav pheej tuaj txob kuv, kuv yuav tau paab nwg has kuas taag, nwg txhaj yuav tsi naj nub tuaj txob kuv kuas kuv ntxhuv sab!’ ”
Tug Tswv has rua puab ntxiv tas, “Mej tub nov tug txav txim kws sab tsi ncaaj ntawd tej lug lawm.
Vaajtswv tsaav tuabneeg kws naj nub naj mo thov Vaajtswv paab, Vaajtswv yuav tsi paab has puab zaaj los? Vaajtswv yuav tog ntev maam le paab puab los?
Kuv qha rua mej has tas, ‘Vaajtswv yeej yuav paab has puab zaaj sai sai. Thaus Tuabneeg Leej Tub lug, cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv nplajteb nuav puas yuav muaj tug kws ntseeg nwg lawm?’ ”
Hab Yexus has ib zaaj lug pevtxwv rua cov tuabneeg kws khaav has tas, puab yog tuabneeg ncaaj hab puab saib tsi taug lwm tug le nuav,
“Muaj ib zag ob tug txivneej moog thov Vaajtswv huv lub Tuamtsev: ib tug yog tug Falixais hab ib tug yog tug sau se.

“Tug Falixais sawv ntsug hab nwg thov  has tas, ‘Vaajtswv, kuv ua koj tsaug, kuv zoo tsi thooj le lwm tug, kuv tsi ua tuabneeg sab hlub, kuv yog tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg, kuv tsi zig luas tej quaspuj, hab kuv tsi zoo le tug sau se ntawd.
Xyaa nub twg kuv ua kevcai yoo mov ob zag, hab tej nyaj kws kuv khwv tau lug, kuv muab ib feem kaum rua koj.’
“Tabsis tug sau se sawv nrug dleb mivntsiv, nwg tsi tsaa qhovmuag saib sau ntuj, nwg ntaus nwg lub hauvsab hab has tas, ‘Vaajtswv, kuv yog tuabneeg txhum, thov koj taabncuab kuv!’

Yexus has tas, ‘Kuv qha rua mej has tas, thaus obtug rov moog tsev lawm, tug sau se yog tug kws ua hum Vaajtswv sab, tsi yog tug Falixais. Rua qhov tug kws khaav has tas, nwg muaj fwjchim, tug ntawd yuav poob fwjchim, tabsis tug kws txu fwjchim, tug ntawd yuav tau fwjchim.’ ”
Muaj tuabneeg coj puab cov mivnyuas tuaj cuag Yexus hab thov nwg cev teg plhw puab tej mivnyuas. Thaus cov thwjtim pum le ntawd, puab txwv tsi pub cov tuabneeg ua le ntawd,

tabsis Yexus hu cov mivnyuas yau lug cuag nwg hab has tas, “Ca le tso cov mivnyuas yau lug cuag kuv, tsi xob txwv puab, rua qhov Vaajtswv lub Tebchaws yog cov tuabneeg kws muaj lub sab zoo le cov mivnyuas yau nuav tug.
Kuv qha rua mej has tas, yog leejtwg tsi txais yuav Vaajtswv lub Tebchaws ib yaam le cov mivnyuas yau nuav, ces tug ntawd yuav tsi tau moog rua huv Vaajtswv lub Tebchaws le.”
Cov Yudais ib tug thawjcoj tuaj nug Yexus has tas, “Tug Xwbfwb kws muaj lub sab zoo, kuv yuav ua le caag kuv txhaj tau txujsa ntev dlhawv moog ibtxhis?”
Yexus nug nwg has tas, “Vim le caag koj hu kuv has tas, tug kws muaj lub sab zoo? Yeej tsi muaj leejtwg sab zoo le, tsuas yog Vaajtswv tuab leeg xwb.
Koj yeej paub Vaajtswv txuj Kevcai kws has tas, ‘Tsi xob ntxag luas quaspuj luas quasyawg; tsi xob tua tuabneeg; tsi xob ua tubsaab; tsi xob ua timkhawv tsi tseeb, hab fwm koj nam koj txiv.’ ”
Tug txivneej ntawd teb has tas, “Tej kevcai kws koj has ko kuv tub coj txhua nqai thaus kuv tseem yau lug lawm.”

Thaus Yexus nov nwg has le ntawd, Yexus has rua nwg tas, “Tseem tshuav ib yaam kws koj tsi tau ua. Koj ca le moog muab koj tej qhov txhua chaw muag huv tuabsi, hab muab cov nyaj ntawd faib rua cov tuabneeg pluag, koj txhaj yuav yog tug kws npluanuj nyob sau ntuj ceebtsheej; tom qaab ntawd, koj ca le tuaj nrug kuv moog.”
Thaus tug txivneej ntawd nov Yexus has le ntawd, nwg nyuaj sab kawg le, rua qhov nwg npluanuj heev.
Thaus Yexus pum tug ntawd nyuaj sab heev, Yexus has tas, “Cov tuabneeg npluanuj yuav moog Vaajtswv lub tebchaws mas nyuaj kawg le!
Ib tug ntxhuav nkaag lub qhov koob tseem yoojyim dlua ib tug tuabneeg pluanuj yuav moog rua Vaajtswv lub Tebchaws.”
Cov tuabneeg kws nov Yexus has le ntawd, puab nug Yexus has tas, “Yog le ntawd, leejtwg txhaj yuav dlim tau?”
Yexus teb has tas, “Tej kws tuabneeg ua tsi tau, Vaajtswv ua tau.”
Ces Petus has rua Yexus has tas, “Peb tub tso vaaj tse tseg hab tuaj nrug koj moog lawm.”
Yexus has rua puab tas, “Kuv qha tseeb rua mej has tas, yog leejtwg tso vaaj tse, tso quaspuj mivnyuas, tso kwvtij hab tso nam tso txiv tseg, vim nwg xaav tau Vaajtswv lub Tebchaws,
tam nuav nwg yuav tau ntau dlua tej kws nwg muab tso tseg lawm, hab lwm tam, nwg yuav tau txujsa ntev dlhawv moog ibtxhis.”

Yexus coj nwg kaum ob tug thwjtim moog rua ib qho hab nwg has rua puab tas, “Mej ua tuab zoo noog! Peb yuav moog rua nraag lub nroog Yeluxalees, kuas txhua yaam tav lawv le tej kws cov cev Vaajtswv lug tau sau has txug Tuabneeg Leej Tub lawm.
Yuav muaj tuabneeg nteg nwg coj moog rua lwm tsaav tuabneeg, puab yuav saib tsi taug nwg, thuam nwg hab nti quavncaug rua nwg.
Puab yuav muab nwg nplawm hab muab nwg tua povtseg, tabsis tom qaab ntawd peb nub, nwg yuav sawv rov qaab lug.”
Cov thwjtim tsi totaub tej kws Yexus has; Yexus tsi qha lub ntsab lug rua puab, puab txhaj tsi paub sov Yexus has txug dlaabtsi.
Thaus Yexus moog yuav txug lub nroog Yelikaus, muaj ib tug txivneej dligmuag nyob quastsawg ntawm ntug kev thov khawv.
Thaus tug dligmuag nov muaj tuabneeg coob coob thaam zum zawg taug kev tuaj, nwg nug has tas, “Mej ua dlaabtsi?”
Puab qha rua nwg has tas, “Yexus tug kws yog tuabneeg Naxales taabtom taug kev tuaj.”
Tug dligmuag ntawd hu nrov nrov has tas, “Yexus kws yog Daviv tug Tub! Thov koj taabncuab kuv!”
Cov tuabneeg kws nyob ntawm nwg hauv ntej txwv kuas nwg nyob tuabywv tsi xob qw. Tabsis nwg hajyam qw nrov nrov has tas, “Daviv tug Tub, thov koj taabncuab kuv!”
Yog le ntawd, Yexus txawm nreg hab kuas puab coj tug dligmuag lug cuag nwg. Thaus tug dligmuag lug ze lawm, Yexus nug nwg has tas,
“Koj xaav kuas kuv ua dlaabtsi rua koj?” Tug dligmuag teb has tas, “Tug Tswv, thov paab kuas kuv pum kev.”
Yexus has rua nwg has tas, “Koj ca le pum kev! Koj txujkev ntseeg tub ua rua koj pum kev lawm.”
Taamsim ntawd nwg txawm pum kev, nwg nrug Yexus moog hab ua Vaajtswv tsaug. Thaus cov tuabneeg coob coob pum le ntawd, puab qhuas Vaajtswv kawg le.
Yexus tuaj txug huv lub nroog Yelikaus, hab yuav dlhau moog.
Nyob huv muaj ib tug txivneej hu ua Xakhais, nwg yog cov sau se tug thawj hab nwg muaj nyaj heev.
Xakhais xaav pum saib Yexus yog tug twg, tabsis muaj tuabneeg coob coob thaiv nwg, nwg saib tsi pum Yexus, rua qhov nwg yog tuabneeg qegtaub.
Xakhais txhaj dlha fuas suavdlawg ntej moog nce ib tsob ntoo xikamaus, kuas nwg pum Yexus, rua qhov Yexus yuav taug txujkev ntawd tuaj.
Thaus Yexus tuaj txug ntawd, Yexus tsaa qhovmuag saib hab has rua Xakhais has tas, “Xakhais, koj ca le nqeg lug, rua qhov nub nua kuv yuav moog su huv koj tsev.”
Xakhais txawm nqeg nrawm nroog lug tog txais Yexus, hab zoo sab kawg le.
Cov tuabneeg kws pum le ntawd, puab thuam has tas, “Ua le caag Yexus yuav moog su huv tug tuabneeg txhum tsev!”

Xakhais sawv ntsug hab has rua Yexus has tas, “Tug Tswv, koj noog kuv has! Kuv yuav muab tej kws kuv muaj ib nraab faib rua cov tuabneeg pluag. Hab yog kuv tau muab leejtwg ib yaam dlaabtsi lug yuav lawm, kuv yuav them plaub npaug rov qaab rua tug ntawd.”
Yexus has tas, “Nub nua txujkev cawm dlim tub lug rua huv tug txivneej nuav lub tsev lawm. Tug txivneej nuav yog Anplahaas ib tug xeebntxwv hab.
Tuabneeg leej Tub yeej lug nrhav cov tuabneeg kws yuam kev lawm hab cawm kuas puab dlim.”

Thaus cov tuabneeg tseem taabtom noog Yexus has ntawd, Yexus txawm has ib zaaj lug pevtxwv rua puab noog. Thaus nwg moog yuav txug huv lub nroog Yeluxalees, hab tej tuabneeg xaav has tas, Vaajtswv lub Tebchaws tub lug yuav txug.
Yexus has tas, “Muaj ib tug nom taabtom yuav sawv kev moog rua lwm lub tebchaws dleb dleb, kuas luas muab nwg tsaa ua vaajntxwv, nwg maam le rov qaab lug.
Thaus nwg yuav moog, nwg hu nwg kaum tug tubkhai lug, hab nwg muab nyaj rua puab ib leeg ib choj; hab has rua puab tas, ‘Mej ca le coj cov nyaj nuav moog ua laag ua luam, kuas txug nub kuv rov lug.’
Tabsis cov pejxeem kws nyob huv tug nom ntawd lub tebchaws ntxub nwg, puab txawm khaiv tuabneeg lawv qaab moog has tas, ‘Peb tsi yuav tug nom nuav ua peb tug vaajntxwv.’
“Thaus luas tsaa tug nom ntawd ua vaajntxwv lawm, nwg rov qaab lug, hab hu kuas cov tubkhai kws nwg muab nyaj rua tuaj cuag nwg, saib puab moog ua luam ib leeg tsaam pistsawg.
Thawj tug tubkhai lug has tas, ‘Tug tswv, choj nyaj kws koj muab rua kuv, kuv coj moog ua luam tsaam kaum choj.’
Tug tswv has tas, ‘Zoo heev, koj yog tug tubkhai kws noog lug! Vim koj ua ncaaj rua tej yaam miv miv nuav, kuv yuav tsaa koj ua tug kws saib kaum lub nroog.’
Tug tubkhai ob lug has tas, ‘Tug tswv, choj nyaj kws koj muab rua kuv, kuv coj moog ua luam tsaam tsib choj.’
Tug tswv has rua tug tubkhai ntawd has tas, ‘Koj yuav tau ua tug saib tsib lub nroog.’
Muaj dlua ib tug tubkhai lug has tas, ‘Tug tswv, choj nyaj kws koj muab rua kuv nyob ntawm nuav; kuv muab phuam qhwv khaws ca zoo zoo.
Kuv ntshai koj, rua qhov koj yog ib tug tuabneeg nyaum heev. Koj ibtxwm hlais tej kws tsi yog koj cog, hab sau tej kws tsi yog koj tseb.’

Tug tswv has rua tug tubkhai ntawd has tas, ‘Tug tubkhai kws sab phem! Kuv yuav rau txim rua koj lawv le tej lug kws koj has! Koj tub paub has tas, kuv yog ib tug tuabneeg kws nyaum heev, kuv ibtxwm hlais tej kws tsi yog kuv cog, hab sau tej kws tsi yog kuv tseb.
Ua le caag koj tsi muab kuv choj nyaj coj moog tso rua huv txhaab nyaj? thaus kuv rov qaab lug, kuv txhaj tau kuv choj nyaj hab tau tej paaj ntxiv?’
Nwg has rua cov tuabneeg kws sawv ntawd has tas, ‘Mej ca le muab nwg choj nyaj coj moog ntxiv rua tug tubkhai kws muaj kaum choj.’
Puab has rua tug tswv has tas, ‘Tug tswv, tug ntawd tub muaj kaum choj lawm!’

Tug tswv teb has tas, ‘Kuv qha rua mej has tas, txhua tug kws muaj lawm, yeej yuav muab ntxiv kuas nwg muaj ntau dlua, tabsis tug kws tsi muaj, txawm yog nwg muaj mivntsiv xwb los yuav muab rhu tawm ntawm nwg moog.
Ca le coj kuv cov yeebncuab kws tsi yuav kuv ua puab tug vaajntxwv lug ntawm nuav, hab muab puab tua taabmeeg kuv!’ ”
Thaus Yexus has le nuav taag, nwg txawm ua puab ntej moog rua nraag lub nroog Yeluxalees.
Thaus Yexus moog yuav txug lub zog Npefakhes hab lub zog Npethanis kws nyob ntawm lub roob txiv ntoo roj, nwg txawm khaiv ob tug thwjtim ua nwg ntej moog,

hab qha obtug has tas, “Meb ca le ncaaj nraim moog rua huv lub zog kws nyob tom meb hauv ntej; thaus meb moog txug, meb yuav pum ib tug mivnyuas neeg luav kws tsi tau muaj tuabneeg caij dlua le, khi ca qhov ntawd. Meb ca le dlaws caab lug rua kuv ntawm nuav.
Yog muaj leejtwg nug has tas, ‘Meb yuav dlaws caab moog ua dlaabtsi?’ Meb teb tug ntawd has tas, ‘Tug Tswv  xaav siv.’ ”
Obtug moog pum txhua yaam lawv le Yexus qha rua obtug.
Thaus obtug taabtom dlaws tug mivnyuas neeg luav, tug tswv txawm nug obtug has tas, “Meb yuav dlaws caab moog ua dlaabtsi?”
Obtug teb has tas, “Tug Tswv xaav siv.” Obtug caab tug mivnyuas neeg luav lug rua Yexus.
Obtug hle obtug ob lub tsho ntev lug pua tug mivnyuas neeg luav nrausqaum rua Yexus caij.
Thaus Yexus caij tug mivnyuas neeg luav taug kev moog, tej tuabneeg suavdlawg hle puab tej tsho lug pua huv kev.

Thaus Yexus moog yuav txug lub nroog Yeluxalees, ntawm txujkev kws nqeg peg lub Roob Txiv Ntoo Roj lug, cov tuabneeg coob coob kws yog Yexus cov thwjtim txawm ua Vaajtswv tsaug, vim tej txujci tseemceeb kws puab tau pum, hab puab qhuas Vaajtswv nrov nrov has tas,
“Thov Vaajtswv foom koob moov rua tug vaajntxwv kws Vaajtswv khaiv lug! Thov kuas sau ntuj muaj kev kaaj sab lug, hab kuas suavdlawg fwm Vaajtswv tug kws muaj tshwjchim ci ntsaa ab!”
Cov Falixais qee leej kws nrug cov tuabneeg coob coob ntawd has rua Yexus has tas, “Xwbfwb, koj has kuas koj cov thwjtim nyob tuabywv!”
Yexus teb puab has tas, “Kuv qha rua mej has tas, yog puab cov nuav nyob tuabywv lawm, tej pobzeb yeej yuav qw.”
Thaus Yexus tuaj ze lub nroog Yeluxalees, nwg pum lub nroog, nwg quaj,
nwg has tas, “Kheev laam koj paub tej kws yuav paab kuas koj nyob kaaj sab lug! Tabsis nwgnuav koj tsi paub tej ntawd.
Rua qhov muaj ib nub koj cov yeebncuab yuav tuaj puab ntsaa yeej vij koj, hab yuav tuaj txhua ceg kaum tuaj puav koj.

Puab yuav ua rua koj hab koj cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv koj, kuas puamtsuaj taag huv tuabsi. Puab yuav tsi ca ob lub pobzeb nyob sis tsuam ua ke, rua qhov koj tsi ncu txug lub sijhawm kws Vaajtswv lug paab koj lawm.”
Yexus moog rua ntawm lub Tuamtsev hab ntab tej tuabneeg kws tuaj ua luam kuas tawm moog,
hab nwg has rua puab tas, “Vaajtswv txujlug sau tseg has tas, ‘Kuv lub Tuamtsev yog qhov chaw thov Vaajtswv.’ Tabsis mej muab ua chaw rua tubsaab nkaum.”
Yexus naj nub qha huv lub Tuamtsev, cov thawj ntawm cov povthawj, cov xwbfwb kws qha Vaajtswv txuj Kevcai, hab cov thawjcoj ntawm cov pejxeem xaav muab Yexus tua povtseg,
tabsis puab ua tsi tau le caag rua Yexus, rua qhov suavdlawg nyam noog tej kws Yexus qha heev.
Muaj ib nub thaus Yexus qhuab qha cov tuabneeg huv lub Tuamtsev, hab qha Txujmoo Zoo, cov thawj ntawm cov povthawj, cov xwbfwb kws qha Vaajtswv txuj Kevcai, hab cov txwjlaug tuaj
nug Yexus has tas, “Koj qha rua peb saib, ua le caag koj muaj cai ua tej nuav? Leejtwg tso cai rua koj?”
Yexus teb puab has tas, “Kuv yuav nug mej ib lus. Mej qha rua kuv saib,
leejtwg tso cai rua Yauhaas muab tuabneeg ua kevcai raus dlej, Vaajtswv lossis tuabneeg?”
Puab txawm sis thaam has tas, “Peb yuav has le caag? Yog peb has tas ‘Vaajtswv kuas Yauhaas ua,’ nwg yuav has rua peb tas, ‘Ua le caag mej tsua tsi ntseeg Yauhaas tej lug?’
Yog peb has tas, ‘Tuabneeg kuas Yauhaas ua,’ Cov tuabneeg coob coob kws nyob ntawd nuav yuav muab pobzeb ntaus peb, rua qhov suavdlawg yeej paub has tas, Yauhaas yog ib tug cev Vaajtswv lug.”
Puab teb has tas, “Peb tsi paub, sov leejtwg tso cai rua nwg.”
Yexus has rua puab tas, “Yog le ntawd, kuv yuav tsi qha rua mej has tas, leejtwg tso cai rua kuv ua tej nuav.”

Yexus has ib zaaj lug pevtxwv rua suavdlawg noog has tas, “Muaj ib tug txivneej cog tau ib vaaj txiv maab. Nwg muab tso rua ib cov tuabneeg tu sis faib cov txiv. Ces nwg txawm moog rua lwm tebchaws tau ntev loo.

Thaus txug lub caij dle txiv maab, nwg khaiv ib tug tubkhai moog cuag cov tuabneeg kws tu lub vaaj hab sau tej txiv maab kws yog nwg tug lug rua nwg. Tabsis cov tuabneeg kws tu lub vaaj muab tug tubkhai ntawd ntaus, hab ntab tug tubkhai ntawd rov qaab lug tsev teg dlawb teg nplag.
Tug tswv vaaj tsua khaiv dlua ib tug tubkhai moog, tabsis cov tuabneeg kws tu lub vaaj muab tug tubkhai ntawd ntaus, ua limham rua nwg, hab kuas nwg rov qaab lug teg dlawb teg nplag.
Tug tswv vaaj rov khaiv dlua tug tubkhai peb moog, cov tuabneeg kws tu lub vaaj muab tug tubkhai ntawd ntaus nqaj ndluag ntshaav nrug, hab muab nwg pov rua saab ntug vaaj nrau.
Ces tug tswv vaaj has tas, ‘Kuv yuav ua le caag? Yog kuv khaiv kuv tug tub kws kuv hlub moog, nyaj puab yuav fwm kuv tug tub!’
Tabsis thaus cov tuabneeg kws tu lub vaaj pum tug tswv tug tub tuaj, puab txawm sis ntxhi has tas, ‘Tug nuav yog tug tswv vaaj tug tub, peb ca le muab nwg tua povtseg, peb txhaj tau nwg lub vaaj!’
Cov tuabneeg kws tu lub vaaj muab tug tub ntawd thawb rua saab ntug vaaj nrau, hab muab nwg tua povtseg.” Yexus nug has tas, “Tug tswv vaaj yuav ua le caag rua cov tuabneeg kws tu lub vaaj ntawd?
Tug tswv vaaj yeej yuav muab cov tuabneeg kws tu lub vaaj tua povtseg, hab muab lub vaaj ntawd rua lwm cov tu.” Thaus suavdlawg nov Yexus has le ntawd, puab has tas, “Nyaj yuav tsi muaj le ntawd.”
Yexus saib puab hab nug has tas, “Vaajtswv txujlug has le caag? ‘Lub pobzeb kws cov kws ua tsev muab povtseg, lub ntawd tub lug ua lub thawj lawm.’
Yog leejtwg qaug moog tsoo lub pobzeb ntawd, tug ntawd lub cev yuav tawg taag; yog lub pobzeb ntawd poob lug tsoo leejtwg, tug ntawd lub cev yuav ntsoog taag huv tuabsi.”

Cov xwbfwb kws qha Vaajtswv txuj Kevcai hab cov thawj ntawm cov povthawj xaav nteg Yexus, rua qhov puab paub has tas, zaaj lug pevtxwv kws Yexus has ntawd, yog nwg tshev puab; tabsis puab ntshai cov pejxeem.

Puab tog saib puas muaj sijhawm zoo nteg Yexus. Puab ndlav qee leej kuas ua txuj ua le tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg moog nug Yexus, saib nwg puas yuav has txhum, puab txhaj zoo nteg nwg coj moog rua tug tswvxeev kws muaj fwjchim.

Cov tuabneeg kws puab ndlav moog nug Yexus has tas, “Xwbfwb, peb paub has tas tej lug kws koj has, hab tej kws koj qha puavleej yog huv tuabsi. Peb paub has tas koj tsi xaiv leejtwg ntsejmuag le, tabsis koj qha Vaajtswv txujlug tseeb rua suavdlawg.
Koj sim qha rua peb saib, yog peb them se rua Xixas puas txhum peb txuj kevcai los tsi txhum?”
Tabsis Yexus tub xub paub puab lub sab lawm, nwg has rua puab tas,
“Mej ca le muab ib lub nyaj rua kuv saib, lub ntsejmuag hab lub npe kws sau rua ntawm lub nyaj nuav yog leejtwg lub?” Puab teb has tas, “Yog Xixas lub.”
Yexus has rua puab tas, “Yaam kws yog Xixas le, mej ca le muab rua Xixas, hab yaam kws yog Vaajtswv le, mej ca le muab rua Vaajtswv.”
Puab nrhav tsi tau ib qho kuas Yexus has txhum taabmeeg suavdlawg; puab xaav tsi thoob rua tej lug kws Yexus has ntawd, puab txawm nyob tuabywv lawm.
Cov Xadukais qee leej kws tsi ntseeg has tas tuabneeg yuav sawv huv qhov tuag rov qaab lug, puab tuaj cuag Yexus hab nug has tas,

“Xwbfwb, Mauxes sau txuj Kevcai nuav qha peb has tas, ‘Yog tug quasyawg tuag lawm, nwg tug quaspuj tseem tsi tau muaj mivnyuas, nwg tug kwv yuavtsum yuav tug namtij, tug tijlaug txhaj muaj xeebntxwv.’
Thaus muaj xyaa tug kwvtij, tug tijlaug yuav quaspuj tabsis tsi tau muaj mivnyuas, tug tijlaug tuag lawm,
tug kwv yuav tug namtij,
tug kwv peb yuav tug namtij ntawd hab. Xyaa leej kwvtij puavleej yuav tug quaspuj ntawd, puab puavleej tuag taag, tsi tau muaj ib tug mivnyuas le.
Thaus kawg tug quaspuj ntawd txawm tuag lawm hab.
Yog le ntawd, nub kws cov tuabneeg tuag sawv rov qaab lug, tug quaspuj ntawd yuav yog leejtwg tug quaspuj? Rua qhov puab xyaa leej puavleej tau yuav nwg huv tuabsi lawm.”
Yexus teb has tas, “Cov quaspuj hab quasyawg tam nuav txhaj le sis yuav xwb,
tabsis cov quaspuj hab cov quasyawg kws tsimnyog sawv lug tau txujsa hab moog nyob tam tom ntej, cov ntawd tsi sis yuav le lawm.
Puab yuav zoo ib yaam le cov timtswv ceebtsheej hab yuav tsi tuag le. Puab yog Vaajtswv cov mivnyuas, rua qhov puab tub sawv huv qhov tuag rov qaab lug lawm.
Thaus Mauxes has txug cov nplaim tawg kws cig ntawm tsob ntoo, nwg hu tug Tswv has tas, ‘Anplahaas tug Vaajtswv, Ixaj tug Vaajtswv, hab Yakhauj tug Vaajtswv.’

Zaaj kws nwg has ntawd tub qha rua suavdlawg has tas, cov tuabneeg kws tuag lawm, yeej yuav sawv rov qaab lug tau txujsa. Vaajtswv yog cov tuabneeg caj tug Vaajtswv, nwg tsi yog cov tuabneeg tuag tug Vaajtswv. Lawv le Vaajtswv saib, txhua tug puavleej muaj sa nyob.”
Cov xwbfwb kws qha Vaajtswv txuj Kevcai qee leej has tas, “Xwbfwb, koj teb yog lawm!”
Puab has le ntawd vim puab tsi muaj cuabkaav nug ntxiv lawm.
Yexus nug puab has tas, “Yuav ua le caag has tau tas, tug Mexiyas yog Daviv tug Tub?
Rua qhov Daviv sau tseg rua huv phoo Ntawv Nkauj has tas: ‘Tug Tswv has rua kuv tug Tswv has tas: Koj ca le lug nyob ntawm kuv saab xis
moog txug thaus kuv muab koj cov yeebncuab lug rua koj tsuj.’
Daviv tub hu nwg has tas ‘Tug Tswv;’ yuav ua le caag has tau tas, tug Mexiyas yog Daviv tug Tub?”
Thaus cov tuabneeg taabtom noog Yexus qha, Yexus has rua nwg cov thwjtim has tas,

“Mej yuavtsum ceevfaaj, tsi xob ua le cov xwbfwb kws qha Vaajtswv txuj Kevcai, puab nyam naav tej tsho ntev moog rua nuav rua u, hab thaus puab moog tom tej kab, puab nyam kuas suavdlawg fwm puab; thaus puab moog huv tej tsev saablaaj lossis moog nrug luas noj luas haus, puab moog xaiv nyob lub chaw zoo xwb;
Puab txhaav tej puj ntsuag tug yuav, hab puab thov Vaajtswv ntev ntev kuas suavdlawg qhuas puab! Puab yeej yuav raug txim nyaav dlua lwm tug huv tuabsi!”
Yexus tsaa qhovmuag saib, nwg pum cov tuabneeg npluanuj tso nyaj rua huv lub phijxaab kws nyob huv lub Tuamtsev,
hab pum ib tug puj ntsuag pluag pluag taabtom muab ob lub txaj toog tso rua huv.
Yexus has tas, “Kuv qha rua mej has tas, tug puj ntsuag nuav tso ntau dlua lwm tug.
Rua qhov lwm tug muab tej nyaj kws seem tuaj tso xwb; tabsis tug puj ntsuag kws pluag pluag nuav, nwg muab hlo ob lub txaj toog kws nwg muaj tuaj tso huv tuabsi.”

Cov thwjtim qee leej sis thaam has txug lub Tuamtsev kws luas muab tej pobzeb kws zoo zoo nkauj lug ua, hab tej khoom kws luas coj tuaj fij rua Vaajtswv. Yexus has tas, “Tej kws mej pum nuav, thaus txug sijhawm lawm,
yuav tsi muaj ob lub pobzeb dlhos ua ke, txhua lub yuav pluam nyag nyob nyag taag huv tuabsi.”
Puab nug Yexus has tas, “Xwbfwb, thaus twg maam le muaj tej nuav? Hab yaam dlaabtsi yuav qha rua peb paub has tas, tub txug lub sijhawm kws yuav muaj tej ntawd lawm?”

Yexus qha has tas, “Mej yuavtsum ceevfaaj, tsi xob pub leejtwg dlaag ntxag tau mej yuam kev. Yuav muaj ntau leej tuav kuv lub npe has rua mej tas, ‘kuv yog nwg!’ Lub sijhawm tub lug ze lawm! Tabsis mej tsi xob caum cov tuabneeg ntawd moog.
Thaus mej nov muaj kev tsuv kev rog hab muaj kev kub ntxhuv los mej tsi xob ntshai. Yeej yuav xub muaj tej ntawd ua ntej, tabsis tsi tau qha has tas, tub txug lub sijhawm kawg lawm.”
Yexus has tas, “Ib tsaav tuabneeg yuav tawmtsaam ib tsaav tuabneeg; ib lub tebchaws yuav sawv tua ib lub tebchaws,
yuav muaj aav qeeg luj heev, yuav muaj kev tshaib kev nqhes, hab yuav muaj mob thoob plawg txhua qhov huv tuabsi; yuav muaj tej yaam tshwm sau nruab ntug ua rua suavdlawg ntshai kawg le.

Tabsis thaus tseem tsi tau muaj tej ntawd, yuav muaj tuabneeg nteg mej hab tsimtxom mej; puab yuav coj mej moog rua huv tej tsev saablaaj hab muab mej kaw rua huv tej tsev lojcuj. Luas yuav coj mej moog cuag tej vaajntxwv hab tej numtswv, vim mej yog cov kws ntseeg kuv.
Thaus ntawd yog lub sijhawm zoo rua mej qha Txujmoo Zoo.
Mej tsi xob txhawj has tas, mej yuav npaaj teb le caag txhaj zoo,
rua qhov kuv yuav pub tswvyim rua mej kuas mej txawj has, mej cov yeebncuab yuav teb tsi taug mej, hab nrhav tsi tau lug rua mej.
Mej nam mej txiv, mej tej kwvtij, mej tej neejtsaa hab mej tej phoojywg yuav muab mej coj moog rua tej numtswv, hab luas yuav muab mej qee leej tua povtseg.
Txhua tug yuav ntxub mej vim mej yog cov kws ntseeg kuv.
Tabsis txawm yog mej ib txuj plaubhau los yuav tsi tu sau mej taubhau moog.
Mej yuavtsum ua sab ntev nyaj tej kev txomnyem, mej txhaj yuav tau txujsa.
“Thaus mej pum tubrog tuaj vij lub nroog Yeluxalees, mej yuav paub has tas, tsi ntev lub nroog yuav puamtsuaj.

Lub sijhawm ntawd cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv xeev Yudas, puab yuavtsum tsiv moog rua peg tej roob; cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog yuavtsum tawm, hab cov tuabneeg kws nyob peg tej yaajsaab, tsi xob tsiv moog rua huv lub nroog.
Rua qhov lub sijhawm ntawd yog ‘Nub Rau Txim,’ kuas muaj tav lawv le Vaajtswv txujlug has tseg lawm.

Luj sijhawm ntawd tej quaspuj kws suab mivnyuas, hab tej quaspuj kws muaj mivnyuas mog yuav txomnyem kawg le! Lub tebchaws nuav yuav raug kev txomnyem kawg nkaus le. Vaajtswv yuav rau txim rua cov tuabneeg nuav.
Ibtxha yuav tuag rua nav ntaaj nav rag, hab ibtxha yuav raug nteg moog rua lwm lub tebchaws; hab lwm tsaav tuabneeg yuav tuaj tsuj lub nroog Yeluxalees moog txug nub kws tav lawv le lub sijhawm.
“Thaus ntawd lub nub, lub hli, hab tej nubqub yuav tsi zoo le qub lawm. Txhua tsaav tuabneeg kws nyob huv nplajteb nuav yuav yoob taag, hab ntshai lub suab dlej havtxwv ndlaas.
Tej tuabneeg yuav tsaus muag vim puab ntshai tej kws yuav muaj lug raug thoob plawg lub nplajteb nuav, rua qhov tej kws muaj fwjchim sau nruab ntug yuav ua zug koog.
Thaus ntawd suavdlawg yuav pum Tuabneeg Leej Tub tshwm sau nruab ntug, nwg lub fwjchim hab tug tshwjchim yuav ci ntsaa ab.
Thaus taabtom pib muaj tej nuav, mej yuavtsum sawv ntsug hab tsaa taubhau, rua qhov txujkev cawm dlim tub lug ze lawm.”
Yexus has ib zaaj lug pevtxwv rua puab noog has tas: “Mej sim saib tsob ntoo txiv ncuav pas hab txhua yaam ntoo.
Thaus mej pum tej ntoo ntawd pib hlaav nplooj, mej paub has tas tub yuav txug lub caij ntuj naag.
Ib yaam nkaus le ntawd, thaus mej pum tej ntawd, mej yuav paub has tas, Vaajtswv lub Tebchaws tub lug ze lawm.
“Kuv qha tseeb rua mej has tas, thaus cov tuabneeg tam nuav tseem tuag tsi tau taag, tub xub muaj tej ntawd lawm.
Lub ntuj hab lub nplajteb nuav yuav pluj moog, tabsis kuv tej lug yuav tsi muaj ib lus poob le.
“Mej yuavtsum ceevfaaj, tsi xob ca mej lub sab qaug rua kev noj kev haus, hab tsi xob txhawj rua mej lub neej lossis yuav ca nub ntawd lug txug thaus mej tsi ceevfaaj.
Rua qhov nub ntawd yuav lug khwb nkaus tej tuabneeg suavdlawg thoob plawg lub nplajteb nuav ib yaam le rooj yej.
Mej yuavtsum ceevfaaj hab zuv tog, naj nub thov Vaajtswv paab kuas mej nyaj taug txhua yaam kws yuav muaj lug nuav, hab mej txhaj yuav moog sawv taug ntawm Tuabneeg Leej Tub lub xubndlag.”
Yexus naj nub qha huv lub Tuamtsev, hab thaus tsaus ntuj nwg moog pw peg Roob Txiv Ntoo Roj.
Txhua taagkig sawv ntxuv, suavdlawg tuaj noog Yexus qhuab qha huv lub Tuamtsev.
Thaus yuav txug lub sijhawm ua Kevcai Noj Ncuav tsi xyaw Keeb kws hu ua Kevcai Hlaa Dlhau.

Cov thawj ntawm cov povthawj hab cov xwbfwb kws qha Vaajtswv txuj Kevcai txawm nrhav kev yuav nteg Yexus tuabywv coj moog tua povtseg, rua qhov puab tsi xaav nteg Yexus taabmeeg cov pejxeem, nyob tsaam suavdlawg ntxhuv.
Dlaab Ntxwgnyoog tshoov Yudas Ixakali-us tug kws yog ib tug ntawm kaum ob tug thwjtim sab.
Yudas has rua cov thawj ntawm cov povthawj, hab cov thawj tubrog kws zuv lub Tuamtsev has tas, nwg yuav coj puab moog nteg Yexus le caag.
Puab zoo sab hab txaus sab yuav muab nyaj rua Yudas.
Yudas pum zoo le puab has, nwg txawm nrhav sijhawm coj puab moog nteg Yexus thaus tsi muaj tuabneeg pum.
Thaus txug nub kws ua Kevcai Noj Ncuav Tsi Xyaw Keeb kws yog nub kws puab tua mivnyuas yaaj noj ua Kevcai Hlaa Dlhau.
Yexus khaiv Petus hab Yauhaas, hab qha rua obtug has tas, “Meb ca le moog npaaj pluag mov ua Kevcai Hlaa Dlhau rua peb noj.”
Obtug nug Yexus has tas, “Koj xaav kuas wb moog npaaj rua qhov twg?”
Yexus teb has tas, “Thaus meb moog txug huv lub nroog, yuav muaj ib tug txivneej kwv ib lub hub dlej lug ntsib meb. Meb ca le lawv nwg qaab moog huv tsev
hab has rua tug tswv tsev tas, ‘Tug Tswv has tas, koj yuav muab chaav twg rua kuv hab kuv cov thwjtim noj pluag mov ua Kevcai Hlaa Dlhau?’
Tug tswv tsev yuav coj meb moog qha ib chaav dlaav dlaav kws nyob txheej sau hab tub muaj rooj muaj tog txhij lawm rua meb, meb ca le npaaj txhua yaam rua qhov ntawd.”
Obtug txawm moog hab pum muaj txhua yaam lawv le Yexus has, hab obtug npaaj pluag mov ua Kevcai Hlaa Dlhau rua qhov ntawd.
Thaus txug sijhawm noj mov lawm, Yexus hab Yexus cov timthawj lug nyob ntawm rooj mov.
Yexus has rua puab tas, “Kuv xaav nrug mej noj pluag mov ua Kevcai Hlaa Dlhau nuav, ua ntej kws kuv raug kev tsimtxom!
Kuv qha rua mej has tas, ‘Txij nuav moog kuv yuav tsi noj le nuav moog txug nub kws pluag mov ua Kevcai Hlaa Dlhau tav nyob huv Vaajtswv lub Tebchaws.’ ”
Yexus muab khob cawv txiv maab lug ua Vaajtswv tsaug hab has tas, “Mej ca le txais lub khob nuav moog haus.
Kuv qha rua mej has tas, txij nuav moog kuv yuav tsi haus cov cawv txiv maab nuav moog txug nub kws Vaajtswv lub Tebchaws lug.”
Yexus muab ib lub ncuav lug ua Vaajtswv tsaug, nwg muab ndlais faib rua puab hab has tas, “Ntawm nuav yog kuv lub cev kws kuv muab pub rua mej. Mej ua le nuav, mej txhaj yuav ncu ntsoov kuv.”

Thaus puab noj mov taag, Yexus muab ib khob cawv txiv maab lug ua ib yaam nkaus le ntawd, nwg has tas, “Lub khob nuav yog Vaajtswv txujlug cog tseg tshab kws muaj kuv cov ntshaav  ndlwg lug ua lub homthawj nas rua lawm.
“Tabsis mej saib, tug kws ntxeev sab rua kuv, nwg nrug kuv nyob ntawm rooj nuav ntaag!
Tuabneeg Leej Tub yeej yuav tuag lawv le Vaajtswv npaaj tseg lawm, tabsis tug kws ntxeev sab rua Tuabneeg Leej Tub, nwg yuav raug kev puamtsuaj!”
Ces cov timthawj txawm sis nug has tas, peb leejtwg yog tug yuav ua le ntawd?
Cov thwjtim sis caav has tas, “Peb leejtwg yuav tau ua tug luj dlua ndlais?”
Yexus has rua puab tas, “Lwm tsaav tuabneeg cov vaajntxwv kws muaj fwjchim kaav puab tej pejxeem, hab tej numtswv kws muaj fwjchim hu puab has tas, ‘Cov kws saib cov Pejxeem.’
Tabsis mej tsi xob ua le ntawd; mej cov yog leejtwg xaav ua tug hlub, tug ntawd yuavtsum ua ib yaam le yog tug yau, hab tug twg yog tug thawjcoj, tug ntawd yuavtsum ua ib yaam le tug tubkhai.
Tug twg yog tug luj dlua? Tug kws nyob quastsawg noj mov lossis tug tubkhai? Tub yog tug kws nyob quastsawg noj mov ntaag. Tabsis kuv nrug mej nyob, kuv ua ib yaam le tug tubkhai.
“Txhua lub sijhawm kws kuv raug kev txomnyem, mej tsi tau tso kuv tseg;
kuv Txiv tsaa kuv ua tug muaj fwjchim kaav lub nplajteb le caag, kuv yuav tsaa mej kuas muaj fwjchim ib yaam le ntawd.
Mej yuav tau nrug kuv noj hab haus nyob ntawm kuv lub rooj huv kuv lub Tebchaws, hab mej yuav tau nyob sau lub zwmtxwv txav txim rua kaum ob xeem Yixalayees.”

Yexus has tas, “Ximoos, Ximoos! Koj noog kuv has! Vaajtswv tub ca dlaab Ntxwgnyoog lug sim mej txhua tug sab lawm, muab tug zoo cais tawm ntawm tug phem, ib yaam le tug yaaj nplej muab vaab ntxuaj cov npluag tawm ntawm cov nplej.
Tabsis Ximoos, kuv tub thov Vaajtswv paab koj lawm, kuas koj muab sab rau ntseeg. Hab thaus koj lug cuag kuv, koj yuavtsum txhawb koj cov kwvtij zug.”
Petus teb has tas, “Tug Tswv, kuv txaus sab nrug koj raug kaw rua huv tsev lojcuj hab tuag nrug koj!”
Yexus has tas, “Petus, kuv qha rua koj has tas, mo nuav thaus qab tsi tau qua, koj yuav has peb zag has tas, koj tsi paub kuv.”
Ces Yexus nug puab has tas, “Zag taag lug kuv khaiv mej moog, mej tsi nqaa naab nyaj, naab thoobpuab hab khau, mej puas tu ncua ib yaam dlaabtsi?” Puab teb has tas, “Peb si tu ncua dlaabtsi le.”

Yexus has tas, “Tabsis nwgnuav, tug kws muaj naab nyaj lossis naab thoobpuab, tug ntawd yuavtsum nqaa moog; tug kws tsi muaj ntaaj, nwg yuavtsum muab nwg lub tsho luj muag hab moog yuav ib raab ntaaj.
Kuv qha rua mej has tas, Vaajtswv txujlug has tas, ‘Luas suav nwg nrug cov tuabneeg muaj txim.’ Lu lug kws has txug kuv ntawd yeej yuav tav, rua qhov tej kws sau has txug kuv ntawd taabtom yuav tav.”
Cov thwjtim has tas, “Tug Tswv, koj saib ntawm nuav! Peb muaj ob raab ntaaj!” Yexus teb has tas, “Tsi xob has ntxiv lawm!”
Yexus tawm huv lub nroog moog rua peg Roob Txiv Ntoo Roj lawv le nwg ibtxwm moog; hab cov thwjtim nrug nwg moog.
Thaus puab moog txug peg, Yexus has rua puab tas, “Mej yuavtsum thov Vaajtswv, kev sim sab txhaj yuav ntxag tsi tau mej.”
Yexus txawm ncaim puab moog nrug dleb kwvlaam le laim ib ncuas pobzeb, nwg txhus caug ndlua rua ntawm ib saab pobzeb hab thov Vaajtswv has tas,
“Txiv, yog koj pum zoo, thov koj muab lub khob nuav tshem ntawm kuv moog. Txawm yog le caag los koj tsi xob ua lawv le kuv lub sab nyam, tabsis ua lawv le koj lub sab nyam xwb.”
Muaj ib tug timtswv ceebtsheej tshwm lug rua Yexus pum hab txhawb Yexus tug zug.
Yexus nyuaj sab kawg nkaus, nwg hajyam siv zug thov Vaajtswv heev; nwg tawm fws zoo le ntshaav nrug rua huv aav.
Thaus Yexus thov le ntawd taag, nwg sawv moog rua ntawm cov thwjtim, hab nwg pum puab tsaug zug taag lawm, Rua qhov puab nyuaj sab heev.
Yexus has rua puab tas, “Ua le caag mej yuav tsaug zug ua luaj? Mej ca le sawv hab thov Vaajtswv, kev sim sab txhaj yuav ntxag tsi tau mej.”
Thaus Yexus taabtom has le ntawd, muaj ib paab tuabneeg coob coob tuaj txug, Yudas kws yog ib tug ntawm kaum ob tug thwjtim coj cov tuabneeg ntawd tuaj. Nwg txaav zog lug yuav nwj Yexus.
Tabsis Yexus has tas, “Yudas, koj yuav nwj Tuabneeg Leej Tub qha rua puab nteg nwg los?”
Thaus cov thwjtim kws nrug Yexus pum has tas yuav muaj xwm, ces puab txawm has tas, “Tug Tswv, koj puas kheev peb muab ntaaj tua puab?”
Cov thwjtim ib tug rhu hlo ntaaj lug tuab ntaag rua tug Povthawj Hlub ib tug qhev saab nploojntseg xis tu nrho.
Tabsis Yexus has tas, “Tsum le!” Yexus cev teg moog tuav Tug ntawd lub nploojntseg hab khu rov zoo le qub lawm.

Ces Yexus has rua cov thawj ntawm cov povthawj, cov thawj tubrog kws zuv lub Tuamtsev, hab cov txwjlaug kws tuaj nteg Yexus ntawd has tas, “Mej nqaa ntaaj nqaa qws tuaj nteg kuv, ib yaam le kuv yog tubsaab los?
Kuv tub naj nub nrug mej nyob huv lub Tuamtsev, mej tsua tsi nteg kuv? Tabsis nwgnuav tub txug mej lub sijhawm hab txujkev tsaus ntuj lub fwjchim kaav lawm.”
Puab nteg Yexus hab coj nwg moog rua huv tug Povthawj Hlub tsev; Petus lawv qaab moog nrug dleb dleb.
Muaj tuabneeg rauv ib cubtawg rua ntawm lub tshaav puam, Petus txawm moog nrug cov tuabneeg ntawd nte tawg.
Muaj ib tug ntxhais qhev pum Petus nyob ntawm ib saab qhovcub, nwg saib ntsoov Petus hab has tas, “Tug txivneej ntuav yog ib tug kws nrug Yexus hab!”
Tabsis Petus has tas, “Tug muam, kuv yeej tsi paub tug ntawd le!”
Tom qaab ntawd mivntsiv, muaj ib tug txivneej pum Petus hab has tas, “Koj yog puab paab ntawd ib tug hab los sav!” Tabsis Petus has tas, “Txiv ntxawm, kuv tsi yog!”

Tom qaab ntawd kwvlaam le kws ib txoog teev, txawm muaj dlua ib tug txivneej has rua suavdlawg tas, “Tug nuav yeej yog ib tug kws nrug Yexus nyob tag tag le, rua qhov nwg yog ib tug tuabneeg Kalilais hab!”
Tabsis Petus teb has tas, “Txiv ntxawm, tej kws koj has ko kuv yeej tsi paub le!” Thaus Petus taabtom has le ntawd, taamsim ntawd qab txawm qua.
Tug Tswv tig moog saib Petus, ces Petus txawm ncu dlheev txug lu lug kws tug Tswv has rua nwg tas, “Mo nuav thaus qab tsi tau qua, koj yuav has peb zag has tas, koj tsi paub kuv.”
Petus tawm moog rua saab nrau hab quaj tu sab kawg le.
Cov tuabneeg kws zuv Yexus, ua saib tsi taug nwg hab ntaus nwg.
Puab muab phuam lug paav Yexus qhovmuag hab nug Yexus has tas, “Koj sim twv saib yog leejtwg ntaus koj?”
Hab puab thuam Yexus ntau yaam.
Thaus kaaj ntug lawm, cov txwjlaug, cov thawj ntawm cov povthawj, hab cov xwbfwb kws qha Vaajtswv txuj Kevcai tuaj saablaaj ua ke, hab puab kuas coj Yexus tuaj sawv taabmeeg puab.
Puab has rua Yexus has tas, “Koj qha rua peb saib, koj puas yog tug Mexiyas?” Yexus teb has tas, “Txawm yog kuv qha mej los mej yuav tsi ntseeg;
hab yog kuv nug mej los mej yuav tsi teb kuv;
Tabsis txij nuav moog Tuabneeg Leej Tub yuav nyob ntawm Vaajtswv tug kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus saab xis.”
Puab txhua tug txawm nug has tas, “Koj yog Vaajtswv tug Tub los?” Yexus teb puab has tas, “Mej has yog lawm.”
Puab has tas, “Tsi taag peb yuav nrhav timkhawv ntxiv lawm! Rua qhov peb tub nov nwg has lawm!”
Taagnrho cov tuabneeg kws tuaj saablaaj ntawd txawm sawv tseeg coj Yexus moog cuag Philaj,

puab nkaug Yexus rua Philaj has tas, “Peb nteg tug txivneej nuav thaus nwg taabtom ntxag kuas peb tsaav tuabneeg ua yuam kev, hab txwv tsi pub puab them se rua Xixas, hab nwg khaav has tas nwg yog tug Mexiyas kws yog vaajntxwv.”
Philaj nug Yexus has tas, “Koj yog cov Yudais tug vaajntxwv los?” Yexus teb has tas, “Koj has yog lawm.”
Ces Philaj has rua cov thawj ntawm cov povthawj hab cov tuabneeg coob coob ntawd has tas, “Kuv tsi pum tug txivneej nuav muaj ib qhov txhum le.”
Tabsis puab hajyam has tawv tawv has tas, “Nwg tej lug qha ua rua suavdlawg muaj kev kub ntxhuv thoob lub xeev Yudas. Nwg pib qha peg xeev Kalilais hab tuaj txug rua ntawm nuav.”
Thaus Philaj nov puab has le ntawd, nwg nug has tas, “Tug txivneej nuav yog tuabneeg Kalilais los?”
Thaus Philaj paub has tas Yexus tuaj peg cheebtsaam kws Helauj kaav tuaj, ces nwg txawm xaa Yexus moog cuag Helauj, rua qhov lub sijhawm ntawd Helauj tuaj su huv lub nroog Yeluxalees.
Thaus Helauj pum Yexus, Helauj zoo sab kawg le, rua qhov nwg ibtxwm nov Yexus lub moo hab xaav pum Yexus ntev lug lawm. Helauj xaav has tas nwg yuav pum Yexus ua ib yaam txujci tseemceeb.
Helauj nug Yexus ntau zaaj, tabsis Yexus tsi teb le.
