Cov thawj ntawm cov povthawj hab cov xwbfwb kws qha Vaajtswv txuj Kevcai txaav zog moog nkaug Yexus rua Helauj.
Helauj hab nwg cov tubrog thuam Yexus hab ua saib tsi taug Yexus; puab muab ib lub tsho ntev kws zoo nkauj heev rua Yexus naav, hab xaa nwg rov qaab moog rua Philaj.
Txij nub ntawd lug Helauj hab Philaj txawm sis raug zoo lawm; yaav taag lug obtug ua yeebncuab.
Philaj hu cov thawj ntawm cov povthawj, cov thawjcoj hab cov pejxeem tuaj,

hab nwg has rua puab tas, “Mej has tas nwg ntxag kuas cov pejxeem yuam kev. Nwgnuav kuv tub taug nwg zaaj taabmeeg mej suavdlawg lawm, hab kuv tsi pum nwg muaj ib qhov txhum lawv le kws mej nkaug nwg ntawd.
Helauj los tsi pum nwg muaj ib qhov txhum le hab, Helauj txhaj xaa nwg rov lug rua peb. Tug txivneej nuav yeej tsi tau ua ib qhov txhum kws tsimnyog yuav muab nwg tua povtseg.
Yog le ntawd, kuv yuav kuas luas muab nwg nplawm hab tso nwg moog.”
[Lawv le ibtxwm, txhua zag kws ua Kevcai Hlaa Dlhau, Philaj yuavtsum tso ib tug tuabneeg raug txim lawv le cov pejxeem thov.]
Cov tuabneeg coob coob ntawd has nrov nrov has tas, “Muab nwg tua povtseg! Hab tso Npalanpas lug rua peb.!”
[Npalanpas raug kaw rua huv tsev lojcuj, vim nwg ntxeev num ntxeev tswv huv lub nroog hab nwg tua tuabneeg.]
Philaj xaav tso Yexus, nwg txhaj rov has rua cov tuabneeg coob coob ntawd ib zag ntxiv hab.
Tabsis puab hajyam qw nrov nrov has tas, “Muab nwg ntsa rua sau ntoo khaublig! Muab nwg ntsa rua sau ntoo khaublig!”
Philaj rov has rua puab ib zag has tas, “Vim le caag? Nwg ua txhum dlaabtsi? Kuv tsi pum nwg muaj ib qhov txhum kws tsimnyog yuav muab nwg tua! Kuv yuav kuas luas muab nwg nplawm hab tso nwg moog.”
Tabsis cov tuabneeg coob coob ntawd qw taag zug kuas Philaj muab Yexus ntsa rua sau ntoo khaublig. Thaus kawg puab kovyeej Philaj.
Philaj txawm txav txim rua Yexus lawv le puab thov.

Hab Philaj tso tug txivneej kws puab thov rua puab. Tug ntawd yog tug kws raug kaw rua huv tsev lojcuj, nwg ntxeev num ntxeev tswv hab tua tuabneeg. Ces Philaj muab Yexus rua puab lawv le puab sab nyam.

Thaus puab taabtom coj Yexus tawm moog; puab ntsib ib tug txivneej hu ua Ximoos kws nyob huv lub nroog Kulenes kws nyob peg yaajsaab tuaj yuav moog rua huv lub nroog. Puab nteg nwg hab yuam kuas nwg kwv tug ntoo khaublig nrug Yexus moog.
Cov tuabneeg coob coob kws lawv Yexus qaab ntawd, muaj ib cov quaspuj tsaa suab hlo quaj nrov nrov, rua qhov puab hlub Yexus heev.
Yexus tig moog saib puab hab has tas, “Cov quaspuj kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees! Mej tsi xob quaj kuv, tabsis ca le quaj mej hab mej tej mivnyuas.

Thaus txug lub sijhawm ntawd, suavdlawg yuav has tas, ‘Cov quaspuj kws ibtxwm xeeb tsi taug mivnyuas, hab cov quaspuj kws tsi tau xeeb dlua mivnyuas, hab tsi tau pub dlua mig rua mivnyuas noj, yog cov kws moov zoo!’
Lub sijhawm ntawd, yuav muaj tuabneeg has rua tej roob has tas, ‘Nphau lug tsuam peb!’ Hab yuav has rua tej pov roob has tas, ‘Pob lug txhub peb!’
Yog puab tub ua le nuav rua tsob ntoo kws tseem nyoog, thaus tsob ntoo qhuav lawm, puab yuav ua le caag rua?”
Puab coj ob tug txivneej kws ua tubsaab moog tua nrug Yexus.

Thaus puab moog txug ntawm qhov chaw kws hu ua “Pobtxhaa Taubhau,” puab muab Yexus ntsa rua sau ntoo khaublig hab muab txhus rua qhov ntawd, hab muab obtug tubsaab ntsa rua sau ntoo khaublig, muab ib tug txhus rua ntawm Yexus saab xis, hab muab ib tug txhus rua ntawm Yexus saab txhumphem.
Yexus has tas, “Txiv, thov koj zaam txim rua puab! Rua qhov puab tsi paub has tas puab ua dlaabtsi.” Puab muab Yexus cev rig tsho lug twv saib leejtwg yuav tau yaam twg.
Tej tuabneeg suavdlawg sawv ib caag saib. Cov Yudais cov thawjcoj thuam Yexus has tas: “Nwg tub cawm tau lwm tug; yog has tas nwg yog tug Mexiyas kws Vaajtswv xaiv tag, nwg ca le paab kuas nwg dlim!”
Cov tubrog thuam Yexus hab puab muab cawv txiv maab qaub lug cev rua Yexus haus,
hab has tas, “Yog koj yog cov Yudais tug vaajntxwv tag, koj ca le paab kuas koj dlim!”
Muaj ib cov lug sau rua ntawm ib dlaim txag kws nyob ncaaj ntawm Yexus taubhau rua sau has tas, “Tug nuav yog cov Yudais tug vaajntxwv.”
Ob tug tubsaab kws puab muab ntsa rua sau ntoo khaublig ntawd, ib tug thuam Yexus has tas, “Koj tsi yog tug Mexiyas los? Koj ca le paab koj, hab paab kuas wb dlim!”
Tabsis muaj dlua ib tug tshev has tas, “Koj tsi ntshai Vaajtswv los? Koj tub raug txim ib yaam nkaus le nwg hab.
Wb raug txim le nuav yeej tsimnyog qhov kws wb ua txhum; tabsis tug nuav tsi tau ua txhum dlaabtsi le.”
Nwg has rua Yexus has tas, “Thaus koj rov qaab lug ua Vaajntxwv, thov koj ncu txug kuv hab.”
Yexus has rua nwg has tas, “Kuv qha tseeb rua koj has tas, ‘Nub nua koj yuav tau nrug kuv nyob sau qhov chaw kws kaaj sab lug.’ ”
Thaus nub ntseg, lub nub tsi ci lawm, hab lub tebchaws tsaus ntuj nti moog txug thaus peb teev;
Dlaim ntaub kws thaiv huv lub Tuamtsev txawm ndluag rhe ua ob dlaig.
Yexus hu nrov nrov has tas, “Txiv, kuv muab kuv txujsa tso rua huv koj txhais teg!” Yexus has le ntawd taag, nwg txawm tuag lawm.
Tug thawj tubrog pum le ntawd, nwg qhuas Vaajtswv has tas, “Yog tag, tug nuav yeej yog tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg!”
Thaus cov tuabneeg kws tuaj saib pum le ntawd, puab ntaus hauvsab hab rov qaab moog tsev lawm.
Cov tuabneeg kws ibtxwm paub Yexus, hab cov quaspuj kws nrug Yexus tuaj peg lub xeev Kalilais tuaj, puab sawv dleb dleb saib tej nuav.

Muaj ib tug txivneej hu ua Yauxej tuaj peg lub nroog Alimathas huv lub xeev Yudas tuaj. Nwg yog ib tug tuabneeg zoo kws suavdlawg fwm, hab nwg naj nub tog Vaajtswv lub Tebchaws kws yuav lug, hab nwg yog cov Yudais ib tug numtswv, tabsis thaus puab saablaaj yuav txav txim rua Yexus, nwg tsi pum zoo tej kws puab ua ntawd.
Nwg moog cuag Philaj hab thov Philaj muab Yexus lub cev rua nwg.
Ces nwg muab Yexus lub cev txu, muab qhwv hab muab kwv moog tso rua huv lub qhov ntxaa kws luas txaug rua huv ib phaab pobzeb, yeej tsi tau muaj leejtwg coj tuabneeg moog tso rua huv le.
Nub ntawd yog nub kws npaaj qhov txhua chaw tseg rua nub Xanpataus kws tub lug yuav txug.
Cov quaspuj kws nrug Yexus tuaj peg Kalilais tuaj, puab nrug Yauxej moog, puab pum lub qhov ntxaa, hab Yauxej muab Yexus lub cev tso le caag los puab pum huv tuabsi.
Puab rov moog tsev, puab npaaj tej tshuaj tsw qaab hab tej roj tsw qaab, yuav nqaa moog pleev Yexus lub cev. Nub Xanpataus puab su lawv le Vaajtswv txuj Kevcai qha tseg lawm.
Nubkaaj thaus kaaj ntug txoog, cov quaspuj txawm nqaa tej tshuaj tsw qaab kws puab tub npaaj tseg hab puab moog rua tom lub qhov ntxaa.
Puab pum dlaim txag zeb kws npug lub rooj ntxaas tub dlov rua ib saab lawm,
puab moog saib huv; tabsis tsi pum Tswv Yexus lub cev lawm.
Puab sawv ntsug huv hab xaav tsi thoob le, taamsim ntawd muaj ob tug txivneej naav rig tsho ci ntsaa ab lug sawv ntawm puab ib saab.

Cov quaspuj ntawd ntshai kawg, hab nyo taubhau rua huv aav saib tsi taug ob tug txivneej ntawd le, ob tug txivneej ntawd has rua puab tas, “Ua le caag mej tuaj nrhav tug tuabneeg caj ntawm cov tuabneeg tuag nuav?
Nwg tsi nyob ntawm nuav; nwg tub sawv lawm. Mej ncu ntsoov tej lug kws nwg has rua mej, thaus tseem nyob peg lub xeev Kalilais has tas,
‘Yeej yuav muaj tuabneeg nteg Tuabneeg Leej Tub coj moog rua cov tuabneeg txhum muab nwg ntsa rua sau ntoo khaublig, hab peb nub tom qaab, nwg yuav sawv huv qhov tuag rov qaab lug.’ ”
Cov quaspuj ntawd ncu dlheev txug Yexus tej lug,
hab puab tawm huv lub qhov ntxaa rov lug qha tej ntawd rua kaum ib tug thwjtim hab cov tuabneeg kws nrug puab nyob noog.
Cov quaspuj ntawd yog, Malis Madalas, Yau-anas, hab Malis kws yog Yakaunpaus nam; hab muaj dlua ob peb tug quaspuj lug qha tej nuav rua cov timthawj.
Tabsis cov thwjtim xaav has tas, tej kws cov quaspuj ntawd has yog tso dlaag xwb, puab txhaj tsi ntseeg cov quaspuj ntawd tej lug.

Tabsis Petus ca le sawv tseeg dlha moog rua tom lub qhov ntxaa; nwg nyo xauj huv lub qhov ntxaa, ua cav tsi pum dlaabtsi, tsuas pum cov ntaub kws qhwv Yexus lub cev nyob huv xwb. Nwg rov qaab lug tsev, hab xaav tsi thoob rua tej kws nwg pum ntawd.
Tuab nub ntawd Yexus ob tug thwjtim taabtom taug kev moog rua peg lub zog Ema-us kws nyob nrug dleb ntawm lub nroog Yeluxalees kwvlaam le kaum ib kilumev,
hab obtug sis thaam txug tej kws tub tshwm muaj lawm.
Thaus obtug tseem sis thaam hab sis nug txug zaaj ntawd, Yexus txawm lug nrug obtug taug kev moog;
obtug pum Yexus, tabsis zoo le muaj tej yaam ua rua obtug cim tsi tau nwg.
Yexus nug obtug has tas, “Meb pheej thaam dlaabtsi taug kev?” Obtug txawm nreg ua ntsejmuag mluag mlob.

Ob tug ntawd, tug kws hu ua Kelupas, nug Yexus has tas, “Taagnrho cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees, puavleej paub tej kws nyavnyuas muaj tau ob peb nub lug nuav huv tuabsi, tsuas yog koj tuab leeg txhaj tsi paub tej ntawd xwb los?”

Yexus nug obtug has tas, “Tej ntawd yog dlaabtsi?” Obtug teb has tas, “Tej ntawd yog tej xwm kws Yexus tug kws yog tuabneeg Naxales tub raug lawm. Nwg yog ib tug cev Vaajtswv lug. Vaajtswv hab tej tuabneeg suavdlawg puavleej pum has tas, nwg tej lug muaj fwjchim hab nwg ua tau tej txujci tseemceeb.
Peb cov thawj ntawm cov povthawj hab cov numtswv muab nwg rua Philaj txav txim tua nwg povtseg, hab puab muab nwg ntsa rua sau ntoo khaublig.
Peb ca sab has tas nwg yog tug kws yuav paab cov Yixalayees dlim! Dlua le ntawd, txij le muaj tej ntawd lug, tub tau peb nub rua nub nua lawm.
Cov quaspuj kws yog peb paab qee leej tau ua rua peb xaav tsi thoob le; thaus kaaj ntug txoog puab moog rua tom lub qhov ntxaa,
tabsis puab tsi pum Yexus lub cev lawm. Puab rov lug qha rua suavdlawg has tas, puab pum cov timtswv ceebtsheej qha rua puab has tas, Yexus tub rov muaj sa lawm.
Peb cov muaj qee leej moog saib lub qhov ntxaa, hab pum muaj lawv le cov quaspuj ntawd has tag, tabsis puab tsi pum Yexus.”
Ces Yexus has rua obtug tas, “Ua le caag meb yuav ruag ua luaj le, ua le caag meb tsi ntseeg tej kws cov cev Vaajtswv lug tau qha tseg lawm!
Puas yog tug Mexiyas yeej yuav raug tsimtxom hab tom qaab ntawd nwg yuav tau nwg tug tshwjchim kws ci ntsaa ab?”
Yexus txawm pav Vaajtswv txujlug kws has txug nwg, nwg xub pib qha tej kws Mauxes sau hab tej kws cov cev Vaajtswv lug txhua tug sau tseg lawm.
Thaus puab moog yuav txug lub zog kws puab moog ntawd, Yexus txawm ua le nwg yuav dlhau plawg moog.
Tabsis obtug cheem has tas, “Koj nrug wb su ntawm nuav, rua qhov tub yuav tsaus ntuj.” Yexus txhaj moog nrug obtug su.
Thaus Yexus nrug obtug nyob noj mov ntawm rooj, Yexus muab ib lub ncuav lug, nwg ua Vaajtswv tsaug, hab muab faib rua obtug noj.
Yaam kws plooj ntawm obtug lub qhovmuag txawm tshem hlo lawm, obtug txhaj paub has tas yog Yexus. Taamsim ntawd Yexus ca le pluj ndlais ntawm obtug moog lawm.
Obtug sis thaam has tas, “Thaus peb taug kev tuaj, nwg nrug wb thaam hab pav Vaajtswv txujlug rua wb noog, mas wb lub sab kub lug cuag le suavtawg hlawv puas yog?”
Taamsim ntawd obtug txawm sawv tseeg rov qaab moog rua nraag lub nroog Yeluxalees, hab moog rua ntawm kaum ib tug thwjtim, hab lwm tug kws tuaj nyob ua ke ntawd,
hab puab sis thaam has tas, “Tug Tswv tub sawv rov lug lawm tag tag! Nwg tub lug tshwm rua Ximoos pum lawm!”
Obtug txawm pav tej kws obtug pum thaus obtug taug kev moog, hab thaus tug Tswv muab ncuav ndlais faib rua obtug noj, obtug txhaj paub has tas Yog Yexus tag rua puab noog.
Thaus obtug tseem taabtom pav txug tej kws obtug pum lawm rua cov thwjtim noog, taamsim ntawd tug Tswv lug sawv nruab nraab ntawm puab, hab has rua puab tas, “Mej ca le nyob kaaj sab lug.”
Puab poob sab hab ntshai kawg, puab xaav has tas yog puab pum dlaab.
Tabsis Yexus has rua puab tas, “Ua le caag mej ntshai ua luaj le? Vim le caag mej tsi ntseeg?

Mej ca le saib kuv txhais teg hab kuv txhais kutaw, mej txhaj yuav paub has tas yog kuv tag. Mej ca le cev teg kov kuv, mej txhaj le yuav paub, rua qhov dlaab tsi muaj nqaj tsi muaj txhaa le kws mej pum kuv muaj nuav.”
Thaus Yexus has le ntawd, nwg txawm xyaab hlo nwg txhais teg hab txhais kutaw  rua puab saib.
Puab zoo sab kawg hab xaav tsi thoob le, tabsis puab tseem tsi tau ntseeg tag; Yexus nug puab has tas, “Nyob ntawm nuav mej puas muaj dlaabtsi noj?”
Puab muab ib dlaim nqaj ntseg ci cev rua Yexus,
Yexus txais moog noj taabmeeg puab suavdlawg.

Yexus has rua puab tas, “Tej nuav yog tej kws kuv tub qha rua mej thaus kuv tseem nrug mej nyob: rua qhov txhua yaam kws Mauxes has hab tej kws cov cev Vaajtswv lug sau tseg rua huv phoo Ntawv Nkauj kws has txug kuv ntawd puavleej yuav tav.”
Yexus txawm ua rua puab totaub Vaajtswv txujlug,
hab Yexus has rua puab tas, “Tub muaj lug sau tseg lawm has tas: Tug Mexiyas yeej yuav raug kev tsimtxom hab peb nub tom qaab, nwg yuav sawv huv qhov tuag rov qaab lug,

mej yuavtsum tuav nwg lub npe moog qha txujmoo zoo rua txhua tsaav tuabneeg huv qaab ntuj nuav has tas, Vaajtswv yuav zaam txim rua tug kws tso nwg tej kev txhum tseg. Mej ca le pib qha huv lub nroog Yeluxalees.
Mej yuavtsum ua timkhawv qha tej nuav rua suavdlawg paub.
Kuv yuav muab yaam kws kuv Txiv coglug tseg lawm rua mej. Tabsis mej yuavtsum nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees tog moog txug thaus kws mej tau lub fwjchim kws yuav lug sau ntuj lug.”
Yexus coj puab tawm huv lub nroog Yeluxalees moog txug nraag lub zog Npethanis. Nwg tsaa teg foom koob moov rua puab.
Thaus nwg taabtom foom koob moov rua puab, Vaajtswv txawm coj nwg ncaim puab moog rua sau ntuj lawm.
Puab pehawm nwg hab rov moog rua peg lub nroog Yeluxalees, puab zoo sab kawg le,
hab puab naj nub moog nyob huv lub Tuamtsev ua Vaajtswv tsaug.
